abstract: 文章首先阐述了工程教育专业认证与应用化学专业生产实习课程的关联，然后论述了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容设置与安排、课程目标达成的评价方式及评价标准，最后总结了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设的成效及面临的问题。
ZH_EN: The article first elaborates on the connection between engineering education professional certification and the production internship course for applied chemistry. Then, it discusses the development of the production internship course for applied chemistry majors in the context of engineering education professional certification, including course objectives and positioning, the setting and arrangement of course content, and evaluation methods and standards for the attainment of course objectives. Finally, it summarizes the effectiveness and challenges faced in the development of the production internship course for applied chemistry majors in the context of engineering education professional certification.
EN_ZH: 文章首先阐述了工程教育专业认证与应用化学专业生产实习课程之间的联系。接着，探讨了在工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程的建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容的设置与安排，以及课程目标达成评价方法与标准。最后，总结了在工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设中的成效与面临的挑战。

abstract: 文章首先阐述了工程教育专业认证与应用化学专业生产实习课程的关联，然后论述了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容设置与安排、课程目标达成的评价方式及评价标准，最后总结了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设的成效及面临的问题。
ZH_EN: The article first elaborates on the relationship between engineering education professional certification and the production internship course for applied chemistry majors. Then, it discusses the construction of the production internship course for applied chemistry majors under the background of engineering education professional certification, including course objectives and positioning, course content setting and arrangement, and evaluation methods and evaluation standards for the achievement of course objectives. Finally, it summarizes the effectiveness and existing problems in the construction of the production internship course for applied chemistry majors under the background of engineering education professional certification.
EN_ZH: 文章首先阐述了工程教育专业认证与应用化学专业生产实习课程之间的关系。其次，探讨了在工程教育专业认证背景下，应用化学专业生产实习课程的建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容设置与安排，以及课程目标达成的评价方法和评价标准。最后，总结了在工程教育专业认证背景下，应用化学专业生产实习课程建设中的成效与存在的问题。

abstract: 文章首先阐述了工程教育专业认证与应用化学专业生产实习课程的关联，然后论述了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容设置与安排、课程目标达成的评价方式及评价标准，最后总结了工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学专业生产实习课程建设的成效及面临的问题。
ZH_EN: The article first elucidates the relationship between engineering education professional accreditation and the production practice course for applied chemistry. Then it discusses the development of the production practice course for applied chemistry in the context of engineering education professional accreditation, including course objectives and positioning, course content setting and arrangement, and evaluation methods and criteria for achieving course objectives. Finally, it summarizes the effectiveness and challenges faced in the development of the production practice course for applied chemistry in the context of engineering education professional accreditation.
EN_ZH: 文章首先阐述工程教育专业认证与应用化学生产实习课程的关系。然后探讨工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学生产实习课程的建设，包括课程目标与定位、课程内容设置与安排、以及课程目标达成的评价方法与标准。最后，总结工程教育专业认证背景下应用化学生产实习课程建设的成效与面临的挑战。

abstract: “天然药物化学”是高等学校药学及相关专业的必修课程。课程章节内容多、理论性强,学生学习面临较多难题。因此,基于超星学习通,建立线上和线下深度融合的天然药物化学混合教学模式,通过任务驱动、线上自主学习、小组讨论、课后巩固、延伸拓展知识等方式,全面激发学生的积极性和主动性,提升教学效果。
ZH_EN: Natural Product Chemistry is a required course for pharmaceutical and related majors in higher education institutions. The course content is chapter-rich and highly theoretical, and students face many difficulties in learning. Therefore, based on Superstar Learning Platform, a deeply integrated online and offline blended teaching model for Natural Product Chemistry is established. Through task-driven, online self-study, group discussions, after-class consolidation, and knowledge extension and other methods, it comprehensively stimulates students' enthusiasm and initiative and enhances teaching effectiveness.
EN_ZH: 天然产物化学是高等院校药学及相关专业的必修课。课程内容章节丰富且理论性强，学生在学习中面临诸多困难。因此，基于超星学习平台，构建了一种深度融合线上线下混合式天然产物化学教学模式。通过任务驱动、线上自学、小组讨论、课后巩固和知识拓展等多种方法，全面激发学生的学习热情和主动性，并提升教学效果。

abstract: “天然药物化学”是高等学校药学及相关专业的必修课程。课程章节内容多、理论性强,学生学习面临较多难题。因此,基于超星学习通,建立线上和线下深度融合的天然药物化学混合教学模式,通过任务驱动、线上自主学习、小组讨论、课后巩固、延伸拓展知识等方式,全面激发学生的积极性和主动性,提升教学效果。
ZH_EN: "Natural Products Chemistry" is a required course for pharmacy and related majors in universities and colleges. The course has extensive content and is highly theoretical, posing learning challenges for students. Therefore, based on the Chaoxing Learning Platform, a deeply integrated online and offline blended teaching model for Natural Products Chemistry was established. This model employs task-driven methods, online self-directed learning, group discussions, after-class consolidation, and knowledge extension to comprehensively stimulate students' enthusiasm and initiative, and to enhance teaching effectiveness.
EN_ZH: 天然药物化学是高校药学及相关专业的必修课。该课程内容广泛且理论性强，对学生的学习造成挑战。因此，基于超星学习平台，为《天然药物化学》建立了一种深度融合线上线下混合式教学模式。该模式采用任务驱动法、线上自主学习、小组讨论、课后巩固和知识拓展等方法，以全面激发学生的学习热情和主动性，并提高教学效果。

abstract: “天然药物化学”是高等学校药学及相关专业的必修课程。课程章节内容多、理论性强,学生学习面临较多难题。因此,基于超星学习通,建立线上和线下深度融合的天然药物化学混合教学模式,通过任务驱动、线上自主学习、小组讨论、课后巩固、延伸拓展知识等方式,全面激发学生的积极性和主动性,提升教学效果。
ZH_EN: "Natural Medicinal Chemistry" is a required course for pharmacy and related majors in higher education institutions. The content of course chapters is extensive and highly theoretical, and students face many difficulties in learning. Therefore, based on the Chaoxing Learning Platform, a deeply blended online and offline blended teaching mode of Natural Medicinal Chemistry was established. Through task-driven approaches, online self-directed learning, group discussions, post-class reinforcement, knowledge extension and expansion, and other methods, it comprehensively stimulates students' initiative and enthusiasm and enhances teaching effectiveness.
EN_ZH: “天然药物化学”是高等院校药学及相关专业的一门必修课程。课程章节内容广泛且高度理论化，学生在学习中面临诸多困难。因此，基于超星学习平台，构建了“天然药物化学”深度融合线上线下的混合式教学模式。通过任务驱动、线上自主学习、小组讨论、课后巩固、知识拓展延伸等多种方法，全面激发学生的积极性和主动性，提升教学效果。

abstract: 有机化学在长学制医学专业教育中扮演着至关重要的基础角色。通过引入与医学专业紧密相关的特色案例，能够有效提升课程内容的相关性和实用性，进一步优化教学效果。这种互动和探索性的学习方式，不仅促进了学生对化合物分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征、立体化学等核心知识点的深入理解和融会贯通，而且巧妙地将理论知识与医学实际应用相结合，激发了学生的学习热情和发散思维。案例教学的实施，不仅强化了学生的能力与素养的融合，同时为长学制医学专业的创新型人才培养提供了新的教学视角。
ZH_EN: Organic chemistry plays a crucial foundational role in long-term medical education. By introducing relevant case studies closely related to the medical profession, the relevance and practicality of the course content can be effectively improved, further optimizing teaching effectiveness. This interactive and exploratory learning approach not only facilitates students' in-depth understanding and mastery of core knowledge points such as molecular structure of compounds, chemical properties, functional group characteristics, and stereochemistry, but also skillfully integrates theoretical knowledge with practical medical applications, stimulating students' learning enthusiasm and divergent thinking. The implementation of case-based teaching not only strengthens the integration of students' abilities and qualities, but also provides a new teaching perspective for the cultivation of innovative talents in long-term medical education.
EN_ZH: 有机化学在长期医学教育中起着至关重要的基础作用。通过引入与医学专业紧密相关的案例研究，可以有效提升课程内容的关联性和实用性，进而优化教学效果。这种互动和探索性的学习方法不仅有助于学生深入理解和掌握核心知识点，例如化合物的分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征和立体化学，而且巧妙地将理论知识与实际医学应用相结合，激发学生的学习热情和发散思维。案例教学的实施不仅加强了学生能力和素质的整合，而且为长期医学教育中创新人才的培养提供了新的教学视角。

abstract: 有机化学在长学制医学专业教育中扮演着至关重要的基础角色。通过引入与医学专业紧密相关的特色案例，能够有效提升课程内容的相关性和实用性，进一步优化教学效果。这种互动和探索性的学习方式，不仅促进了学生对化合物分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征、立体化学等核心知识点的深入理解和融会贯通，而且巧妙地将理论知识与医学实际应用相结合，激发了学生的学习热情和发散思维。案例教学的实施，不仅强化了学生的能力与素养的融合，同时为长学制医学专业的创新型人才培养提供了新的教学视角。
ZH_EN: Organic chemistry plays a crucial foundational role in long-term medical professional education. By introducing distinctive cases closely related to medical specialties, it can effectively enhance the relevance and practicality of course content, and further optimize teaching outcomes. This interactive and exploratory learning approach not only promotes students' in-depth understanding and comprehensive mastery of core knowledge points such as molecular structures of compounds, chemical properties, functional group characteristics, and stereochemistry, but also skillfully integrates theoretical knowledge with real-world medical applications, inspiring students' passion for learning and innovative thinking. The implementation of case-based teaching not only enhances the integration of students' skills and competence, but also offers a novel teaching perspective for fostering innovative talents in long-term medical programs.
EN_ZH: 有机化学在长期医学专业教育中起着至关重要的基础性作用。通过引入与医学专业密切相关的特色案例，可以有效提升课程内容的关联性和实用性，并进一步优化教学效果。这种互动式和探究式学习方法，不仅促进学生对诸如化合物分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征和立体化学等核心知识点的深入理解和全面掌握，而且巧妙地将理论知识与现实世界的医学应用相结合，激发学生对学习的热情和创新思维。案例教学的实施，不仅增强了学生技能和能力的整合，而且为在长期医学项目中培养创新型人才提供了新的教学视角。

abstract: 有机化学在长学制医学专业教育中扮演着至关重要的基础角色。通过引入与医学专业紧密相关的特色案例，能够有效提升课程内容的相关性和实用性，进一步优化教学效果。这种互动和探索性的学习方式，不仅促进了学生对化合物分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征、立体化学等核心知识点的深入理解和融会贯通，而且巧妙地将理论知识与医学实际应用相结合，激发了学生的学习热情和发散思维。案例教学的实施，不仅强化了学生的能力与素养的融合，同时为长学制医学专业的创新型人才培养提供了新的教学视角。
ZH_EN: Organic chemistry plays a crucial foundational role in long-cycle medical professional education. By introducing featured cases closely related to medical professions, the relevance and practicality of the course content can be effectively enhanced, further optimizing the teaching effectiveness. This interactive and exploratory learning approach not only promotes students' in-depth understanding and mastery of core knowledge points such as compound molecular structure, chemical properties, functional group characteristics, and stereochemistry, but also skillfully combines theoretical knowledge with practical medical applications, stimulating students' learning enthusiasm and divergent thinking. The implementation of case-based teaching not only strengthens the integration of students' abilities and qualities, but also provides a new teaching perspective for the cultivation of innovative talents in long-cycle medical programs.
EN_ZH: 有机化学在长学制医学专业教育中起着至关重要的基础性作用。通过引入与医学专业密切相关的特色案例，可以有效提升课程内容的关联性和实用性，进一步优化教学效果。这种互动式和探究式学习方法不仅促进学生深入理解和掌握化合物分子结构、化学性质、官能团特征和立体化学等核心知识点，而且巧妙地将理论知识与实际医学应用相结合，激发学生的学习热情和发散性思维。案例教学的实施不仅加强了学生能力和素质的融合，也为长学制医学项目中创新型人才的培养提供了新的教学视角。

abstract: <正>在初中物理教学中，渗透化学知识不仅体现了学科交叉融合的现代教育趋势，更是一种创新的教育策略，旨在帮助学生构建全面的科学概念框架。化学和物理学都属于自然科学范畴，它们是从不同的角度来研究物质的相关性质。因此，它们本身就存在着天然的联系。再从化学与物理学两门科学发展的历程来看，它们之间的联系越来越多，也越来越紧密。在初中阶段，将化学元素引入到物理教学中，可以极大地丰富学生对物质世界的理解，增强他们的实验操作能力和科学探究意识。
ZH_EN: Integrating chemical knowledge into junior high school physics teaching not only reflects the modern educational trend of interdisciplinary integration but also represents an innovative educational strategy aimed at helping students build a comprehensive framework of scientific concepts. Chemistry and physics both belong to the realm of natural sciences, and they study the relevant properties of matter from different perspectives. Therefore, they inherently possess a natural connection. Furthermore, considering the development history of both chemistry and physics, the connection between them is becoming increasingly numerous and closer. In the junior high school stage, introducing chemical elements into physics teaching can greatly enrich students' understanding of the material world, enhance their experimental operation skills and scientific inquiry awareness.
EN_ZH: 将化学知识融入初中物理教学，不仅体现了学科交叉融合的现代教育趋势，也代表着一种旨在帮助学生构建全面科学概念体系的创新教育策略。化学和物理都属于自然科学的范畴，它们从不同的角度研究物质的相关属性。因此，它们天然地具有内在联系。此外，考虑到化学和物理的发展历史，它们之间的联系变得越来越频繁和紧密。在初中阶段，将化学元素引入物理教学，能够极大地丰富学生对物质世界的理解，增强他们的实验操作技能和科学探究意识。

abstract: <正>在初中物理教学中，渗透化学知识不仅体现了学科交叉融合的现代教育趋势，更是一种创新的教育策略，旨在帮助学生构建全面的科学概念框架。化学和物理学都属于自然科学范畴，它们是从不同的角度来研究物质的相关性质。因此，它们本身就存在着天然的联系。再从化学与物理学两门科学发展的历程来看，它们之间的联系越来越多，也越来越紧密。在初中阶段，将化学元素引入到物理教学中，可以极大地丰富学生对物质世界的理解，增强他们的实验操作能力和科学探究意识。
ZH_EN: Integrating chemistry knowledge in junior high school physics teaching not only reflects the modern educational trend of interdisciplinary integration, but also serves as an innovative educational strategy aimed at helping students build a comprehensive scientific framework. Chemistry and physics both belong to the field of natural sciences, as they study the related properties of matter from different perspectives. Therefore, they inherently possess natural connections. Furthermore, considering the historical development of the two scientific disciplines of chemistry and physics, the connections between them have grown increasingly numerous and stronger. At the junior high school level, introducing chemical elements into physics teaching can greatly enrich students' understanding of the physical world and enhance their experimental skills and scientific inquiry spirit.
EN_ZH: 将化学知识融入初中物理教学，不仅体现了现代教育跨学科融合的趋势，也是旨在帮助学生构建全面科学框架的创新教育策略。化学和物理都属于自然科学领域，因为它们从不同的角度研究物质的相关属性。因此，它们天然地具有内在联系。此外，考虑到化学和物理这两门科学学科的历史发展，它们之间的联系已经变得越来越紧密和更加强大。在初中阶段，将化学元素引入物理教学可以极大地丰富学生对物理世界的理解，并提升他们的实验技能和科学探究精神。

abstract: <正>在初中物理教学中，渗透化学知识不仅体现了学科交叉融合的现代教育趋势，更是一种创新的教育策略，旨在帮助学生构建全面的科学概念框架。化学和物理学都属于自然科学范畴，它们是从不同的角度来研究物质的相关性质。因此，它们本身就存在着天然的联系。再从化学与物理学两门科学发展的历程来看，它们之间的联系越来越多，也越来越紧密。在初中阶段，将化学元素引入到物理教学中，可以极大地丰富学生对物质世界的理解，增强他们的实验操作能力和科学探究意识。
ZH_EN: In junior high school physics teaching, integrating chemical knowledge not only embodies the modern educational trend of interdisciplinary integration, but is also an innovative educational strategy aimed at helping students build a comprehensive scientific conceptual framework. Chemistry and physics both belong to the field of natural sciences, and they study the relevant properties of matter from different angles. Therefore, they inherently have a natural connection. Furthermore, considering the development history of chemistry and physics as two sciences, the connections between them are becoming increasingly close and strong. At the junior high school level, incorporating chemical elements into physics teaching can greatly enrich students' understanding of the material world, enhance their experimental skills, and strengthen their scientific inquiry spirit.
EN_ZH: 在初中物理教学中，融入化学知识不仅体现了学科交叉融合的现代教育趋势，更是一种旨在帮助学生构建全面的科学概念框架的创新教育策略。化学和物理都属于自然科学领域，且从不同角度研究物质的相关属性。因此，它们天然地存在内在联系。此外，从化学和物理这两门学科的发展历史来看，它们之间的联系也日益紧密和加强。在初中阶段，将化学元素融入物理教学能够极大地丰富学生对物质世界的理解，提升他们的实验技能，并增强他们的科学探究精神。

abstract: 涂光炽先生是闻名世界的矿床学家和地球化学家，是无可争议的我国地球化学学科的领军人，有关他对这两个学科发展的巨大贡献和重大科研成果国内学术界已出版有不少的专著、论文及相关报道，然而，关于地球化学学科发展中关键历史事件与重大成果产出的背景以及涂先生本人又是怎样的思考则披露及讨论的甚少。为此，本刊特约涂光炽先生的早期研究生、业务秘书及多年的部下与密切合作者，我国著名的稀有元素地球化学家赵振华研究员，根据其掌握的第一手资料，以及所保存的各种文字材料，如涂先生本人的论文、学术报告、与科研人员通信、讲话和为科研人员的专著作序等原始材料，就国内首开地球化学课程、发展我国地球化学及各分支学科、建立我国地球化学研究机构、创办地球化学学会和学术期刊、组织撰写地球化学学科专著、提出并支持地球化学发展新方向、热心培养地球化学与矿床学青年科研人才、执着发展地球化学以及终生献身地球科学事业等方面一一加以系统梳理始成本文。无疑，本文的发表将对弘扬以涂光炽先生为代表的我国老一代地球科学家矢志报国献身科学的崇高精神，激励广大中青年地球科学科研人员，投身于中华民族复兴的伟大事业具有重要的现实意义，同时对我国地球化学和矿床学学科史研究也具有重要的参考价值。本刊将分3期刊载该文，并在本刊公众号上逐一发表，敬请关注。
ZH_EN: Mr. Tu Guangchi was a world-renowned expert in ore deposits and geochemistry, and is undeniably the leading figure in China's geochemistry discipline.  Domestic academia has already published numerous monographs, papers, and related reports on his great contributions to the development of these two disciplines and significant scientific research achievements. However, the background of key historical events and major achievements in the development of geochemistry, as well as Mr. Tu's own thinking, have rarely been disclosed and discussed. To this end, this journal specially invited Mr. Tu Guangchi's early graduate student, academic secretary, and long-time subordinate and close collaborator, the renowned Chinese rare element geochemist Researcher Zhao Zhenhua, to systematically organize and present this article based on the first-hand materials he possesses, as well as various written materials he has preserved, such as Mr. Tu's own papers, academic reports, correspondence with researchers, speeches, and prefaces written for researchers' monographs, focusing on aspects such as pioneering geochemistry courses in China, developing China's geochemistry and its various branches, establishing Chinese geochemical research institutions, founding the Geochemical Society and academic journals, organizing the writing of monographs on geochemistry, proposing and supporting new directions in geochemistry development, enthusiastically cultivating young scientific research talents in geochemistry and ore deposits, persistently developing geochemistry, and dedicating his life to the cause of geosciences. Undoubtedly, the publication of this article will be of significant practical importance for promoting the noble spirit of serving the country and dedicating oneself to science, represented by Mr. Tu Guangchi and other older generation Chinese earth scientists, and for inspiring the vast number of young and middle-aged earth science researchers to devote themselves to the great cause of the rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. At the same time, it also has important reference value for the study of the history of geochemistry and ore deposit disciplines in China. This journal will publish the article in 3 installments and will publish them one by one on the journal's public WeChat account. Please stay tuned.
EN_ZH: 涂光炽先生是世界著名的矿床和地球化学专家，无可争议地是中国地球化学学科的领军人物。国内学术界已经发表了大量关于他对这两个学科发展和重大科学研究成就做出卓越贡献的专著、论文和相关报道。然而，地球化学发展中关键历史事件和重大成就的背景，以及涂先生本人的思想，却鲜有披露和探讨。为此，本刊特邀涂光炽先生的早期研究生、学术秘书、长期下属和密切合作者，著名中国稀有元素地球化学家赵振华研究员，基于他所掌握的第一手资料，以及他保存的各种书面材料，如涂先生本人的论文、学术报告、与研究人员的通信、演讲稿、为研究人员专著撰写的序言等，系统地组织和撰写本文，重点关注在中国开创地球化学课程、发展中国地球化学及其各个分支、建立中国地球化学研究机构、创建地球化学学会和学术期刊、组织编写地球化学专著、提出和支持地球化学发展的新方向、热情培养地球化学和矿床学领域的青年科研人才、坚持发展地球化学、以及将毕生奉献给地球科学事业等方面。毫无疑问，本文的发表对于弘扬以涂光炽先生等老一辈中国地球科学家为代表的，服务国家、献身科学的崇高精神，以及激励广大中青年地球科学研究人员投身中华民族伟大复兴的伟业，都具有重要的现实意义。同时，本文对于研究中国地球化学和矿床学科的历史也具有重要的参考价值。本刊将分3期连载刊发此文，并在本刊微信公众号上陆续发布，敬请期待。

ZH_EN: Mr. Tu Guangchi is a world-renowned mineral deposit geologist and geochemist, and is undeniably the leading figure in China's geochemistry discipline. Regarding his great contributions to the development of these two disciplines and significant scientific research achievements, the domestic academic community has already published many monographs, papers, and related reports. However, there is very little disclosure and discussion about the background of key historical events and the production of significant achievements in the development of geochemistry, and what Mr. Tu himself was thinking. For this reason, this journal specially invited Researcher Zhao Zhenhua, China's famous rare element geochemist, who was Mr. Tu Guangchi's early graduate student, business secretary, long-time subordinate, and close collaborator, to systematically sort out each aspect such as pioneering geochemistry courses in China, developing China's geochemistry and its various sub-disciplines, establishing China's geochemistry research institutions, founding the Geochemical Society and academic journals, organizing the writing of geochemical monographs, proposing and supporting new directions in geochemistry development, enthusiastically cultivating young researchers in geochemistry and mineral deposit geology, persistently developing geochemistry, and his lifelong dedication to geoscience, etc., based on the first-hand information he possesses, and the various written materials he has preserved, such as Mr. Tu's own papers, academic reports, correspondence with researchers, speeches, and prefaces for researchers' monographs, etc., original materials, to produce this article. Undoubtedly, the publication of this article will be of important practical significance for promoting the noble spirit of the older generation of Chinese earth scientists, represented by Mr. Tu Guangchi, who are determined to serve the country and dedicate themselves to science, and for inspiring the vast number of young and middle-aged earth science researchers to devote themselves to the great cause of the rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Moreover, it also has important reference value for the research on the history of geochemistry and mineral deposit geology disciplines in China. This journal will publish this article in 3 issues, and will publish it issue by issue on the journal's public WeChat account. Please stay tuned.
EN_ZH: 涂光炽先生是世界著名的矿床地质学家和地球化学家，并且无可争议地是中国地球化学学科的领军人物。关于他对这两个学科发展和重大科研成就的巨大贡献，国内学术界已经出版了许多专著、论文和相关报道。然而，对于地球化学发展中关键历史事件的背景和重大成就的产生，以及涂先生本人的思考，披露和探讨却很少。有鉴于此，本刊特邀中国著名稀有元素地球化学家赵振华研究员，他曾是涂光炽先生早期的研究生、业务秘书、长期下属和密切合作者，系统梳理了如在中国开创地球化学课程、发展中国地球化学及其各分支学科、建立中国地球化学研究机构、创办地球化学会和学术刊物、组织编写地球化学专著、提出和支持地球化学发展的新方向、热情培养地球化学和矿床地质学青年研究人员、坚持发展地球化学，以及他对地学毕生奉献等各方面，基于他掌握的第一手资料，以及他保存的各种文字材料，如涂先生本人的论文、学术报告、与研究人员的通信、讲话，以及为研究人员专著所作的序言等原始材料，撰写成文。毫无疑问，本文的发表将对弘扬以涂光炽先生为代表的老一辈中国地球科学家胸怀报国之志、献身科学的崇高精神，激励广大中青年地球科学研究者投身于中华民族伟大复兴的伟大事业，而且，对于中国地球化学和矿床地质学学科历史的研究也具有重要的参考价值。本刊将分3期刊发此文，并在本刊微信公众号逐期连载，敬请关注。

EN_ZH: 涂光炽先生是世界著名的矿床地质学家和地球化学家，是中国地球化学界公认的领军人物。国内学术界已经出版了大量的专著、论文和相关报告，介绍了他对这两门学科发展所做的巨大贡献以及他重大的科学研究成就。然而，地球化学发展历程中一些关键历史事件的背景和重要成果的产生过程，以及涂先生本人的思想，却鲜有披露和论述。为此，本刊特邀中国著名稀有元素地球化学家赵振华研究员，以及涂光炽先生的早期研究生、业务秘书、长期下属和亲密合作者，基于他所掌握的第一手资料和保存下来的各种文字材料，如涂先生本人的论文、学术报告、与研究人员的通信、讲话，以及为研究人员专著所作的序言等原始资料，系统梳理和编撰此文，内容涵盖了在中国开创地球化学课程、在中国发展地球化学及其各个分支学科、建立中国地球化学研究机构、创办地球化学学会和学术期刊、组织编写地球化学专著、提出和支持地球化学发展的新方向、热情培养地球化学和矿床地质学领域的青年科技人才、坚持不懈地发展地球化学，并将他毕生奉献于地质科学事业的各个方面。毫无疑问，本文的发表将具有重要的现实意义，对于弘扬以涂光炽先生为代表的老一辈中国地球科学家心怀报国之志、献身科学的崇高精神，激励广大中青年地球科学研究者投身于中华民族伟大复兴的伟大事业，同时，对于研究中国地球化学和矿床地质学史也具有重要的参考价值。本刊将分三期连载刊发此文，并将陆续在本刊微信公众号上逐期发布，敬请关注。

abstract: 为实现“立德树人”的教育目标，各高校开始大力发展将“课程思政”融入专业课程的举措。分析化学实验作为一门基础性极强、学科地位较高的实验课程，蕴含着非常丰富的思政元素。本文通过分析该课程目前的教学现状，在课程的前中后期深入挖掘和糅合思政元素，以达到培养学生实事求是的科学精神、大胆创新的意识以及“绿水青山就是金山银山”的可持续发展理念等思政目标，在学习知识的同时，帮助学生树立正确的世界观、人生观、价值观，为国家培养更多的高素质、高质量的化学人才。
ZH_EN: To achieve the educational goal of "cultivating virtue and nurturing talent," universities have begun to vigorously develop initiatives to integrate "curriculum-based ideological and political education" into professional courses. Analytical chemistry experiment, as a highly fundamental and academically significant experimental course, contains very rich ideological and political elements. This article, by analyzing the current teaching situation of this course, deeply explores and integrates ideological and political elements in the pre-, mid-, and post-stages of the course, aiming to cultivate students' scientific spirit of seeking truth from facts, a sense of bold innovation, and the sustainable development concept of "lucid waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets," among other ideological and political objectives. While learning knowledge, it helps students establish a correct worldview, outlook on life, and values, and cultivate more high-quality, high-caliber chemistry talents for the country.
EN_ZH: 为了实现“立德树人”的教育目标，高校开始大力开展将“课程思政”融入专业课程的举措。分析化学实验作为一门高度基础性和学术意义重要的实验课程，蕴含着丰富的思政元素。本文通过分析本课程目前的教学现状，深入挖掘和融入思政元素于课程的课前、课中和课后环节，旨在培养学生求真务实的科学精神、勇于创新的意识以及“绿水青山就是金山银山”的可持续发展理念等思政育人目标。在学习知识的同时，助力学生树立正确的世界观、人生观和价值观，并为国家培养更多高素质、高水平的化学人才。

While learning knowledge, it helps students establish correct worldviews, perspectives on life, and values, and cultivates more high-caliber and high-quality chemistry talents for the country.
EN_ZH: 为实现“立德树人”的教育目标，高校开始大力开展将“课程思政”融入专业课程的举措。分析化学实验作为一门高度基础且学术性重要的实验课程，蕴含着非常丰富的思政元素。本文通过分析该课程目前的教学现状，深入挖掘和融入课前、课中和课后环节的思政元素，旨在实现诸如培养学生实事求是的科学精神、勇于创新的胆识以及“绿水青山就是金山银山”的可持续发展理念等思政目标。在学习知识的同时，帮助学生树立正确的世界观、人生观和价值观，为国家培养更多高素质、高水平的化学人才。

abstract: 为实现“立德树人”的教育目标，各高校开始大力发展将“课程思政”融入专业课程的举措。分析化学实验作为一门基础性极强、学科地位较高的实验课程，蕴含着非常丰富的思政元素。本文通过分析该课程目前的教学现状，在课程的前中后期深入挖掘和糅合思政元素，以达到培养学生实事求是的科学精神、大胆创新的意识以及“绿水青山就是金山银山”的可持续发展理念等思政目标，在学习知识的同时，帮助学生树立正确的世界观、人生观、价值观，为国家培养更多的高素质、高质量的化学人才。
ZH_EN: To achieve the educational goal of "cultivating virtue and nurturing people," universities have begun to vigorously develop measures to integrate "curriculum ideology and politics" into professional courses. Analytical chemistry experiment, as an experimental course that is highly fundamental and occupies a high disciplinary position, contains very rich ideological and political elements. This article, by analyzing the current teaching situation of this course, deeply explores and integrates ideological and political elements in the pre-course, mid-course, and post-course stages, in order to achieve ideological and political goals such as cultivating students' scientific spirit of seeking truth from facts, awareness of bold innovation, and the sustainable development concept of "lucid waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets." While learning knowledge, it also helps students establish correct worldviews, outlooks on life, and values, and cultivates more high-caliber and high-quality chemistry talents for the country.
EN_ZH: 为了实现“立德树人”的教育目标，高校开始大力开展将“课程思政”融入专业课程的举措。分析化学实验作为一门基础性强、学科地位高的实验课程，蕴含着丰富的思政元素。本文通过分析该课程目前的教学现状，深入挖掘并在课前、课中和课后环节融入思政元素，以期达到培养学生实事求是的科学精神、勇于创新的意识和“绿水青山就是金山银山”的可持续发展理念等思政目标。在传授知识的同时，帮助学生树立正确的世界观、人生观和价值观，为国家培养更多高素质、高水平的化学人才。

abstract: 当前海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益密切，跨学科复合型人才的培养变得尤为重要。文章针对大气化学课程，提出了融入海洋特色的教学设计和实践模式。通过系统梳理教学目标与现存问题，文章提出了将海洋科学知识有机融入课程的知识点设计，并结合多样化的教学实践手段，如基于问题的教学、案例分析等，进一步提升了课程的创新性和实用性。通过教学实践检验发现，融入海洋特色的教学方法显著提升了学生的学科交叉能力，增强了他们保护环境的责任感，为培养具备大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。
ZH_EN: Currently, the interaction between ocean environmental problems and climate change is becoming increasingly close, making the cultivation of interdisciplinary and compound talents particularly important. This article, targeting the atmospheric chemistry course, proposes a teaching design and practical model that incorporates ocean characteristics. By systematically reviewing the teaching objectives and existing problems, the article proposes a design of knowledge points that organically integrates ocean science knowledge into the course, and, combined with diverse teaching practice methods such as problem-based learning and case analysis, further enhances the course's innovation and practicality. Teaching practice verification reveals that teaching methods incorporating ocean characteristics significantly improved students' interdisciplinary abilities, enhanced their sense of responsibility for environmental protection, and provided strong support for cultivating high-quality talents equipped with atmospheric and ocean science knowledge.
EN_ZH: 目前，海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益紧密，使得跨学科和复合型人才的培养显得尤为重要。本文针对大气化学课程，提出了一种融入海洋特色的教学设计和实践模型。通过系统梳理教学目标和现有问题，本文提出了一种将海洋科学知识有机融入课程的知识点设计，并结合问题导向学习和案例分析等多元教学实践方法，进一步提升了课程的创新性和实践性。教学实践验证表明，融入海洋特色的教学方法显著提升了学生的跨学科能力，增强了他们的环境保护责任感，并为培养具备大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。

abstract: 当前海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益密切，跨学科复合型人才的培养变得尤为重要。文章针对大气化学课程，提出了融入海洋特色的教学设计和实践模式。通过系统梳理教学目标与现存问题，文章提出了将海洋科学知识有机融入课程的知识点设计，并结合多样化的教学实践手段，如基于问题的教学、案例分析等，进一步提升了课程的创新性和实用性。通过教学实践检验发现，融入海洋特色的教学方法显著提升了学生的学科交叉能力，增强了他们保护环境的责任感，为培养具备大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。
ZH_EN: The interaction between current marine environmental problems and climate change is becoming increasingly close, making the cultivation of interdisciplinary and compound talents particularly important. Focusing on the atmospheric chemistry course, the article proposes a teaching design and practical model incorporating marine characteristics. Through systematically reviewing teaching objectives and existing problems, the article proposes a knowledge point design that organically integrates marine science knowledge into the curriculum, and combines diversified teaching practice methods, such as problem-based learning and case analysis, further enhancing the innovation and practicality of the course. Through teaching practice verification, it was found that teaching methods incorporating marine characteristics significantly improved students' interdisciplinary abilities, enhanced their sense of responsibility for environmental protection, and provided strong support for cultivating high-quality talents with atmospheric and marine science knowledge.
EN_ZH: 当前海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益密切，使得跨学科复合型人才的培养尤为重要。以大气化学课程为着眼点，文章提出了融入海洋特色的教学设计与实践模式。通过系统梳理教学目标和现有问题，文章提出了将海洋科学知识有机融入课程的知识点设计，并结合了多元化教学实践方法，如问题导向学习和案例分析，进一步提升了课程的创新性和实践性。通过教学实践验证，发现融入海洋特色的教学方法显著提高了学生的跨学科能力，增强了他们的环境保护责任感，并为培养掌握大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。

abstract: 当前海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益密切，跨学科复合型人才的培养变得尤为重要。文章针对大气化学课程，提出了融入海洋特色的教学设计和实践模式。通过系统梳理教学目标与现存问题，文章提出了将海洋科学知识有机融入课程的知识点设计，并结合多样化的教学实践手段，如基于问题的教学、案例分析等，进一步提升了课程的创新性和实用性。通过教学实践检验发现，融入海洋特色的教学方法显著提升了学生的学科交叉能力，增强了他们保护环境的责任感，为培养具备大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。
ZH_EN: The interaction between current marine environmental problems and climate change is becoming increasingly close, making the cultivation of interdisciplinary and compound talents particularly important. This article, focusing on the atmospheric chemistry course, proposes a teaching design and practical model that integrates marine characteristics. Through systematically reviewing teaching objectives and existing problems, the article proposes a knowledge point design that organically integrates marine science knowledge into the course, and combines diverse teaching practices, such as problem-based learning and case analysis, to further enhance the course's innovation and practicality. Teaching practice and testing have found that the teaching methods incorporating marine characteristics significantly improve students' interdisciplinary abilities and enhance their sense of responsibility for environmental protection, providing strong support for cultivating high-quality talents equipped with atmospheric and marine science knowledge.
EN_ZH: 当前海洋环境问题与气候变化的相互作用日益密切，使得培养跨学科复合型人才显得尤为重要。本文以大气化学课程为着眼点，提出了一种融入海洋特色的教学设计与实践模式。通过系统梳理教学目标和现有问题，文章提出了一种知识点设计，将海洋科学知识有机融入课程之中，并结合了多样化的教学实践，如问题导向学习和案例分析等，以进一步提升课程的创新性和实践性。教学实践与测试表明，融入海洋特色的教学方法能够显著提升学生的跨学科能力，增强其环境保护的责任感，为培养掌握大气与海洋科学知识的高素质人才提供了有力支撑。

abstract: 化学实验室是推动科技进步与教育发展的重要引擎。然而，危险化学品的管理问题却是阻碍其发展的关键性因素。文章从研究生视角出发，结合生物化学、分析化学、有机化学实验、分析化学实验等大学课程实践，深入探讨化学实验室中危险化学品的管理现状、存在的问题以及优化策略。通过文献综述、实地调研与案例分析，提出一系列创新且切实可行的管理措施，旨在降低实验室安全风险，提升管理效率，同时确保研究工作的顺利进行。文章不仅关注管理制度的完善，还强调人员培训、技术革新及信息化手段的应用，力求为化学实验室安全管理提供新思路。
ZH_EN: Chemistry laboratories are important engines for promoting scientific and technological progress and educational development. However, the management issues of hazardous chemicals are key factors hindering their development. This article, from the perspective of graduate students and combining practical university courses such as biochemistry, analytical chemistry, organic chemistry experiments, and analytical chemistry experiments, deeply explores the current management situation, existing problems, and optimization strategies for hazardous chemicals in chemistry laboratories. Through literature review, field research, and case analysis, this article proposes a series of innovative and practical management measures aimed at reducing laboratory safety risks, improving management efficiency, and ensuring the smooth progress of research work. The article not only focuses on the improvement of management systems, but also emphasizes personnel training, technological innovation, and the application of information technology, striving to provide new insights for the safety management of chemistry laboratories.
EN_ZH: 化学实验室是推动科学技术进步和教育发展的重要引擎。然而，危险化学品的管理问题是制约其发展的关键因素。本文从研究生的视角出发，结合生物化学、分析化学、有机化学实验和分析化学实验等大学实践课程，深入探讨了化学实验室危险化学品管理的现状、存在的问题和优化策略。通过文献综述、实地调研和案例分析，本文提出了一系列创新且实用的管理措施，旨在降低实验室安全风险，提高管理效率，并确保研究工作的顺利进行。文章不仅关注管理体系的完善，还强调人员培训、技术创新和信息技术的应用，力求为化学实验室的安全管理提供新的见解。

ZH_EN: Chemical laboratories are important engines for promoting scientific and technological progress and educational development. However, the management of hazardous chemicals is a key factor hindering their development. From the perspective of graduate students, and combining university course practices such as biochemistry, analytical chemistry, organic chemistry experiments, and analytical chemistry experiments, this article deeply explores the management status quo, existing problems, and optimization strategies for hazardous chemicals in chemical laboratories. Through literature reviews, field research, and case analysis, the article proposes a series of innovative and practical management measures aimed at reducing laboratory safety risks, improving management efficiency, and ensuring the smooth progress of research work. The article not only focuses on the improvement of management systems, but also emphasizes personnel training, technological innovation, and the application of information technology, striving to provide new ideas for chemical laboratory safety management.
EN_ZH: 化学实验室是促进科技进步和教育发展的重要引擎。然而，危险化学品的管理是制约其发展的关键因素。从研究生角度出发，并结合大学课程实践，如生物化学、分析化学、有机化学实验和分析化学实验等，本文深入探讨了化学实验室中危险化学品管理现状、存在问题及优化策略。通过文献查阅、实地调研和案例分析，本文提出了一系列创新性和实用性的管理措施，旨在降低实验室安全风险、提高管理效率，并确保研究工作的顺利进行。本文不仅关注管理体系的完善，而且还强调人员培训、技术创新和信息技术的应用，力求为化学实验室安全管理提供新思路。

abstract: 化学实验室是推动科技进步与教育发展的重要引擎。然而，危险化学品的管理问题却是阻碍其发展的关键性因素。文章从研究生视角出发，结合生物化学、分析化学、有机化学实验、分析化学实验等大学课程实践，深入探讨化学实验室中危险化学品的管理现状、存在的问题以及优化策略。通过文献综述、实地调研与案例分析，提出一系列创新且切实可行的管理措施，旨在降低实验室安全风险，提升管理效率，同时确保研究工作的顺利进行。文章不仅关注管理制度的完善，还强调人员培训、技术革新及信息化手段的应用，力求为化学实验室安全管理提供新思路。

However, the management of hazardous chemicals is a key factor hindering their development.  From the perspective of graduate students and incorporating practical experiences from university courses such as biochemistry, analytical chemistry, and organic chemistry experiments, this article delves into the current management status, existing problems, and optimization strategies for hazardous chemicals in chemical laboratories.  Through literature reviews, field research, and case studies, it proposes a series of innovative and practical management measures aimed at reducing laboratory safety risks, improving management efficiency, and ensuring the smooth progress of research work. The article not only focuses on improving management systems but also emphasizes personnel training, technological innovation, and the application of information technology, striving to provide new ideas for chemical laboratory safety management.

abstract: 分析化学是理论与实践相结合的一门科学，尤其对实验基本操作细节的规范性要求较高。文章以分析化学实验课程为例，针对分析化学实验课程现状以及教学过程中存在的问题，通过以赛促教的模式对分析化学实验课程进行了改革与创新。在此过程中，同时发挥了教师主导与学生主体的作用，取得了良好的教学效果。
ZH_EN: Analytical chemistry is a science that combines theory and practice, especially requiring high standards for the details of basic experimental operations. Taking the analytical chemistry experiment course as an example, this article addresses the current situation and existing problems in the teaching of analytical chemistry experiment courses. It reformed and innovated the analytical chemistry experiment course through a competition-promoted teaching model. In this process, the roles of teacher guidance and student initiative were simultaneously brought into play, achieving good teaching results.
EN_ZH: 分析化学是一门理论与实践相结合的科学，尤其对基础实验操作的细节要求很高。以分析化学实验课程为例，本文针对分析化学实验课程教学的现状和存在的问题，通过竞赛促教的教学模式，对分析化学实验课程进行了改革与创新。在此过程中，充分发挥了教师指导和学生主动性的作用，取得了良好的教学效果。

abstract: 分析化学是理论与实践相结合的一门科学，尤其对实验基本操作细节的规范性要求较高。文章以分析化学实验课程为例，针对分析化学实验课程现状以及教学过程中存在的问题，通过以赛促教的模式对分析化学实验课程进行了改革与创新。在此过程中，同时发挥了教师主导与学生主体的作用，取得了良好的教学效果。
ZH_EN: Analytical chemistry is a science that combines theory and practice, especially emphasizing the standardized details of basic experimental operations. Taking the analytical chemistry experiment course as an example, this article addresses the current situation and existing problems in the teaching process of analytical chemistry experiments. It reforms and innovates the analytical chemistry experiment course through a competition-driven teaching model. During this process, the roles of teacher guidance and student initiative were simultaneously leveraged, achieving positive teaching outcomes.
EN_ZH: 分析化学是一门理论与实践相结合的科学，尤其注重基础实验操作的规范化细节。本文以分析化学实验课程为例，阐述了目前分析化学实验教学过程中的现状与存在问题，并通过竞赛驱动的教学模式对分析化学实验课程进行改革与创新。在此过程中，教师引导与学生主导作用得到同步发挥，取得了积极的教学效果。

abstract: 分析化学是理论与实践相结合的一门科学，尤其对实验基本操作细节的规范性要求较高。文章以分析化学实验课程为例，针对分析化学实验课程现状以及教学过程中存在的问题，通过以赛促教的模式对分析化学实验课程进行了改革与创新。在此过程中，同时发挥了教师主导与学生主体的作用，取得了良好的教学效果。
ZH_EN: Analytical chemistry is a science that combines theory and practice, especially emphasizing standardized and detailed basic experimental operations. Taking the analytical chemistry experiment course as an example, this article addresses the current situation and problems in the teaching of analytical chemistry experiment courses, and has reformed and innovated the course through a competition-based teaching model. In this process, the leading role of teachers and the principal role of students were simultaneously brought into play, achieving good teaching results.
EN_ZH: 分析化学是一门结合理论与实践的科学，尤其注重标准化和规范化的基本实验操作。以分析化学实验课程为例，本文针对当前分析化学实验课程教学的现状与问题，并通过竞赛式教学模式对课程进行了改革与创新。在此过程中，教师的主导作用和学生的主体作用得到了同步发挥，取得了良好的教学效果。

abstract: 基于高中选科考背景，探讨初高中化学衔接教学的现状与策略。以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，跟踪调研其初三年级至高一年级情况，分析初三、高一化学试题的关联度和典型学生访谈，明确了初高中化学衔接的七大关键知识点。通过六个维度的学情问卷调查，提出不同层次学生的学习策略以及学生反思改进的优先矩阵，为初高中化学有效衔接教学提供实证依据和策略建议。
ZH_EN: Based on the background of high school subject selection exams, this study explores the current situation and strategies of chemistry articulation teaching between junior and senior high school. Using 166 students in City H, Hubei Province as a research sample, it tracked and investigated their situation from Grade 9 to Grade 10. By analyzing the relevance of Grade 9 and Grade 10 chemistry test questions and typical student interviews, it clarified the seven key knowledge points of chemistry articulation between junior and senior high school. Through a questionnaire survey on student learning from six dimensions, it proposed learning strategies for students of different levels and a priority matrix for student reflection and improvement, providing empirical evidence and strategic recommendations for effective chemistry articulation teaching between junior and senior high school.
EN_ZH: 基于高中选科考试的背景，本研究探讨了初高中化学衔接教学的现状与策略。以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，追踪调查了他们从九年级到十年级的情况。通过分析九年级和十年级化学试题的相关性以及典型的学生访谈，明确了初高中化学衔接的七个关键知识点。通过对学生学习六个维度的问卷调查，提出了针对不同水平学生的学习策略，以及学生反思和改进的优先矩阵，为有效的初高中化学衔接教学提供了实证依据和策略建议。

abstract: 基于高中选科考背景，探讨初高中化学衔接教学的现状与策略。以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，跟踪调研其初三年级至高一年级情况，分析初三、高一化学试题的关联度和典型学生访谈，明确了初高中化学衔接的七大关键知识点。通过六个维度的学情问卷调查，提出不同层次学生的学习策略以及学生反思改进的优先矩阵，为初高中化学有效衔接教学提供实证依据和策略建议。
ZH_EN: Based on the background of high school subject selection exams, this study explores the current situation and strategies of chemistry articulation teaching between junior and senior high school. Using 166 students in City H, Hubei Province as a research sample, it tracked and investigated their situation from the third year of junior high school to the first year of senior high school, analyzed the correlation of chemistry test questions from these grades, and conducted typical student interviews, thus clarifying seven key knowledge points for chemistry articulation. Through a learning situation questionnaire survey with six dimensions, the study proposed learning strategies for students at different levels and a priority matrix for student reflection and improvement, providing empirical evidence and strategic recommendations for effective chemistry articulation teaching between junior and senior high school.
EN_ZH: 基于高中选科考试的背景下，本研究探讨了初高中化学衔接教学的现状与策略。以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，对他们的情况进行了从初三到高一的追踪调查，分析了这些年级化学试题的相关性，并进行了典型学生访谈，从而明确了化学衔接的七个关键知识点。通过六维度学习情况问卷调查，本研究为不同水平的学生提出了学习策略，以及学生反思与改进的优先矩阵，为初高中化学有效衔接教学提供实证依据和策略建议。

abstract: 基于高中选科考背景，探讨初高中化学衔接教学的现状与策略。以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，跟踪调研其初三年级至高一年级情况，分析初三、高一化学试题的关联度和典型学生访谈，明确了初高中化学衔接的七大关键知识点。通过六个维度的学情问卷调查，提出不同层次学生的学习策略以及学生反思改进的优先矩阵，为初高中化学有效衔接教学提供实证依据和策略建议。
ZH_EN: Based on the context of high school subject selection exams, this paper explores the current situation and strategies for the articulation of chemistry teaching between junior and senior high schools. Using 166 students in City H, Hubei Province as a research sample, this study tracked and investigated their situation from the third year of junior high school to the first year of senior high school. By analyzing the correlation between chemistry test questions from these two grades and conducting interviews with typical students, the study identified seven key knowledge points for the articulation of chemistry between junior and senior high school.  Through a questionnaire survey on students' learning conditions across six dimensions, the study proposes learning strategies for students at different levels and a priority matrix for student reflection and improvement, aiming to provide empirical evidence and strategic recommendations for effective articulation teaching of chemistry between junior and senior high school.
EN_ZH: 基于高中选科考试的背景，本文探讨了初高中化学教学衔接的现状和策略。本研究以湖北省H市166名学生为研究样本，追踪调查了他们从初三到高一的情况。通过分析初高中化学试题的相关性，并对典型学生进行访谈，本研究确定了初高中化学衔接的七个关键知识点。通过对学生六个维度学习情况的问卷调查，本研究为不同水平的学生提出了学习策略，并为学生反思和改进提出了优先矩阵，旨在为有效衔接初高中化学教学提供实证依据和策略建议。

abstract: <正>作为国民经济的支柱产业,化工行业不仅能够推动社会经济发展,还能够更好地满足人民群众多元化的化工产品需求,为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供了重要的物质支持,也使得人民群众的生活条件得到一定改善。回顾新中国成立以来我国化学工业的发展历程,可以发现马克思主义思想在传入中国、扎根中国的过程中,也逐步渗透到化工领域中,指导着我国化学工业的转型升级、技术革新以及污染整治,对于推动化学工作发展有着重要意义。基于此,本文围绕马克思主义引领下的化学工业发展展开深入探讨,以更好地把握马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值,为新时期建设化工强国打下良好的理论基础。
ZH_EN: As a pillar industry of the national economy, the chemical industry not only promotes social and economic development but also better meets the diverse needs of the people for chemical products, providing important material support for national security, pharmaceutical manufacturing, information technology, and other fields, and also improving the living conditions of the people to a certain extent. Reviewing the development history of China's chemical industry since the founding of New China, it can be found that Marxism, in the process of being introduced to and taking root in China, has gradually penetrated into the chemical field, guiding the transformation and upgrading, technological innovation, and pollution control of China's chemical industry, and is of great significance for promoting the development of chemical work. Based on this, this article conducts an in-depth discussion on the development of the chemical industry under the guidance of Marxism, in order to better grasp the guiding value of the Sinicization of Marxism in social practice, and to lay a solid theoretical foundation for building a strong chemical industry in the new era.
EN_ZH: 作为国民经济的支柱产业，化学工业不仅促进社会经济发展，而且更好地满足人民群众多样化的化工产品需求，为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供重要的物质支撑，并在一定程度上改善了人民的生活条件。回顾新中国成立以来中国化学工业的发展历程，可以发现马克思主义在传入和扎根中国的过程中，逐步渗透到化工领域，指导着中国化学工业的转型升级、技术创新和污染治理，对于推动化工事业的发展具有重要意义。基于此，本文深入探讨马克思主义指导下化学工业的发展，以期更好地把握马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值，并为在新时代建设化工强国奠定坚实的理论基础。

abstract: <正>作为国民经济的支柱产业,化工行业不仅能够推动社会经济发展,还能够更好地满足人民群众多元化的化工产品需求,为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供了重要的物质支持,也使得人民群众的生活条件得到一定改善。回顾新中国成立以来我国化学工业的发展历程,可以发现马克思主义思想在传入中国、扎根中国的过程中,也逐步渗透到化工领域中,指导着我国化学工业的转型升级、技术革新以及污染整治,对于推动化学工作发展有着重要意义。基于此,本文围绕马克思主义引领下的化学工业发展展开深入探讨,以更好地把握马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值,为新时期建设化工强国打下良好的理论基础。
ZH_EN: As a pillar industry of the national economy, the chemical industry not only drives social and economic development but also better meets the diverse demands of the people for chemical products. It provides crucial material support for national security, pharmaceutical manufacturing, information technology, and other fields, and also contributes to improving people's living standards. Looking back at the development of China's chemical industry since the founding of New China, we can see that Marxist thought, in the process of being introduced and taking root in China, has gradually permeated the chemical field. It has guided the transformation and upgrading, technological innovation, and pollution control of China's chemical industry, and is of great significance to promoting the development of chemical work. Therefore, this article will delve into the development of the chemical industry under the guidance of Marxism to better understand the guiding value of the Sinicization of Marxism in social practice and to lay a solid theoretical foundation for building a powerful chemical industry nation in the new era.
EN_ZH: 作为国民经济的支柱产业，化学工业不仅驱动着社会经济发展，也更好地满足了人民群众多样化的化工产品需求。它为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供了关键的物质支撑，也为提高人民生活水平做出了贡献。回顾新中国成立以来中国化学工业的发展历程，我们可以看到，马克思主义思想在中国传入和扎根的过程中，逐渐渗透到化工领域。它指导了中国化学工业的转型升级、技术创新和污染治理，对于推动化工事业发展具有重要意义。因此，本文将深入探讨马克思主义指导下的化学工业发展，以更好地理解马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值，并为新时代建设化工强国奠定坚实的理论基础。

abstract: <正>作为国民经济的支柱产业,化工行业不仅能够推动社会经济发展,还能够更好地满足人民群众多元化的化工产品需求,为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供了重要的物质支持,也使得人民群众的生活条件得到一定改善。回顾新中国成立以来我国化学工业的发展历程,可以发现马克思主义思想在传入中国、扎根中国的过程中,也逐步渗透到化工领域中,指导着我国化学工业的转型升级、技术革新以及污染整治,对于推动化学工作发展有着重要意义。基于此,本文围绕马克思主义引领下的化学工业发展展开深入探讨,以更好地把握马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值,为新时期建设化工强国打下良好的理论基础。
ZH_EN: As the pillar industry of the national economy, the chemical industry not only promotes social and economic development but also better meets the diverse needs of the people for chemical products, providing important material support for fields such as national security, pharmaceutical manufacturing, and information technology, and also enabling the living conditions of the people to be improved to a certain extent. Reviewing the development history of China's chemical industry since the founding of New China, it can be found that Marxist thought, in the process of being introduced to China and taking root in China, has also gradually permeated into the chemical industry, guiding the transformation and upgrading, technological innovation, and pollution control of China's chemical industry, and having important significance for promoting the development of chemical work. Based on this, this article will conduct in-depth discussions on the development of the chemical industry under the guidance of Marxism, in order to better grasp the guiding value of the Sinicization of Marxism in social practice, and lay a good theoretical foundation for building a strong chemical industry country in the new era.
EN_ZH: 作为国民经济的支柱产业，化学工业不仅推动社会经济发展，而且更好地满足人民群众多样化的化工产品需求，为国家安全、医药制造、信息技术等领域提供重要的物质支撑，也在一定程度上改善了人民的生活条件。回顾新中国成立以来中国化学工业的发展历程，可以发现，马克思主义思想在传入中国并在中国扎根的过程中，也逐渐渗透到化学工业中，指导着中国化学工业的转型升级、技术创新和污染治理，对推动化学工作的发展具有重要意义。基于此，本文将深入探讨马克思主义指导下的化学工业发展，以期更好地把握马克思主义中国化在社会实践中的指导价值，为新时代建设化工强国奠定良好的理论基础。

abstract: 围绕学生、成果导向、持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。现阶段课程教学需要根据工程认证的理念进行一步一步的改革。以贵州理工学院化学分析课程为例，基于数学理念对教学方式、理论联系实际对教学素材、雨课堂手段对过程考核等进行了应用探索。合理植入数学知识，把化学知识所蕴含的数学成分与化学教学有机结合，消除学生对学习化学分析的畏惧；根植守正创新的思想，理论联系实际。基于工程认证理念进行课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪，该课程的达成度提升了10%以上，提高了教学效果。
ZH_EN: Student-centered, outcome-based, and continuous improvement are the core concepts of engineering education accreditation. Current course teaching needs to be reformed step-by-step based on the concepts of engineering accreditation. Taking the Chemical Analysis course at Guizhou Institute of Technology as an example, explorations have been conducted on applying mathematical concepts to teaching methods, connecting theory with practice to teaching materials, and using Rain Classroom methods for process assessment, among other aspects. By rationally incorporating mathematical knowledge and organically integrating the mathematical components inherent in chemical knowledge with chemical teaching, students' fear of learning chemical analysis is eliminated; Rooted in the idea of upholding integrity and pursuing innovation, and connecting theory with practice. Based on the concepts of engineering accreditation, course evaluation, continuous improvement, and data tracking were implemented. The course's achievement level has increased by more than 10%, improving teaching effectiveness.
EN_ZH: 以学生为中心、成果导向和持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。当前课程教学需要基于工程教育认证理念逐步改革。以贵州理工学院的《化学分析》课程为例，在将数学概念应用于教学方法、将理论与实践相结合融入教学内容、以及使用雨课堂方法进行过程性评价等方面进行了探索。通过合理融入数学知识，并将化学知识中固有的数学成分有机地融入化学教学，消除了学生对化学分析的学习畏惧感；秉持“坚守正道、追求创新”的理念，并联系理论与实践。基于工程教育认证理念，实施了课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪。课程达成度提升了10%以上，提高了教学效果。

abstract: 围绕学生、成果导向、持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。现阶段课程教学需要根据工程认证的理念进行一步一步的改革。以贵州理工学院化学分析课程为例，基于数学理念对教学方式、理论联系实际对教学素材、雨课堂手段对过程考核等进行了应用探索。合理植入数学知识，把化学知识所蕴含的数学成分与化学教学有机结合，消除学生对学习化学分析的畏惧；根植守正创新的思想，理论联系实际。基于工程认证理念进行课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪，该课程的达成度提升了10%以上，提高了教学效果。
ZH_EN: Student-centered, outcome-oriented, and continuous improvement are the core concepts of engineering education accreditation. Currently, curriculum teaching needs to be reformed step-by-step based on the concepts of engineering accreditation. Taking the Chemical Analysis course at Guizhou Institute of Technology as an example, application explorations have been carried out on teaching methods based on mathematical concepts, teaching materials based on theory linked to practice, and process assessment using Rain Classroom tools. Reasonably incorporating mathematical knowledge, organically combining the mathematical components contained in chemical knowledge with chemical teaching, eliminates students' fear of learning chemical analysis; rooted in the thought of upholding integrity and innovation, theory is linked to practice. Based on the concept of engineering accreditation, course evaluation, continuous improvement, and data tracking were carried out, the achievement level of this course increased by more than 10%, and the teaching effectiveness was improved.
EN_ZH: 以学生为中心、成果导向和持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。当前，课程教学需要基于工程教育认证理念逐步进行改革。以贵州理工学院的《化学分析》课程为例，围绕基于数学概念的教学方法、基于理论联系实际的教材以及使用雨课堂工具的过程性评价等方面进行了应用探索。合理融入数学知识，将化学知识中蕴含的数学成分与化学教学有机结合，消除了学生对学习化学分析的畏惧心理；扎根于坚守正道和创新的思想，理论联系实际。基于工程教育认证理念，进行了课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪，本课程的达成度提高了10%以上，教学效果得到了提升。

abstract: 围绕学生、成果导向、持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。现阶段课程教学需要根据工程认证的理念进行一步一步的改革。以贵州理工学院化学分析课程为例，基于数学理念对教学方式、理论联系实际对教学素材、雨课堂手段对过程考核等进行了应用探索。合理植入数学知识，把化学知识所蕴含的数学成分与化学教学有机结合，消除学生对学习化学分析的畏惧；根植守正创新的思想，理论联系实际。基于工程认证理念进行课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪，该课程的达成度提升了10%以上，提高了教学效果。
ZH_EN: Student-centered, outcome-oriented, and continuous improvement are the core concepts of engineering education accreditation. Currently, course teaching needs to be reformed step-by-step according to the concepts of engineering accreditation. Taking the Chemical Analysis course at Guizhou Institute of Technology as an example, application explorations have been conducted based on mathematical concepts for teaching methods, integrating theory with practice for teaching materials, and utilizing Rain Classroom methods for process assessment, etc. Rationally integrate mathematical knowledge, organically combine the mathematical elements inherent in chemical knowledge with chemical teaching, and eliminate students' fear of learning chemical analysis. Grounded in the principle of preserving the orthodox and innovating, integrate theory with practice. Based on the concepts of engineering accreditation, conducting course evaluation, continuous improvement, and data tracking, the attainment of this course has increased by more than 10%, improving teaching effectiveness.
EN_ZH: 学生中心、成果导向、持续改进是工程教育认证的核心理念。目前，课程教学需要逐步根据工程认证理念进行改革。以贵州理工学院的《化学分析》课程为例，基于数学概念进行了教学方法的应用探索，理论与实践相结合的教学材料，以及利用雨课堂方法进行过程性评价等。合理融入数学知识，有机结合化学知识中固有的数学要素与化学教学，消除学生对化学分析的学习畏惧感。秉持守正创新的原则，理论与实践相结合。基于工程教育认证的理念，进行课程评价、持续改进和数据跟踪，该课程的达成度提高了10%以上，提高了教学有效性。

abstract: 在初中化学教学中,我们可以发挥评价在学困生转化中的育人功能。通过加强过程性评价,减少学困生的出现;深化综合评价,对学困生进行多层次、多维度的评价;重视增值评价,对学困生加强激励教育,实现以评促学,以评促教,为学困生自我发展赋能,促进其达到义务教育化学课程学业质量标准,提升其化学学科核心素养。
ZH_EN: In junior high school chemistry teaching, we can leverage the educational role of evaluation in transforming students with learning difficulties. By strengthening formative evaluation, we can reduce the emergence of students with learning difficulties; deepen comprehensive evaluation to conduct multi-level and multi-dimensional evaluations of students with learning difficulties; emphasize value-added evaluation, strengthen motivational education for students with learning difficulties, to achieve promoting learning and teaching through evaluation, empower students with learning difficulties' self-growth, promote their attainment of the academic quality standards of the compulsory education chemistry curriculum, and enhance their core chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 在初中化学教学中，我们可以发挥评价的教育作用，转化学习困难学生。通过加强形成性评价，我们可以减少学习困难学生的产生；深化综合性评价，对学习困难学生进行多层次、多维度的评价；强调增值性评价，加强对学习困难学生的激励教育，以实现评价促学促教，赋能学习困难学生自主成长，促进其达成义务教育化学课程学业质量标准，提升其化学学科核心素养。

abstract: 在初中化学教学中,我们可以发挥评价在学困生转化中的育人功能。通过加强过程性评价,减少学困生的出现;深化综合评价,对学困生进行多层次、多维度的评价;重视增值评价,对学困生加强激励教育,实现以评促学,以评促教,为学困生自我发展赋能,促进其达到义务教育化学课程学业质量标准,提升其化学学科核心素养。
ZH_EN: In junior high school chemistry teaching, we can leverage the educative function of evaluation to transform struggling students. By strengthening formative assessment, we reduce the occurrence of struggling students; by deepening comprehensive evaluation, we provide multi-level and multi-dimensional evaluations for struggling students; by emphasizing value-added assessment, we enhance motivational education for struggling students. This realizes promoting learning through evaluation, promoting teaching through evaluation, and empowering struggling students' self-development, ultimately helping them meet the academic quality standards of the compulsory education chemistry curriculum and improve their core chemistry competencies.
EN_ZH: 初中化学教学中，我们可以发挥评价的教育功能，转化学困生。通过加强形成性评价，减少学困生的发生；通过深化综合评价，为学困生提供多层次、多维度的评价；通过强调增值性评价，增强对学困生的激励教育。这实现了以评促学、以评促教、赋能学困生自主发展，最终帮助他们达到义务教育化学课程的学业质量标准，提升他们的化学学科核心素养。

abstract: 在初中化学教学中,我们可以发挥评价在学困生转化中的育人功能。通过加强过程性评价,减少学困生的出现;深化综合评价,对学困生进行多层次、多维度的评价;重视增值评价,对学困生加强激励教育,实现以评促学,以评促教,为学困生自我发展赋能,促进其达到义务教育化学课程学业质量标准,提升其化学学科核心素养。
ZH_EN: In junior high school chemistry teaching, we can leverage the educational function of evaluation in the transformation of struggling students. By strengthening formative assessment, we can reduce the occurrence of struggling students; by deepening comprehensive evaluation, we conduct multi-level and multi-dimensional assessments of struggling students; by emphasizing value-added assessment, we enhance motivational education for struggling students, achieving assessment-driven learning and teaching, empowering struggling students for self-development, promoting their attainment of the academic quality standards for the compulsory education chemistry curriculum, and improving their core competencies in chemistry.
EN_ZH: 初中化学教学中，我们可以发挥评价的教育功能，在转化学困生方面发挥作用。通过加强形成性评价，我们可以减少学困生的发生；通过深化综合评价，我们对学困生进行多层次、多维度的评价；通过强调增值性评价，我们加强对学困生的激励教育，实现评价驱动的教与学，赋能学困生自主发展，促进其达成义务教育化学课程学业质量标准，提升其化学学科核心素养。

abstract: <正>1 “玩转520化学桌游”资源利用与课程目标的设定1.1 资源利用：游戏教具与配套资源“玩转520化学桌游”是由钱扬义等自主开发的一套破解初中化学用语学习难题的教学用具，狭义指其中的5副牌(元素牌、物质牌、反应牌、实验牌、科学家牌)、1对骰子(阴离子骰子和阳离子骰子)、1副飞行棋(化合物飞行棋)等3类教具，6款游戏规则，以及配套的学生手册与教师用书，囊括初中化学22种元素符号、
ZH_EN:
Main Text
1 Resource Utilization and Curriculum Goal Setting of "Play Chemistry 520 Board Game"
1.1 Resource Utilization: Game Teaching Aids and Supporting Resources
"Play Chemistry 520 Board Game" is a set of teaching tools independently developed by Qian Yangyi and others to solve the learning difficulties of junior high school chemistry terminology, narrowly referring to the 5 decks of cards within it (element cards, substance cards, reaction cards, experiment cards, scientist cards), 1 pair of dice (anion dice and cation dice), 1 set of Ludo (compound Ludo) and other 3 types of teaching aids, 6 game rules, as well as supporting student manuals and teacher's books, encompassing 22 element symbols of junior high school chemistry.

ZH_EN:
Main
1. Resource Utilization and Curriculum Goal Setting of "Master 520 Chemistry Board Game"
1.1 Resource Utilization: Game Teaching Aids and Supporting Resources
"Master 520 Chemistry Board Game" is a set of teaching tools independently developed by Qian Yangyi and others to solve the learning difficulties of junior high school chemistry terminology. Narrowly defined, it refers to the 5 decks of cards (element cards, substance cards, reaction cards, experiment cards, scientist cards), 1 pair of dice (anion dice and cation dice), 1 set of Ludo (compound Ludo) and other 3 types of teaching aids, 6 game rules, as well as supporting student manuals and teacher's books, covering 22 element symbols of junior high school chemistry.
EN_ZH:
主
1. 《化学520大师棋盘游戏》的资源利用与课程目标设定
1.1 资源利用：游戏教具与配套资源
“化学520大师棋盘游戏”是由钱阳毅等人自主研发的一套教学工具，旨在解决初中化学术语的学习难点。狭义上讲，它指的是5副纸牌（元素卡、物质卡、反应卡、实验卡、科学家卡），1对骰子（阴离子骰子和阳离子骰子），1套飞行棋（化合物飞行棋）和其他3类教具，6条游戏规则，以及配套的学生手册和教师用书，涵盖初中化学的22个元素符号。

abstract: <正>1 “玩转520化学桌游”资源利用与课程目标的设定1.1 资源利用：游戏教具与配套资源“玩转520化学桌游”是由钱扬义等自主开发的一套破解初中化学用语学习难题的教学用具，狭义指其中的5副牌(元素牌、物质牌、反应牌、实验牌、科学家牌)、1对骰子(阴离子骰子和阳离子骰子)、1副飞行棋(化合物飞行棋)等3类教具，6款游戏规则，以及配套的学生手册与教师用书，囊括初中化学22种元素符号、
ZH_EN:
Main Text 1 "Play 520 Chemistry Tabletop Game" Resource Utilization and Curriculum Objective Setting
1.1 Resource Utilization: Game Teaching Aids and Supporting Resources
"Play 520 Chemistry Tabletop Game" is a set of teaching tools independently developed by Qian Yangyi and others to solve the learning difficulties of junior high school chemistry terminology. Specifically, it refers to three types of teaching tools among them: 5 decks of cards (element cards, substance cards, reaction cards, experiment cards, scientist cards), 1 pair of dice (anion dice and cation dice), and 1 set of flying chess (compound flying chess), 6 game rules, as well as supporting student manuals and teacher's books, encompassing 22 element symbols of junior high school chemistry.
EN_ZH:
主文本 1 “玩转520化学桌面游戏” 资源利用与课程目标设定
1.1 资源利用：游戏教具与配套资源
“玩转520化学桌面游戏”是由钱扬义等人自主研发的一套教学工具，旨在解决初中化学术语的学习难点。具体来说，它指的是其中的三种教学工具：5副卡牌（元素卡、物质卡、反应卡、实验卡、科学家卡），1对骰子（阴离子骰子和阳离子骰子），和1套飞行棋（化合物飞行棋），6个游戏规则，以及配套的学生手册和教师用书，涵盖初中化学的22个元素符号。

abstract: 随着新课程改革持续深化，高中化学与生物学课程的交叉融合教学已成为提高学生综合素质的重要途径，在日常教学过程中，教师应进一步提升对交叉融合教学策略的重视程度，从而帮助学生对相关知识形成更为深入地理解。基于此，本文以“生命活动的主要承担者——蛋白质”为例，探讨高中化学在生物学课堂中的交叉融合教学策略，以期增强学生的科学素养和创新能力。
ZH_EN: With the continuous deepening of the new curriculum reform, the interdisciplinary integrated teaching of high school chemistry and biology courses has become an important way to improve students' comprehensive quality. In daily teaching practice, teachers should further emphasize the importance of interdisciplinary integrated teaching strategies to help students develop a deeper understanding of related knowledge. Based on this, this paper takes "proteins – the primary actors in life activities" as an example to explore interdisciplinary teaching strategies of high school chemistry in biology classes, aiming to enhance students' scientific literacy and innovation ability.
EN_ZH: 随着新课程改革的不断深入，高中化学与生物学科的跨学科融合教学已成为提高学生综合素质的重要途径。在日常教学实践中，教师应进一步强调跨学科融合教学策略的重要性，以帮助学生更深入地理解相关知识。基于此，本文以“蛋白质——生命活动的主要承担者”为例，探讨高中化学在生物课堂中的跨学科教学策略，旨在提升学生的科学素养和创新能力。

abstract: 随着新课程改革持续深化，高中化学与生物学课程的交叉融合教学已成为提高学生综合素质的重要途径，在日常教学过程中，教师应进一步提升对交叉融合教学策略的重视程度，从而帮助学生对相关知识形成更为深入地理解。基于此，本文以“生命活动的主要承担者——蛋白质”为例，探讨高中化学在生物学课堂中的交叉融合教学策略，以期增强学生的科学素养和创新能力。
ZH_EN: As the new curriculum reform continues to deepen, the interdisciplinary integrated teaching of high school chemistry and biology courses has become an important approach to improve students' comprehensive quality. In daily teaching, teachers should further emphasize interdisciplinary integrated teaching strategies to help students develop a deeper understanding of relevant knowledge. Based on this, this article takes "proteins - the main agents of life activities" as an example to explore interdisciplinary integrated teaching strategies of high school chemistry in biology classrooms, aiming to enhance students' scientific literacy and innovative ability.
EN_ZH: 随着新课程改革的不断深入，高中化学与生物学科的跨学科融合教学已成为提升学生综合素质的重要途径。在日常教学中，教师应进一步强调跨学科融合教学策略，以帮助学生培养对相关知识的更深层次理解。基于此，本文以“蛋白质——生命活动的主要承担者”为例，探讨高中化学在生物课堂中的跨学科融合教学策略，旨在提升学生的科学素养和创新能力。

abstract: 随着新课程改革持续深化，高中化学与生物学课程的交叉融合教学已成为提高学生综合素质的重要途径，在日常教学过程中，教师应进一步提升对交叉融合教学策略的重视程度，从而帮助学生对相关知识形成更为深入地理解。基于此，本文以“生命活动的主要承担者——蛋白质”为例，探讨高中化学在生物学课堂中的交叉融合教学策略，以期增强学生的科学素养和创新能力。
ZH_EN: With the continuous deepening of new curriculum reform, interdisciplinary integrated teaching of high school chemistry and biology curricula has become an important approach to improve students' comprehensive quality. In daily teaching, teachers should further emphasize the importance of interdisciplinary integrated teaching strategies to help students develop a deeper understanding of relevant knowledge. Based on this, this paper takes "proteins – the primary actors in life activities" as an example to explore interdisciplinary integrated teaching strategies for high school chemistry in biology classrooms, with the aim of enhancing students' scientific literacy and innovative abilities.
EN_ZH: 随着新课程改革的不断深入，高中化学与生物课程的跨学科融合教学已成为提升学生综合素质的一种重要途径。在日常教学中，教师应进一步强调跨学科融合教学策略的重要性，以帮助学生发展对相关知识的更深理解。基于此，本文以“蛋白质——生命活动的主要承担者”为例，探讨在生物课堂中高中化学跨学科融合教学策略，旨在提升学生的科学素养和创新能力。

abstract: 随着互联网技术在各个领域的广泛普及，其在推动各行各业的发展中发挥着愈发重要的作用。“互联网+”成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其运用在教育领域中，也能有效推动我国现代化教育事业的不断创新发展。通过网络信息平台的灵活运用，可以有效实现教学模式的创新，教学内容的拓展，为打造高效课堂提供有益助力。本文以初中化学如何通过“互联网+”打造高效课堂为例，结合鲁教版初中化学教材，展开策略性探讨。
ZH_EN: With the widespread adoption of internet technology in various fields, it is playing an increasingly important role in promoting the development of all sectors and industries. "Internet Plus" has become a common development model, and applying it to the field of education can also effectively promote the continuous innovation and development of China's modern education. Through the flexible application of network information platforms, it can effectively achieve innovation in teaching models and expansion of teaching content, providing beneficial assistance for creating efficient classrooms. This article takes middle school chemistry as an example to discuss how to create efficient classrooms through "Internet Plus," and combines the Lu Education Edition middle school chemistry textbook to conduct a strategic discussion.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网技术在各领域的广泛应用，互联网在促进各行各业发展中发挥着越来越重要的作用。“互联网+”已成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其应用于教育领域，也能有效促进中国现代教育的持续创新与发展。通过网络信息平台的灵活应用，可以有效实现教学模式的创新和教学内容的拓展，为创建高效课堂提供有益的帮助。本文以中学化学为例，探讨如何通过“互联网+”创建高效课堂，并结合鲁教版中学化学教材进行策略探讨。

abstract: 随着互联网技术在各个领域的广泛普及，其在推动各行各业的发展中发挥着愈发重要的作用。“互联网+”成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其运用在教育领域中，也能有效推动我国现代化教育事业的不断创新发展。通过网络信息平台的灵活运用，可以有效实现教学模式的创新，教学内容的拓展，为打造高效课堂提供有益助力。本文以初中化学如何通过“互联网+”打造高效课堂为例，结合鲁教版初中化学教材，展开策略性探讨。
ZH_EN: With the widespread application of internet technology in various fields, it is playing an increasingly important role in promoting the development of all sectors of society. "Internet Plus" has become a prevalent development model, and applying it in the field of education can also effectively promote the continuous innovative development of China's modernization of education. Through the flexible application of online information platforms, we can effectively achieve innovation in teaching models and expansion of teaching content, providing beneficial assistance for creating efficient classrooms. This article takes junior high school chemistry as an example of how to create efficient classrooms through "Internet Plus," and in conjunction with the Lu Education Edition junior high school chemistry textbook, conducts a strategic discussion.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网技术在各个领域的广泛应用，它在促进社会各行各业发展方面正在发挥着越来越重要的作用。“互联网+”已成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其应用于教育领域，也可以有效促进中国教育现代化持续创新发展。通过在线信息平台的灵活应用，能够有效实现教学模式的创新和教学内容的拓展，为创建高效课堂提供有益的助力。本文以初中化学为例，探讨如何通过“互联网+”创建高效课堂，并结合鲁教版初中化学教材，进行策略探讨。

abstract: 随着互联网技术在各个领域的广泛普及，其在推动各行各业的发展中发挥着愈发重要的作用。“互联网+”成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其运用在教育领域中，也能有效推动我国现代化教育事业的不断创新发展。通过网络信息平台的灵活运用，可以有效实现教学模式的创新，教学内容的拓展，为打造高效课堂提供有益助力。本文以初中化学如何通过“互联网+”打造高效课堂为例，结合鲁教版初中化学教材，展开策略性探讨。
ZH_EN: With the widespread adoption of internet technology in various fields, it is playing an increasingly important role in promoting the development of all industries and sectors. "Internet Plus" has become a common development model, and applying it to the field of education can also effectively promote the continuous innovation and development of China's modern education. Through the flexible application of network information platforms, innovation in teaching models and the expansion of teaching content can be effectively achieved, providing beneficial assistance for creating efficient classrooms. This article takes junior high school chemistry as an example to explore how to create efficient classrooms through "Internet Plus," and, in conjunction with the Shandong Education Edition junior high school chemistry textbook, undertakes a strategic exploration.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网技术在各领域的广泛应用，其在促进各行各业的发展中正发挥着日益重要的作用。“互联网+”已成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其应用于教育领域，也能有效促进中国现代教育的持续创新与发展。通过灵活应用网络信息平台，可以有效实现教学模式的创新和教学内容的拓展，为创建高效课堂提供有益的帮助。本文以初中化学为例，探讨如何通过“互联网+”创建高效课堂，并结合山东教育版初中化学教材，进行策略性探究。

abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: Medical Biochemistry course, as a foundational course for medical majors, aims to guide students to explore and master the laws of chemical changes in organisms and the mechanisms of the occurrence and development of human diseases, laying a solid foundation for students to study specialized courses such as Stomatology and Pharmacy. In the traditional teaching model, the Medical Biochemistry course focuses on teaching professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills, neglecting the cultivation of students' medical professionalism and medical ethics. Therefore, the Medical Biochemistry course needs to actively respond to the call for curriculum-based ideological and political education reform, effectively promoting the organic integration of medical professional education and ideological and political education, emphasizing the cultivation of students' ideological and moral character, so as to cultivate their correct professional outlook and values.
EN_ZH: 医学生物化学课程，作为医学专业的基础课程，旨在引导学生探索和掌握生物体内化学变化的规律和人类疾病发生发展的机制，为学生学习口腔医学、药学等专业课程奠定坚实的基础。在传统的教学模式中，《医学生物化学》课程侧重于教授专业知识和相关的生物化学实验技能，忽视了对学生医学专业精神和医学伦理的培养。因此，《医学生物化学》课程需要积极响应课程思政改革的号召，有效推动医学专业教育与思想政治教育的有机融合，强调学生思想道德品质的培养，从而培养其正确的职业观和价值观。

abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: The Medical Biochemistry course, as a foundational course for medical majors, aims to guide students to explore and master the rules of chemical changes in living organisms and the mechanisms of the occurrence and development of human diseases, laying a solid foundation for students to study professional courses such as stomatology and pharmacy. In the traditional teaching model, the Medical Biochemistry course primarily focuses on professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills in its teaching work, neglecting the cultivation of students' medical professionalism and medical ethics. Therefore, the Medical Biochemistry course needs to actively respond to the call for curriculum-based ideological and political education reform, effectively promote the organic integration of medical professional education and ideological and political education, emphasize the cultivation of students' ideological and moral character, so that they establish correct professional and values.
EN_ZH: 医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程，旨在引导学生探索和掌握生物体内化学变化的规律和人类疾病发生和发展的机制，为学生学习口腔医学、药学等专业课程奠定坚实的基础。在传统的教学模式中，医学生物化学课程在其教学工作中主要侧重于专业知识和相关的生物化学实验技能，忽视了学生医学专业精神和医德的培养。因此，医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教育改革的号召，有效推进医学专业教育与思想政治教育的有机融合，重视学生思想道德品质的培养，使其树立正确的职业观和价值观。

abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: The Medical Biochemistry course, as a foundational course for medical majors, aims to guide students to explore and master the rules of chemical changes in organisms and the mechanisms of the occurrence and development of human diseases, laying a solid foundation for students to undertake the study of professional courses such as stomatology and pharmacy. Under the traditional teaching model, the Medical Biochemistry course focuses on professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills in its teaching work, neglecting the cultivation and nurturing of students' medical professionalism and medical ethics. Therefore, the Medical Biochemistry course needs to actively respond to the call for curriculum ideological and political education reform, effectively promote the organic integration of medical professional education and ideological and political education, emphasize the cultivation of students' ideological and moral character, so as to enable them to establish correct professional views and values.
EN_ZH: 医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程，旨在引导学生探索和掌握生物体内化学变化的规律和人类疾病发生发展的机制，为学生进行口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实的基础。在传统的教学模式下，医学生物化学课程在其教学工作中侧重于专业知识和相关的生物化学实验技能，忽视了对学生医学职业素养和医德的培养和塑造。因此，医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教育改革的号召，有效地推动医学专业教育和思想政治教育的有机融合，强调培养学生的思想道德品质，以便他们能够树立正确的职业观和价值观。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: The field of chemical engineering is broad in scope, and the entire process is complex, involving many calculation stages. Calculations in chemical engineering are often related to solving problems such as curve fitting, nonlinear equations, partial differential equations, and linear or nonlinear programming. These calculations are extremely difficult, making accurate and efficient manual calculation challenging. However, with the aid of computer-assisted programming to perform quantitative calculations, the practical application of chemical calculation amounts can be achieved to improve quality and efficiency, which holds extremely high application value and real-world significance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程领域范围广泛，整个过程复杂，涉及许多计算环节。化学工程中的计算常常与解决诸如曲线拟合、非线性方程、偏微分方程以及线性或非线性规划等问题有关。这些计算极其困难，使得准确且高效的手动计算充满挑战。然而，借助计算机辅助编程进行定量计算，化学计算量的实际应用得以实现，从而提高质量和效率，这具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: Main Text: Chemical engineering has a broad scope and complex processes, involving numerous calculation steps. Calculations in chemical engineering are often related to solving curve fitting nonlinear equations, partial differential equations, and linear or nonlinear programming. These calculations are extremely difficult and hard to perform accurately and quickly by hand alone. However, with computer-aided programming for quantitative calculations, the quality and efficiency of chemical dosage calculations can be practically improved, which has extremely high application value and practical significance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程涉及领域广泛，工艺流程复杂，包含大量的计算步骤。化学工程中的计算常常涉及求解曲线拟合非线性方程、偏微分方程以及线性或非线性规划。这些计算极其困难，单靠手工难以准确快速地完成。然而，借助计算机辅助编程进行定量计算，化学计量计算的质量和效率可以得到实际提高，这具有极高的应用价值和实践意义。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: The field of chemical engineering is broad in scope, and the entire process is complex, involving numerous calculation steps. Chemical engineering calculations are mostly related to solving problems such as curve fitting nonlinear equations, partial differential equations, and linear or nonlinear programming. These calculations are extremely difficult, and it is hard to achieve precise and efficient calculations by manual means alone. However, with the aid of computer-assisted programming, performing quantitative calculations can practically improve the quality and efficiency of chemical dosage calculations, and it has extremely high application value and practical significance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程领域范围广泛，并且整个过程复杂，涉及众多计算步骤。化学工程计算主要涉及解决诸如非线性方程曲线拟合、偏微分方程以及线性或非线性规划等问题。这些计算极其困难，并且仅靠人工手段难以实现精确且高效的计算。然而，借助计算机辅助编程，进行定量计算能够有效提高化学计量计算的质量和效率，并且具有极高的应用价值和实践意义。

abstract: <正>2024年10月7日,湖北能特科技股份有限公司公告,该公司于2024年9月30日召开第七届董事会第二十二次会议,审议通过《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目的议案》,同意公司之全资子公司能特科技有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目。该项目建设地点在湖北荆州开发区,项目建设期为自项目批准后不超过15个月。项目全部建设完成并达产后,每年新增30%～100%化学法回收聚酯系列产品共计100 kt。
ZH_EN: October 7, 2024, Hubei Nengte Technology Co., Ltd. announced that the company held the 22nd meeting of the 7th Board of Directors on September 30, 2024, and reviewed and approved the "Proposal on the Investment of 100 kt/a Chemical Recycling Polyester Project by Wholly-owned Subsidiary Nengte Technology Co., Ltd.", agreeing that the company's wholly-owned subsidiary, Nengte Technology Co., Ltd., would invest 350 million RMB of self-raised funds in the 100 kt/a chemical recycling polyester project. The project construction site is located in Jingzhou Development Zone, Hubei, and the project construction period is no more than 15 months after project approval. Once the project is fully completed and reaches production capacity, it will annually add 100 kt of chemically recycled polyester series products with recycled content ranging from 30% to 100%.
EN_ZH: 2024年10月7日，湖北能特科技股份有限公司发布公告称，公司于2024年9月30日召开了第七届董事会第二十二次会议，并审议通过了《关于全资子公司能特科技股份有限公司投资建设年产10万吨/化学法再生聚酯项目的议案》，同意公司全资子公司能特科技股份有限公司拟以自筹资金投资3.5亿元人民币建设年产10万吨/化学法再生聚酯项目。项目建设地点位于湖北省荆州开发区，项目建设周期为项目核准后不超过15个月。项目全部建成达产后，预计每年将新增化学法再生聚酯系列产品10万吨，其中再生含量为30%至100%。
