abstract: <正>在立德树人的教育根本宗旨下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘与利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业要对学生开展党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根于学生心田，使他们能够从中汲取精神营养，从而获得良好的思想品质、树立正确的价值观念。
ZH_EN: Under the fundamental educational goal of fostering virtue and cultivating people, the state strongly supports universities to fully explore and utilize red culture resources, in order to cultivate socialist successors who are comprehensively developed in moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetic, and labor aspects. University chemistry majors should carry out Party history education activities for students, cultivate their red culture consciousness, let red culture take root in students' hearts, so that they can draw spiritual nourishment from it, thereby obtaining good ideological qualities and establishing correct values.
EN_ZH: 在立德树人的根本教育目标下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘和利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人。高校化学专业应面向学生开展党史学习教育活动，培养其红色文化意识，让红色文化在学生心中扎根，使之从中汲取精神滋养，从而获得良好的思想品德，树立正确价值观。

abstract: <正>在立德树人的教育根本宗旨下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘与利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业要对学生开展党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根于学生心田，使他们能够从中汲取精神营养，从而获得良好的思想品质、树立正确的价值观念。
ZH_EN: Under the fundamental educational purpose of fostering virtue and cultivating people, the state strongly supports universities in fully exploring and utilizing red culture resources to cultivate socialist successors who are comprehensively developed in moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetic, and labor aspects. University chemistry majors should carry out Party history education activities for students to cultivate their red culture awareness, to let red culture take root in students' hearts, so that they can draw spiritual nourishment from it, thereby obtaining good ideological qualities and establishing correct values.
EN_ZH: 在立德树人的根本教育目的下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘和利用红色文化资源，培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人。高校化学专业应该为学生开展党史学习教育活动，培养学生的红色文化意识，使红色文化在学生心中扎根，使其从中汲取精神滋养，从而获得良好的思想品德，树立正确价值观。

abstract: <正>在立德树人的教育根本宗旨下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘与利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业要对学生开展党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根于学生心田，使他们能够从中汲取精神营养，从而获得良好的思想品质、树立正确的价值观念。
ZH_EN: <正>Under the fundamental educational goal of moral education and talent cultivation, the nation strongly supports universities and colleges to fully explore and utilize red cultural resources, to cultivate socialist successors with all-round development in moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetic, and labor education. University chemistry programs should carry out Party history education activities for students, cultivate their red cultural awareness, let red culture take root in students' hearts and minds, so that they can draw spiritual nourishment from it, thereby gaining sound ideological character and establishing correct values.
EN_ZH: <正>在立德树人的根本教育目标下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘和利用红色文化资源，培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人。高校化学专业应开展为学生的党史教育活动，培养其红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根在学生心中，使其从中汲取精神滋养，从而获得健全的思想品格，树立正确价值观。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: In order to further improve the teaching quality of high school chemistry classes, some instructors are gradually starting to enrich the teaching system of this course, exploring the application effect of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, striving to bring students a richer learning experience. The book "High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies Based on Literacy in Real Contexts" mainly discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms, and details the benefits of situational teaching methods applied to the teaching activities of this course. In traditional high school chemistry classrooms, instructors usually adopt a didactic teaching model to complete the course teaching activities, in face-to-face teaching, explain the relevant chemical knowledge content to students. Although the implementation of this teaching model can effectively deepen students' familiarity with knowledge, it is not conducive to improving students' interest in learning. In order to further increase the frequency of interaction between students and instructors in the classroom, instructors need to innovate the current teaching system, build a multi-level teaching model, jointly use various teaching methods to optimize the current teaching methods, increase the fun of the classroom, and improve students' learning desire.
EN_ZH: 为了进一步提高高中化学课堂的教学质量，一些教师正逐步开始丰富本课程的教学体系，探索多样化教学方法在课堂中的应用效果，力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《基于真实情境下素养的高中化学教学策略》这本书主要探讨了各种教学方法在高中化学课堂中的应用效果，并详细阐述了情境教学法在本课程教学活动中的应用优势。在传统高中化学课堂中，教师通常采用讲授式教学模式来完成课程教学活动，在面对面教学中，向学生讲解相关的化学知识内容。虽然这种教学模式的实施能够有效加深学生对知识的熟悉程度，但不利于提高学生的学习兴趣。为了进一步增加课堂上学生与教师之间的互动频率，教师需要创新当前的教学体系，构建多层次教学模式，共同运用多种教学方法来优化当前的教学方法，增加课堂的趣味性，并提高学生的学习欲望。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: To further enhance the teaching quality of high school chemistry classes, some instructors have gradually started to enrich the teaching system of this course, exploring the effectiveness of diverse teaching methods in classroom application, aiming to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book titled "High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies Based on Literacy in Real-Life Contexts" mainly discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms and details the benefits of applying the situational teaching method in the teaching activities of this course. In traditional high school chemistry teaching classes, instructors typically employ a didactic teaching model to conduct the course instruction, explaining relevant chemistry knowledge to students in face-to-face teaching. While the implementation of this teaching model can effectively deepen students' familiarity with the knowledge, it is not conducive to enhancing students' learning interest. To further increase student-instructor interaction in the classroom, instructors need to reform the current teaching system, build a multi-layered teaching model, jointly utilize various teaching approaches to optimize current teaching methods, enhance classroom engagement, and boost students' learning motivation.
EN_ZH: 为了进一步提升高中化学课堂的教学质量，一些教师已经逐步开始丰富这门课程的教学体系，探索多样化教学方法在课堂应用中的有效性，旨在为学生提供更为丰富的学习体验。名为《基于生活情境素养的高中化学教学策略》的书籍主要探讨了多种教学方法在高中化学课堂中的应用效果，并详细阐述了情境教学法在这门课程教学活动中的应用益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂中，教师通常采用讲授式教学模式来进行课程讲授，面对面地向学生讲解相关化学知识。虽然这种教学模式的实施能够有效加深学生对知识的熟悉程度，但不利于提升学生的学习兴趣。为了进一步增加师生在课堂上的互动，教师需要改革当前的教学体系，构建多层次教学模式，共同利用多种教学方法，以优化当前的教学方法，提升课堂参与度，并激发学生的学习动力。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: In order to further improve the teaching quality of high school chemistry classrooms, some instructors have gradually begun to enrich the teaching system of this course, explore the application effect of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, and strive to bring students a richer learning experience. The book "Literacy-Based High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies in Real-World Contexts" mainly discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry teaching classrooms and details the benefits of contextual teaching methods applied to the teaching activities of this course. In traditional high school chemistry classrooms, instructors usually adopt a lecture-based teaching model to complete teaching activities, explaining relevant chemistry knowledge to students in face-to-face teaching. While this teaching model can effectively deepen students' familiarity with knowledge, it is not conducive to enhancing their learning interest. To further increase the frequency of interaction between students and instructors in the classroom, instructors need to innovate the current teaching system, construct a multi-level teaching model, and jointly use various teaching methods to optimize current teaching approaches, increase classroom engagement, and improve students' learning motivation.
EN_ZH: 为了进一步提升高中化学课堂的教学质量，一些教师逐渐开始丰富这门课程的教学体系，探索多样化教学方法在课堂中的应用效果，并力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《基于素养的真实情境高中化学教学策略》一书主要探讨了各种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的应用效果，并详细阐述了情境教学法应用于该课程教学活动的益处。在传统高中化学课堂中，教师通常采用讲授式教学模式来完成教学活动，面对面地向学生讲解相关的化学知识。虽然这种教学模式能够有效加深学生对知识的熟悉程度，但不利于提升他们的学习兴趣。为了进一步增加课堂上学生与教师之间的互动频率，教师需要创新当前的教学体系，构建多层次的教学模式，并共同运用多种教学方法来优化当前的教学方法，增加课堂参与度，以及提高学生的学习动机。

abstract: <正>近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业快速发展，关键技术不断突破，产品品种日益丰富，正在进入新质发展的新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，2024年中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会年会在安徽合肥召开。会议介绍了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展，针对企业普遍存在的问题探讨解决办法，并对下一步发展提出了规划和方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书处杨菲菲介绍了产业发展情况、分会2024开展的工作以及未来计划。
ZH_EN: In recent years, the bio-based chemical fiber and raw material industry has developed rapidly, key technologies have continuously broken through, product varieties have become increasingly abundant, and it is entering a new track of high-quality development. In this context, on September 25th, the 2024 Annual Meeting of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Material Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Industry Association was held in Hefei, Anhui. The meeting introduced the development of bio-based chemical fibers and raw materials in China in 2024, discussed solutions to common problems existing in enterprises, and proposed plans and directions for the next step of development. Yang Feifei from the Secretariat of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Material Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Industry Association introduced the industry development situation, the work carried out by the branch in 2024, and future plans.
EN_ZH: 近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料工业快速发展，关键技术不断突破，产品品种日益丰富，正迈入高质量发展的新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会2024年度会议在安徽合肥召开。会议介绍了我国生物基化学纤维及原料2024年发展情况，探讨企业存在的共性问题解决方案，并提出下一步发展思路和方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书处杨飞飞介绍了行业发展形势、分会2024年开展的工作及未来计划。

ZH_EN: In recent years, the bio-based chemical fiber and raw material industry has experienced rapid development, with continuous breakthroughs in key technologies and increasingly diverse product varieties, entering a new stage of high-quality development. Against this backdrop, the 2024 Annual Meeting of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Material Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Industry Association was held in Hefei, Anhui on September 25th. The meeting presented the development of bio-based chemical fibers and raw materials in China in 2024, discussed solutions to common problems faced by enterprises, and outlined plans and directions for future development. Yang Feifei from the Secretariat of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Material Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Industry Association presented the industry development status, the branch's work in 2024, and future plans.

Yang Feifei from the Secretariat of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Material Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Industry Association introduced the industry development situation, the work carried out by the branch in 2024, and future plans.

abstract: <正>在新时代的背景下，教育不仅是知识的传递，更是价值观的塑造和传播。随着“思政课”概念的不断深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的一个重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例》一书探讨了有机化学与思政教育相结合的创新路径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业素养，还能培养他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现全方位人才培养的目标。
ZH_EN: In the context of the new era, education is not only the transmission of knowledge, but also the shaping and dissemination of values. As the concept of "ideological and political course" becomes increasingly popular, integrating ideological and political education into professional courses has become a significant direction in teaching reform. The book "Cases of Ideological and Political Education in Organic Chemistry Course" explores innovative approaches to integrating organic chemistry with ideological and political education, which not only helps to enhance students' professional competence, but also fosters their sense of social responsibility and historical mission, thereby achieving the goal of cultivating well-rounded talents.
EN_ZH: 新时代背景下，教育不仅仅是知识的传授，更是价值观的塑造与传播。随着“课程思政”理念日益深入人心，将思政教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例集》探索了将有机化学与思政教育相融合的创新途径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业能力，更培养了他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现培养全面发展人才的目标。

abstract: <正>在新时代的背景下，教育不仅是知识的传递，更是价值观的塑造和传播。随着“思政课”概念的不断深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的一个重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例》一书探讨了有机化学与思政教育相结合的创新路径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业素养，还能培养他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现全方位人才培养的目标。
ZH_EN: In the context of the new era, education is not only the transmission of knowledge but also the cultivation and dissemination of values.  With the increasing prominence of the "Ideological and Political Education class" concept, integrating ideological and political education into professional courses has become a significant direction for teaching reform. "Case Studies of Ideological and Political Education in Organic Chemistry Course" explores innovative approaches to integrating ideological and political education with organic chemistry, aiming to not only enhance students' professional competence but also cultivate their social responsibility and sense of historical mission, thereby achieving the goal of holistic talent development.
EN_ZH: 新时代背景下，教育不仅仅是知识的传授，更是价值观的塑造与传播。随着“思政课”理念的日益凸显，将思政教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例研究》探索了将思政教育与有机化学相融合的创新途径，旨在不仅提升学生的专业能力，更培养其社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现人才全面培养的目标。

As the concept of "Ideological and Political Education Class" continues to gain popularity, integrating ideological and political education into professional courses has become an important direction for teaching reform. The book "Cases of Ideological and Political Education in Organic Chemistry Course" explores innovative approaches to combining organic chemistry and ideological and political education, which not only helps to improve students' professional competence but also cultivates their social responsibility and historical mission, thereby achieving the goal of holistic talent development.

abstract: <正>足球是世界上第一大运动，足球运动员的体能素质直接影响到训练成效和比赛结果，而且在运动过程中，运动员的体能消耗非常大，须采用合适的手段提升足球运动员的体能素质。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，科研人员发现采用科学、有效的营养措施，能够很好地提升足球运动员的体能素质，提高其训练效率和比赛成绩。一、足球运动及其供能特点（一）足球运动足球是一项技能主导类同场竞技性运动，在场上需要运动员之间的密切配合，运动时间长、体力消耗也比较大。其主要有以下几个特点：1.耐力性。足球比赛时长为90 min，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。2.灵敏性。运动员要根据赛场上的情况作出适当的调整，比如攻防转换、守门员扑救等，所以需要拥有较强的观察能力和位移能力。3.爆发性。要想突破对手、抢断球以及射门，往往需要运动员拥有足够强的爆发力。
ZH_EN:
Football is the world's number one sport. The physical fitness of football players directly affects training effectiveness and match results. Moreover, during exercise, the physical exertion of athletes is very high, and appropriate measures must be taken to improve the physical fitness of football players. With the development of exercise biochemistry, researchers have discovered that adopting scientific and effective nutritional measures can significantly improve the physical fitness of football players, enhancing their training efficiency and match performance.

1. Football (Soccer) and its Energy Supply Characteristics
(1) Football (Soccer)
Football (soccer) is a skill-dominant, competitive sport played on the same field. It requires close cooperation among athletes on the field, with long duration and relatively high physical exertion. It mainly has the following characteristics: 1. Endurance. Football matches last for 90 minutes, and athletes need to maintain high-intensity running. 2. Agility. Athletes need to make appropriate adjustments based on the situation on the field, such as offense-defense transitions, goalkeeper saves, etc. Therefore, they need to possess strong observation skills and movement ability. 3. Explosiveness. To break through opponents, steal the ball, and shoot, athletes often need to possess sufficiently strong explosive power.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界第一运动。足球运动员的身体素质直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。而且，在运动过程中，运动员的体力消耗非常高，必须采取适当的措施来提高足球运动员的身体素质。随着运动生物化学的发展，研究人员发现，采取科学有效的营养措施可以显著提高足球运动员的身体素质，从而提高他们的训练效率和比赛表现。

1. 足球及其能量供给特点
(1) 足球
足球是一项在同一场地进行的、技术主导型的竞技性运动。它需要场上运动员之间的紧密配合，持续时间长，体力消耗相对较大。它主要具有以下特点：1. 耐力。足球比赛持续90分钟，运动员需要保持高强度奔跑。2. 灵敏性。运动员需要根据场上情况做出适当调整，例如攻防转换、守门员扑救等。3. 爆发力。为了突破对手、抢断球和射门，运动员往往需要具备足够强的爆发力。

abstract: <正>足球是世界上第一大运动，足球运动员的体能素质直接影响到训练成效和比赛结果，而且在运动过程中，运动员的体能消耗非常大，须采用合适的手段提升足球运动员的体能素质。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，科研人员发现采用科学、有效的营养措施，能够很好地提升足球运动员的体能素质，提高其训练效率和比赛成绩。一、足球运动及其供能特点（一）足球运动足球是一项技能主导类同场竞技性运动，在场上需要运动员之间的密切配合，运动时间长、体力消耗也比较大。其主要有以下几个特点：1.耐力性。足球比赛时长为90 min，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。2.灵敏性。运动员要根据赛场上的情况作出适当的调整，比如攻防转换、守门员扑救等，所以需要拥有较强的观察能力和位移能力。3.爆发性。要想突破对手、抢断球以及射门，往往需要运动员拥有足够强的爆发力。
ZH_EN:
Soccer is the world's number one sport. The physical fitness of soccer players directly affects training effectiveness and match results. Moreover, during exercise, the physical exertion of athletes is very high, and suitable means must be adopted to improve the physical fitness of soccer players. With the development of sports biochemistry, researchers have discovered that using scientific and effective nutritional measures can effectively improve the physical fitness of soccer players and improve their training efficiency and match performance.

1. Soccer and its Energy Supply Characteristics
(I) Soccer

Soccer is a skill-dominant, competitive sport played on the same field. On the field, it requires close cooperation between players. The exercise time is long, and the physical exertion is relatively large. It mainly has the following characteristics: 1. Endurance. A soccer match lasts for 90 minutes, and players need to maintain high-intensity running. 2. Agility. Players need to make appropriate adjustments based on the situation on the field, such as offense-defense transitions, goalkeeper saves, etc. Therefore, it is necessary to have strong observation skills and mobility. 3. Explosiveness. To break through opponents, intercept the ball, and shoot, it often requires players to have sufficient explosive power.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界第一运动。足球运动员的身体素质直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。而且，在运动过程中，运动员的体力消耗非常大，必须采取适当的方法来提高足球运动员的身体素质。随着运动生物化学的发展，研究人员发现，采用科学有效的营养措施可以有效提高足球运动员的身体素质，并提高他们的训练效率和比赛表现。

1. 足球及其能量供应特点
(I) 足球

足球是一项在同一场地进行的、以技术为主导的竞技运动。在球场上，它需要球员之间密切合作。运动时间长，体力消耗相对较大。它主要有以下特点：1. 耐力。一场足球比赛持续90分钟，球员需要保持高强度的奔跑。2. 敏捷性。球员需要根据场上情况做出适当的调整，例如攻防转换、守门员扑救等。因此，有必要具备很强的观察能力和移动能力。3. 爆发力。为了突破对手、拦截球和射门，往往需要球员拥有足够的爆发力。

abstract: <正>足球是世界上第一大运动，足球运动员的体能素质直接影响到训练成效和比赛结果，而且在运动过程中，运动员的体能消耗非常大，须采用合适的手段提升足球运动员的体能素质。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，科研人员发现采用科学、有效的营养措施，能够很好地提升足球运动员的体能素质，提高其训练效率和比赛成绩。一、足球运动及其供能特点（一）足球运动足球是一项技能主导类同场竞技性运动，在场上需要运动员之间的密切配合，运动时间长、体力消耗也比较大。其主要有以下几个特点：1.耐力性。足球比赛时长为90 min，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。2.灵敏性。运动员要根据赛场上的情况作出适当的调整，比如攻防转换、守门员扑救等，所以需要拥有较强的观察能力和位移能力。3.爆发性。要想突破对手、抢断球以及射门，往往需要运动员拥有足够强的爆发力。
ZH_EN:
Football is the world's number one sport. The physical fitness of football players directly affects training effectiveness and match results. Moreover, during the sport, the physical exertion of athletes is very high, and appropriate methods must be used to enhance their physical fitness. With the development of sports biochemistry, researchers have discovered that employing scientific and effective nutritional strategies can significantly improve the physical fitness of football players, thereby enhancing their training efficiency and match results.

1. Football and its Energy Supply Characteristics
(1) Football Sport
Football is a skill-based, competitive sport played on the same field. On the pitch, close collaboration among players is necessary. The game duration is long, and physical energy expenditure is also substantial. The main characteristics are as follows:
1. Endurance characteristic. Football matches last for 90 minutes, and athletes must sustain high-intensity running.
2. Agility characteristic. Players must make suitable adjustments based on on-field situations, like transitions between offense and defense, goalkeeper saves, etc. Thus, strong observational skills and movement ability are required.
3. Explosiveness characteristic. To break through opponents, intercept the ball, and shoot, players typically require sufficient explosive strength.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界第一运动。足球运动员的身体素质直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。此外，在运动过程中，运动员的体力消耗非常大，必须采用适当的方法来增强他们的身体素质。随着运动生物化学的发展，研究人员发现，采用科学有效的营养策略可以显著提高足球运动员的身体素质，从而提高他们的训练效率和比赛成绩。

1. 足球及其能量供给特点
(1) 足球运动
足球是一项在同一场地进行的，以技能为主的竞技运动。在球场上，球员之间需要密切合作。比赛时间长，体力能量消耗也很大。主要特点如下：
1. 耐力性特点。足球比赛持续90分钟，运动员必须保持高强度奔跑。
2. 灵敏性特点。 球员必须根据场上情况做出适当调整，例如攻防转换、守门员扑救等。因此，需要很强的观察能力和运动能力。
3. 爆发力特点。 为了突破对手、拦截球和射门，球员通常需要足够的爆发力。

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This article expounds on the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered curriculum-based ideological and political education teaching model. Taking "Animal Biochemistry" as an example, it details the construction process of this teaching model from five aspects: sorting out and excavating ideological and political elements for re-integration, in-depth excavation and classification of keywords to construct a network, and model evaluation. It also points out the shortcomings of the keyword-triggered curriculum-based ideological and political education teaching model that need further development.
EN_ZH: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发的课程思政教学模式的必要性。以“动物生物化学”为例，详细阐述了这种教学模式从五个方面的构建过程：梳理和挖掘思政元素并进行再融入，深入挖掘和分类关键词以构建网络，以及模型评价。还指出了关键词触发的课程思政教学模式尚需进一步完善的不足。

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This paper elucidates the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered teaching model for curriculum-based ideological and political education, covering five aspects, namely: sorting out, mining, and re-integrating ideological and political elements; in-depth mining and classifying keywords to construct a network; and model evaluation. Exemplified by "Animal Biochemistry", it elaborates on the construction process of this keyword-triggered teaching model for curriculum-based ideological and political education. Meanwhile, it also pointed out the areas for improvement in this keyword-triggered teaching model for curriculum-based ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发的课程思政教学模式的必要性，涵盖五个方面，即：梳理、挖掘与重构思政元素；深度挖掘与分类关键词构建网络；以及模型评价。以“动物生物化学”为例，详细阐述了这种关键词触发的课程思政教学模式的构建过程。同时，也指出了这种关键词触发的课程思政教学模式的改进之处。

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This article expounds on the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered curriculum-based ideological and political education teaching model, starting from five aspects: sorting and mining and re-integration of ideological and political elements, in-depth excavation and classification of keywords for network construction, and model evaluation. Taking "Animal Biochemistry" as an example, it details the construction process of the keyword-triggered curriculum-based ideological and political education teaching model, and simultaneously points out the limitations of this model that need further development.
EN_ZH: 这篇文章阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从五个方面入手：思政元素的梳理挖掘与再融入、网络构建关键词的深度挖掘与分类，以及模式评价。文章以《动物生物化学》为例，详细阐述了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，并同时指出了该模式有待进一步完善的局限性。

abstract: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，在钢铁及石油化工行业得到了广泛的应用。文章根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理水质要求，结合项目实际情况，通过对比化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺可知，在水质效果稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘稳定，增效的办法更多，且处理效果更好。同时，在节省建设用地、降低一次性投资费用方面都有较大的优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，论述了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点与应用，以期为相关行业发展提供参考。
ZH_EN: Chemical oil separators, as a type of water treatment equipment, have been widely used in the steel and petrochemical industries. Based on the water quality requirements for treating rolling wastewater from high-speed wire rod production lines, and considering the actual project situation, this article compares chemical oil removal and rare earth magnetic disk wastewater treatment technologies. The comparison shows that in terms of water quality stability, the chemical oil separator process is more stable than rare earth magnetic disks, has more methods for efficiency enhancement, and achieves better treatment results. At the same time, it also has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing one-time investment costs. According to process requirements, this article proposes a design scheme for chemical oil separator equipment, and discusses the chemical oil separator process flow, working principle, characteristics of reagent addition, and applications, aiming to provide a reference for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，已广泛应用于钢铁和石油化工行业。针对高速线材生产线轧制废水处理的水质要求，并结合实际工程情况，本文对化学除油和稀土磁盘废水处理技术进行了比较。比较表明，在水质稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘更稳定，效率提升方法更多，处理效果更佳。同时，在节约建设用地和降低一次性投资成本方面也具有显著优势。根据工艺需求，本文提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，并探讨了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点及应用，旨在为相关行业的发展提供参考。

abstract: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，在钢铁及石油化工行业得到了广泛的应用。文章根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理水质要求，结合项目实际情况，通过对比化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺可知，在水质效果稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘稳定，增效的办法更多，且处理效果更好。同时，在节省建设用地、降低一次性投资费用方面都有较大的优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，论述了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点与应用，以期为相关行业发展提供参考。
ZH_EN: Chemical degreasers, as a type of water treatment equipment, have been widely used in the steel and petrochemical industries. Based on the water quality requirements for wastewater treatment in high-speed wire rod production lines and the actual project situation, this article, by comparing chemical degreasing and rare earth magnetic disk wastewater treatment processes, demonstrates that in terms of water quality stability, the chemical degreaser process is more stable than rare earth magnetic disks, offers more ways to enhance efficiency, and achieves better treatment results. Meanwhile, it also has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing one-time investment costs. Based on process requirements, the article proposes a design scheme for chemical degreaser equipment and discusses the chemical degreaser process flow, working principle, characteristics of reagent dosage, and application, aiming to provide a reference for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，已广泛应用于钢铁和石化行业。基于高速线材生产线废水处理的水质要求和实际工程情况，本文通过比较化学除油和稀土磁盘废水处理工艺，论证了在水质稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘更稳定，具有更多提高效率的方式，并能获得更好的处理效果。同时，在节约建设用地和降低一次性投资成本方面也具有显著优势。基于工艺需求，本文提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，并探讨了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特性及应用，旨在为相关行业的发展提供参考。

abstract: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，在钢铁及石油化工行业得到了广泛的应用。文章根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理水质要求，结合项目实际情况，通过对比化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺可知，在水质效果稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘稳定，增效的办法更多，且处理效果更好。同时，在节省建设用地、降低一次性投资费用方面都有较大的优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，论述了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点与应用，以期为相关行业发展提供参考。
ZH_EN: Chemical oil separators, as a type of water treatment equipment, have been widely used in the steel and petrochemical industries.  Based on the water quality requirements for treating rolling wastewater from high-speed bar production lines and combined with the actual project conditions, this article compares two wastewater treatment processes: chemical oil removal and rare earth magnetic disk. It concludes that the chemical oil separator process is more stable in terms of water quality effect stability, offers more methods to enhance efficiency, and achieves better treatment results than the rare earth magnetic disk.  Moreover, it also has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing one-time investment costs.  According to process requirements, this article proposes a design scheme for chemical oil separator equipment, and discusses the process flow, working principle, characteristics of chemical agent addition, and application of chemical oil separators, aiming to provide a reference for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，已广泛应用于钢铁和石油化工行业。针对高速线材生产线轧制废水处理的水质要求，并结合实际工程条件，本文比较了化学除油和稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺。结论表明，化学除油器工艺在水质效果稳定性方面更稳定，提高效率的方法更多，并且比稀土磁盘工艺的处理效果更好。此外，它在节省建设用地和降低一次性投资成本方面也具有显著优势。根据工艺要求，本文提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，并探讨了工艺流程、工作原理、化学药剂添加特性以及化学除油器的应用，旨在为相关行业的发展提供参考。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: Grounded in the professional education field of "New Engineering Disciplines," physical chemistry experimental skills are a fundamental competency for professionals in fields such as chemistry, materials, biology, and environmental protection. In curriculum setup, it requires certain prerequisites. Typically, one should enter the realm of physical chemistry experiments after systematically learning the fundamental principles and operational standards of analytical chemistry experiments, and after becoming familiar with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methodologies. From a teaching perspective, the fundamental essence of physical chemistry experiments is to utilize physics knowledge, techniques, experience, and principles to solve chemical problems. This implies that individual physical chemistry experiment projects possess a composite nature, and the teaching theories and practical procedures involved are also more extensive and intricate.
EN_ZH: 立足于“新工科”的专业教育领域，物理化学实验技能是化学、材料、生物和环境保护等领域专业人员的一项基本能力。在课程设置上，这需要一定的先修知识。通常，应该在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理和操作规范，并熟悉常规实验工具、仪器和方法后，再进入物理化学实验的领域。从教学的角度来看，物理化学实验的本质是利用物理学的知识、技术、经验和原理来解决化学问题。这意味着物理化学实验项目具有综合性，并且其教学理论和实践环节也更加广泛和深入。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: Based on professional education in "New Engineering Disciplines", Physical Chemistry experimental ability is a basic skill for professionals in Chemistry, Materials, Biology, Environmental Protection, and other fields. In curriculum design, certain prerequisites are necessary, typically requiring a foundation in the systematic study of the basic principles and operating procedures of Analytical Chemistry experiments, as well as familiarity with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods, before entering the realm of Physical Chemistry experiments. From a teaching perspective, the fundamental essence of Physical Chemistry experiments is to utilize Physics knowledge, techniques, experience, and principles to address chemical problems. This implies that individual Physical Chemistry experiment projects have composite attributes, and the associated pedagogical theories and practical processes are also richer and more complex.
EN_ZH: 基于“新工科”专业教育，物理化学实验能力对于化学、材料、生物、环境保护等领域的专业人员而言是一项基本技能。在课程设计中，某些先修知识是必要的，通常需要具备分析化学实验基本原理和操作规程系统学习的基础，以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器和方法，才能进入物理化学实验的领域。从教学角度来看，物理化学实验的根本本质是利用物理学知识、技术、经验和原理来解决化学问题。这意味着物理化学实验项目本身具有综合属性，相关的教学理论和实践过程也更加丰富和复杂。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: Rooted in the "New Engineering" professional education field, physical chemistry experiment ability is a basic quality for professionals in majors such as chemistry, materials, biology, and environmental protection. In terms of curriculum design, it has certain prerequisites, typically requiring a foundation of systematically learning the basic principles and operational norms of analytical chemistry experiments, and familiarity with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods before entering the field of physical chemistry experiments. Based on the perspective of the teaching subject, the basic connotation of physical chemistry experiments is to use physics knowledge, technology, experience, and principles to solve chemistry problems. This means that individual physical chemistry experiment projects have composite properties, and the teaching theories and practical processes involved are also richer and more complex.
EN_ZH: 立足于“新工科”专业教育领域，物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环境保护等专业从业人员的一项基本素质。在课程设计方面，它具有一定的前置条件，通常需要具备系统学习分析化学实验基本原理和操作规范的基础，并熟悉常规实验工具、仪器和方法，才能进入物理化学实验领域。从教学主体的角度来看，物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验和原理来解决化学问题。这意味着单个物理化学实验项目具有综合性，并且所涉及的教学理论和实践过程也更加丰富和复杂。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: Deep integration of ideological and political education resources with the high school chemistry curriculum can enhance students' scientific inquiry ability and strengthen their social responsibility and environmental awareness. However, under the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, current high school chemistry teaching in some schools still suffers from insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, and a relatively vague teaching positioning. The forms of ideological and political education are monotonous, and chemistry inquiry innovation is limited. Teaching evaluation has biases, and there are problems such as the lack of comprehensive quality assessment. In response to this, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: Deeply explore ideological and political elements in chemistry to promote the cultivation of students' scientific spirit; Innovate experimental teaching design to help students practice the concepts of curriculum-based ideological and political education; Establish an ideological and political evaluation mechanism and focus on students' all-round development; thereby promoting the coordinated development of high school chemistry curriculum teaching in subject education and ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 思想政治教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合，能够提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环保意识。然而，在课程思政的视角下，当前一些学校的高中化学教学仍然存在思政元素融入不足、教学定位较为模糊等问题。思想政治教育形式单一，化学探究创新受限。教学评价存在偏差，存在综合素质评价缺失等问题。针对以上问题，教师可以采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学学科中的思政元素，促进学生科学精神的培养；创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念；建立思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展；从而促进高中化学课程教学在学科育人和思政育人方面的协同发展。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: Deep integration of ideological and political education resources with the high school chemistry curriculum can enhance students' scientific inquiry ability and strengthen their social responsibility and environmental awareness. However, from the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, current high school chemistry teaching in some schools still faces problems such as insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, and vague teaching positioning; monotonous forms of ideological and political teaching, and limited innovation in chemistry inquiry; and deviations in teaching evaluation, and lack of comprehensive quality assessment. In response, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: deeply explore ideological and political elements in chemistry to promote the cultivation of students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching design to help students practice curriculum-based ideological and political education concepts; and establish an ideological and political evaluation mechanism to focus on students' all-round development, in order to promote the coordinated development of high school chemistry curriculum teaching in disciplinary education and ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 思想政治教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可以提升学生的科学探究能力，增强他们的社会责任感和环保意识。然而，从课程思政的视角来看，当前部分高中化学教学仍然面临问题，如思政元素融入不足，教学定位模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新性不足；教学评价存在偏差，缺乏综合素质评价。对此，教师可以采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学学科中的思政元素，以促进学生科学精神的培养；创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念；建立思政评价机制，聚焦学生全面发展，以促进高中化学课程教学在学科育人和思政教育方面的协同发展。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: Deep integration of ideological and political education resources with the high school chemistry curriculum can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities and strengthen their social responsibility and environmental awareness. However, from the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, current high school chemistry teaching in some schools still suffers from insufficient integration of ideological and political elements and a vague teaching orientation; the forms of ideological and political teaching are singular, and chemical inquiry innovation is limited; there are deviations in teaching evaluation, and a lack of comprehensive quality assessment, among other issues. In response, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: deeply explore the ideological and political elements of chemistry to promote the cultivation of students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching design to help students practice the concept of curriculum-based ideological and political education; and construct an ideological and political evaluation mechanism to focus on students' comprehensive development, thereby promoting the coordinated development of high school chemistry curriculum teaching in both subject education and ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 思想政治教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合能够提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环保意识。然而，从课程思政的视角来看，当前一些学校的高中化学教学仍然存在思想政治元素融入不足、教学导向不够明确的问题；思想政治教育形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺乏综合素质评价等问题。对此，教师可以采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学的思政元素，促进学生科学精神的培养；创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念；构建思政评价机制，聚焦学生综合发展，从而促进高中化学课程教学在学科育人和思政育人方面的协同发展。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid development of science and technology, especially the popularization of computer and network technology, has brought new challenges to traditional physical chemistry teaching. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become an important issue in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, and proposes the challenges and prospects of applying computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, in order to improve students' interest in the subject and academic performance. Research shows that by using methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can more deeply understand abstract concepts such as reaction thermodynamics and reaction kinetics. Utilizing methods such as using research to feed back into teaching and adding hands-on computer practice sessions can stimulate students' innovation potential and cultivate students' scientific research thinking.
EN_ZH: 科技的飞速发展，特别是计算机和网络技术的普及，给传统物理化学教学带来了新的挑战。如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学已成为当前教育改革中的一个重要问题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出将计算化学应用于物理化学教学的挑战和前景，以提高学生对该学科的兴趣和学习成绩。研究表明，通过使用分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学和反应动力学等抽象概念。利用诸如科研反哺教学和增加计算机实践环节等方法，可以激发学生的创新潜力，培养学生的科学研究思维。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid development of science and technology, especially the popularization of computer and network technology, has brought new challenges to traditional physical chemistry teaching. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become an important topic in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, and propose the challenges and prospects of applying computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, in order to enhance students' interest in the subject and academic performance. Research shows that by using methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts like reaction thermodynamics and reaction kinetics. Utilizing methods such as research-feeding teaching and adding practical sessions can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate students' scientific research thinking.
EN_ZH: 科学技术的快速发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，给传统的物理化学教学带来了新的挑战。如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学已成为当前教育改革中的一个重要议题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以期提高学生对学科的兴趣和学习成绩。研究表明，通过使用诸如分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学和反应动力学等抽象概念。运用诸如研究性教学和增加实践环节等方法，可以激发学生的创新潜能，并培养学生的科研思维。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid development of science and technology, especially the popularization of computer and network technologies, has brought new challenges to traditional physical chemistry teaching. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become an important topic in current education reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, and proposes the challenges and prospects of applying computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching, to enhance students' interest in the subject and academic performance. Research shows that by using methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can more deeply understand abstract concepts such as reaction thermodynamics and reaction kinetics. Utilizing methods such as research feedback teaching and adding computer lab sessions can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate their scientific research thinking.
EN_ZH: 科学技术的飞速发展，特别是计算机和网络技术的普及，给传统的物理化学教学带来了新的挑战。如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学已成为当前教育改革中的一个重要课题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战和前景，以提高学生对该学科的兴趣和学习成绩。研究表明，通过使用分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解诸如反应热力学和反应动力学等抽象概念。利用研究反馈教学和增加计算机实验课等方法可以激发学生的创新潜力，培养他们的科学研究思维。

abstract: 文章以上饶师范学院为例，首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，接着论述了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效，其中路径包括进行顶层设计，把工匠精神融入化学师范专业人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，把工匠精神融入榜样模范引领；推进教学改革，把工匠精神融入课堂教学和实训实践。
ZH_EN: Taking Shangrao Normal University as an example, this article first elucidates the connotation of craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students, then analyzes the internal relationship between the cultivation of craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students and teacher education program accreditation, subsequently discusses the significance of cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students under the background of teacher education program accreditation, afterwards proposes the paths for cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students under the background of teacher education program accreditation, and finally summarizes the effectiveness of cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students under the background of teacher education program accreditation, among which the paths include conducting top-level design to integrate craftsman spirit into the chemistry teacher education talent training program; carrying out model publicity to integrate craftsman spirit into the guidance of role models; and promoting teaching reform to integrate craftsman spirit into classroom teaching and practical training.
EN_ZH: 以上饶师范学院为例，本文首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，进而分析了化学师范生工匠精神培养与师范专业认证的内在联系，随后探讨了师范专业认证背景下培养化学师范生工匠精神的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下培养化学师范生工匠精神的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下培养化学师范生工匠精神的成效，其中路径包括：进行顶层设计，将工匠精神融入化学师范生人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，将工匠精神融入榜样示范的引导；以及推进教学改革，将工匠精神融入课堂教学与实践训练。

abstract: 文章以上饶师范学院为例，首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，接着论述了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效，其中路径包括进行顶层设计，把工匠精神融入化学师范专业人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，把工匠精神融入榜样模范引领；推进教学改革，把工匠精神融入课堂教学和实训实践。
ZH_EN: Taking Shangrao Normal University as an example, this article first elucidates the connotation of craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students, then analyzes the intrinsic connection between the cultivation of craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students and teacher education program certification, subsequently discusses the significance of cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education program certification, after that proposes the paths for cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education program certification, and finally summarizes the effectiveness of cultivating craftsman spirit for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education program certification. The paths include conducting top-level design to integrate craftsman spirit into the chemistry teacher education talent cultivation program; carrying out model publicity to integrate craftsman spirit into model exemplar leadership; and promoting teaching reform to integrate craftsman spirit into classroom teaching and practical training.
EN_ZH: 以商饶师范学院为例，本文首先阐释化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，进而分析化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，随后探讨师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神的培育路径，最后总结师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效。路径包括：进行顶层设计，将工匠精神融入化学师范生人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，将工匠精神融入榜样示范引领；以及推进教学改革，将工匠精神融入课堂教学与实践训练。

abstract: 文章以上饶师范学院为例，首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，接着论述了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效，其中路径包括进行顶层设计，把工匠精神融入化学师范专业人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，把工匠精神融入榜样模范引领；推进教学改革，把工匠精神融入课堂教学和实训实践。
ZH_EN: Taking Shangrao Normal University as an example, this article first elucidates the connotation of craftsmanship for chemistry normal students, then analyzes the internal relationship between the cultivation of craftsmanship for chemistry normal students and teacher education professional certification, and subsequently discusses the significance of cultivating craftsmanship for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education professional certification. Following this, it proposes paths for cultivating craftsmanship for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education professional certification, and finally summarizes the effectiveness of cultivating craftsmanship for chemistry normal students in the context of teacher education professional certification. The paths include conducting top-level design to integrate craftsmanship into the chemistry normal student talent development plan, carrying out model publicity to integrate craftsmanship into the guidance of role models and exemplars, and promoting teaching reform to integrate craftsmanship into classroom teaching and practical training.
EN_ZH: 以上饶师范学院为例，本文首先阐述化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，其次分析化学师范生工匠精神培养与师范专业认证的内在关联，进而探讨师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培养的意义。随后提出师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神的培育路径，最后总结师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效。路径包括进行顶层设计，将工匠精神融入化学师范生人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，将工匠精神融入榜样示范引领；推进教学改革，将工匠精神融入课堂教学与实践训练。

abstract: 化学分析检测是一项复杂性任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为确保化学分析检测得到令人满意的结果，必须在检测分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量检测是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐释了化学分析仪器管理及计量检测过程中的不足之处，并提供了针对性的改善方案，旨在确保化学制品计量检测结果的可信度。
ZH_EN: Chemical analysis testing is a complex task involving numerous potential interfering variables. To ensure satisfactory results in chemical analysis testing, effective quality management must be performed prior to analysis, and metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments is an indispensable part of this. This article details the deficiencies in the management and metrological testing process of chemical analysis instruments, and provides targeted improvement plans, aiming to ensure the credibility of metrological testing results for chemical products.
EN_ZH: 化学分析测试是一项复杂的任务，涉及众多潜在的干扰变量。为了确保化学分析测试获得令人满意的结果，必须在分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量测试是其中不可或缺的一部分。本文详细阐述了化学分析仪器管理和计量测试过程中的不足之处，并提出了有针对性的改进方案，旨在确保化学产品计量测试结果的可靠性。

abstract: 化学分析检测是一项复杂性任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为确保化学分析检测得到令人满意的结果，必须在检测分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量检测是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐释了化学分析仪器管理及计量检测过程中的不足之处，并提供了针对性的改善方案，旨在确保化学制品计量检测结果的可信度。
ZH_EN: Chemical analysis testing is a complex task involving numerous possible interfering variables. To ensure satisfactory results from chemical analysis testing, effective quality management must be carried out before testing and analysis, of which the metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments is an indispensable part. The article elaborates in detail on the shortcomings in the management of chemical analysis instruments and the metrological testing process, and provides targeted improvement plans, aiming to ensure the credibility of metrological testing results of chemical products.
EN_ZH: 化学分析检测是一项涉及众多可能的干扰变量的复杂任务。为了确保化学分析检测获得令人满意的结果，必须在检测和分析之前进行有效的质量管理，其中化学分析仪器的计量测试是不可或缺的一部分。本文详细阐述了化学分析仪器管理和计量测试过程中的不足，并提出了有针对性的改进方案，旨在确保化学产品计量测试结果的可信度。

abstract: 化学分析检测是一项复杂性任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为确保化学分析检测得到令人满意的结果，必须在检测分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量检测是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐释了化学分析仪器管理及计量检测过程中的不足之处，并提供了针对性的改善方案，旨在确保化学制品计量检测结果的可信度。
ZH_EN: Chemical analysis and testing is a complex task involving numerous possible interfering variables. To ensure satisfactory results from chemical analysis and testing, effective quality management must be carried out before testing and analysis, and metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments is an indispensable part of this. The article elaborates in detail the shortcomings in the management of chemical analysis instruments and the metrological testing process, and provides targeted improvement plans, aiming to ensure the credibility of metrological testing results for chemical products.
EN_ZH: 化学分析与测试是一项复杂的任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为了确保化学分析与测试结果的令人满意，必须在测试与分析之前进行有效的质量管理，且化学分析仪器的计量测试是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐述了化学分析仪器管理和计量测试过程中的不足，并提出了有针对性的改进方案，旨在确保化学产品计量测试结果的可信度。

abstract: 挖掘天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能，创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，以树立专业自信、文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量3个方面阐释了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索。
ZH_EN: Exploring the ideological and political education resources inherent in the natural medicinal chemistry course and organically integrating ideological and political education with professional knowledge teaching contributes to cultivating pharmaceutical talents with professional skills, innovative abilities, and a strong sense of social responsibility. This article outlines the basic situation of the natural medicinal chemistry course and elaborates on the case design and teaching exploration of ideological and political education construction in this course from three aspects: to establish professional and cultural confidence; to guide students to adhere to fundamental principles while innovating and grasp the connotation of scientific development; and to convey patriotism and help students gather strength for progress.
EN_ZH: 探索天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，并将思想政治教育与专业知识教学有机结合，有助于培养具备专业技能、创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，并从三个方面阐述了本课程思想政治教育建设的案例设计和教学探索：树立专业自信和文化自信；引导学生守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；以及传递爱国情怀，助力学生凝聚前行力量。

abstract: 挖掘天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能，创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，以树立专业自信、文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量3个方面阐释了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索。
ZH_EN: Exploring the ideological and political education resources contained in the Natural Product Chemistry course and organically integrating ideological and political education with professional knowledge teaching helps cultivate pharmacy talents with professional skills, innovation ability, and a strong sense of social responsibility. This paper outlines the basic situation of the Natural Product Chemistry course and elaborates on the case design and teaching exploration of ideological and political education construction in the Natural Product Chemistry course from three aspects: establishing professional confidence and cultural confidence; guiding integrity and innovation, grasping the connotation of scientific development; and conveying national sentiment, helping students gather strength to forge ahead.
EN_ZH: 探索天然药物化学课程蕴含的思政教育资源，并将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能、创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，并从三个方面阐述了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索，即：树立专业自信和文化自信；引导诚信创新，把握科学发展内涵；以及传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量。

abstract: 挖掘天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能，创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，以树立专业自信、文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量3个方面阐释了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索。
ZH_EN: Exploring the ideological and political education resources inherent in the Natural Product Chemistry course and organically integrating ideological and political education with professional knowledge teaching helps cultivate pharmacy professionals with professional skills, innovative abilities, and a strong sense of social responsibility. This paper outlines the basic information of the Natural Product Chemistry course, and elaborates on the case design and teaching exploration of ideological and political education construction in the Natural Product Chemistry course in three aspects: establishing professional and cultural confidence; guiding integrity and innovation to grasp the essence of scientific progress; and instilling patriotism to help students unite and forge ahead.
EN_ZH: 探索天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，并将思想政治教育有机融入专业知识教学，有助于培养具备专业技能、创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学专业人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，并阐述了天然药物化学课程中思想政治教育建设的案例设计与教学探索，在三个方面：树立专业自信和文化自信；引导诚信与创新，把握科学进步的本质；融入爱国情怀，助力学生团结奋进。

abstract: 在人类的生产生活中，化学工程和化学工艺占据着重要的地位，为推动工业建设和经济发展做出了重大贡献。但工业文明的进程难免会对环境造成影响。为了解决这一问题并完成化学工程中的环保绿色目标，我国的各个化工企业开始积极研究绿色化工技术在化学工程和工艺中的实际应用。基于此，阐述了绿色化工技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化工技术的开发和具体应用。
ZH_EN: In human production and life, chemical engineering and chemical technology occupy an important position and have made significant contributions to promoting industrial construction and economic development. However, the progress of industrial civilization inevitably has an impact on the environment. In order to solve this problem and achieve the environmental protection and green goals in chemical engineering, various chemical enterprises in China have begun to actively research the practical application of green chemical technology in chemical engineering and processes. Based on this, this paper elaborates on the content and importance of green chemical technology, as well as the development and specific applications of green chemical technology.
EN_ZH: 在人类生产和生活中，化学工程与化学工艺占据着重要的地位，并为促进工业建设和经济发展做出了重要贡献。然而，工业文明的进步不可避免地对环境产生影响。为了解决这个问题，并实现化学工程中的环境保护和绿色目标，中国的各化工企业已经开始积极研究绿色化工技术在化学工程和工艺中的实际应用。基于此，本文阐述了绿色化工技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化工技术的发展和具体应用。

ZH_EN: In human production and life, chemical engineering and chemical processes play an important role and have made significant contributions to promoting industrial construction and economic development. However, the progress of industrial civilization inevitably affects the environment. To solve this problem and achieve environmental protection and green goals in chemical engineering, various chemical enterprises in China have begun to actively research the practical application of green chemical technology in chemical engineering and processes. Based on this, this paper elaborates on the content and importance of green chemical technology, as well as the development and specific applications of green chemical technology.
EN_ZH: 在人类生产和生活中，化学工程与化工工艺发挥着重要作用，并为推动工业建设和经济发展做出了重要贡献。然而，工业文明的进步不可避免地影响着环境。为了解决这个问题，并在化工领域实现环境保护和绿色目标，中国各化工企业已经开始积极研究绿色化学技术在化学工程与化工工艺中的实际应用。基于此，本文阐述了绿色化学技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化学技术的发展和具体应用。

abstract: 在人类的生产生活中，化学工程和化学工艺占据着重要的地位，为推动工业建设和经济发展做出了重大贡献。但工业文明的进程难免会对环境造成影响。为了解决这一问题并完成化学工程中的环保绿色目标，我国的各个化工企业开始积极研究绿色化工技术在化学工程和工艺中的实际应用。基于此，阐述了绿色化工技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化工技术的开发和具体应用。
ZH_EN: In human production and life, chemical engineering and chemical technology occupy an important position and have made significant contributions to promoting industrial construction and economic development. However, the progress of industrial civilization inevitably affects the environment. To solve this problem and achieve the environmental protection and green goals in chemical engineering, various chemical enterprises in China have begun to actively research the practical application of green chemical technology in chemical engineering and technology. Based on this, this paper elucidates the content and importance of green chemical technology, as well as the development and specific applications of green chemical technology.
EN_ZH: 人类生产和生活中，化学工程与化学工艺占据着重要的地位，并且为推动工业建设和经济发展做出了重要贡献。然而，工业文明的进步不可避免地影响着环境。为了解决这一问题，实现化工领域的环境保护和绿色目标，我国各化工企业开始积极研究绿色化工技术在化工工程与工艺中的实际应用。基于此，本文阐述了绿色化工技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化工技术的发展和具体应用。

abstract: <正>东南大学化学化工学院前身是原中央大学重要的院系之一，最早于1920年成立了化学系，1928年成立了化学工程系，1988年恢复建立化学化工系，2006年成立化学化工学院。学院现拥有“化学工程与技术”和“化学”一级学科博士点，“化学”和“化学工程与技术”一级学科硕士点，另有“材料物理和化学”二级博士点和硕士点，其中“应用化学”和“新材料”学科为江苏省优势学科，并建有“化学工程与技术”博士后科研流动站。学院现设有化学系、化学工程系、化学生物与制药工程系三个系，先后设立了精细化工研究所、制药工程研究所，拥有江苏省分子铁电科学与应用重点实验室、江苏省生物药物高技术研究重点实验室、江苏省光电功能材料工程实验室、江苏省富碳材料与器件工程实验室等。学院设有教学实验中心，并同楼宇共享校级分析测试中心设备资源，为教学科研提供了优越的实验条件。学院现有教职工（含全职博士后、专职科研）136名，其中专任教师103名，98%
ZH_EN: Southeast University School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, formerly one of the important departments of the former National Central University, was first established as the Department of Chemistry in 1920 and the Department of Chemical Engineering in 1928. In 1988, the Department of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering was re-established, and in 2006, the School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering was established. The school currently has doctoral programs in first-level disciplines of "Chemical Engineering and Technology" and "Chemistry", master's programs in first-level disciplines of "Chemistry" and "Chemical Engineering and Technology", and doctoral and master's programs in the second-level discipline of "Materials Physics and Chemistry". Among them, the disciplines of "Applied Chemistry" and "New Materials" are advantageous disciplines of Jiangsu Province, and a postdoctoral research station in "Chemical Engineering and Technology" has been established. The school currently has three departments: Department of Chemistry, Department of Chemical Engineering, and Department of Chemical Biology and Pharmaceutical Engineering. It has successively established the Institute of Fine Chemicals and the Institute of Pharmaceutical Engineering. It has Jiangsu Province Key Laboratory of Molecular Ferroelectric Science and Applications, Jiangsu Province Key Laboratory of High-Tech Research on Biopharmaceuticals, Jiangsu Province Engineering Laboratory of Photoelectric Functional Materials, Jiangsu Province Engineering Laboratory of Rich Carbon Materials and Devices, etc. The school has a Teaching and Experimental Center and shares equipment resources of the university-level Analysis and Testing Center in the same building, providing excellent experimental conditions for teaching and research. The school currently has 136 faculty and staff members (including full-time postdoctoral fellows and full-time researchers), among whom there are 103 full-time teachers, 98%.
EN_ZH: 东南大学化学化工学院，其前身是原国立中央大学的重要系科之一，最早可追溯至1920年成立的化学系和1928年成立的化工系。1988年，复建化学化工系，2006年，成立化学化工学院。学院现有“化学工程与技术”和“化学”一级学科博士点、“化学”和“化学工程与技术”一级学科硕士点，以及“材料物理与化学”二级学科博士和硕士点。其中，“应用化学”和“新型材料”学科为江苏省优势学科，并设有“化学工程与技术”博士后科研流动站。学院现设化学系、化工系、化学生物与制药工程系3个系；先后成立了精细化工研究所、制药工程研究所；建有分子铁电科学与应用江苏省重点实验室、生物医药高技术研究江苏省重点实验室、光电功能材料江苏省工程实验室、富碳材料与器件江苏省工程实验室等。学院拥有教学实验中心，并与校级分析测试中心在同一楼宇内共享仪器设备资源，为教学和科研提供了优良的实验条件。学院现有教职工136人（含专职博士后、专职科研人员），其中专任教师103人，占比98%。

abstract: 随着科技的发展和社会的进步，化学类专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国民经济和社会发展中扮演着不可替代的角色。然而，当前高校化学类大学生就业现状面临着一系列挑战。本文以某大学为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时期就业市场的实际情况，总结归纳了化学类大学生就业现状，并基于现状提出助力其就业的可行对策，期望本文研究能为高校化学类专业就业指导服务的优化提供更多参考依据。
ZH_EN: With the development of science and technology and the progress of society, chemistry majors, as an important component of natural science, play an irreplaceable role in national economic and social development. However, the current employment situation of chemistry majors in universities faces a series of challenges. This paper uses a university as a case study, integrating questionnaire survey results and the actual situation of the employment market in the new era, summarizing the employment status of chemistry majors, and proposing feasible strategies based on the current situation to facilitate their employment. It is hoped that this research can provide more reference basis for optimizing employment guidance services for chemistry majors in universities.
EN_ZH: 随着科学技术的进步和社会的发展，化学专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国家经济和社会发展中发挥着不可替代的作用。然而，当前高校化学专业毕业生的就业形势面临一系列挑战。本文以某高校为例，结合问卷调查结果和新时代就业市场的实际情况，总结化学专业毕业生的就业现状，并基于现状提出可行的对策，以促进其就业。希望本研究能为优化高校化学专业毕业生的就业指导服务提供更多参考依据。

abstract: 随着科技的发展和社会的进步，化学类专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国民经济和社会发展中扮演着不可替代的角色。然而，当前高校化学类大学生就业现状面临着一系列挑战。本文以某大学为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时期就业市场的实际情况，总结归纳了化学类大学生就业现状，并基于现状提出助力其就业的可行对策，期望本文研究能为高校化学类专业就业指导服务的优化提供更多参考依据。
ZH_EN: With the development of science and technology and the progress of society, chemistry-related majors, as an important part of natural science, play an irreplaceable role in national economic and social development. However, the current employment situation of chemistry majors in universities faces a series of challenges. This paper takes a certain university as the research object, combines questionnaire survey results and the actual situation of the employment market in the new era, summarizes and concludes the employment status of chemistry majors, and proposes feasible countermeasures based on the current situation to facilitate their employment, hoping that the research in this paper can provide more reference for optimizing employment guidance services for chemistry majors in universities.
EN_ZH: 随着科学技术的发展和社会进步，化学相关专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国家经济和社会发展中发挥着不可替代的作用。然而，当前高校化学专业就业形势面临一系列挑战。本文以某高校为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时代就业市场的实际情况，总结归纳了化学专业就业现状，并基于现状提出可行的对策建议以促进其就业，希望本文研究能够为优化高校化学专业就业指导服务提供更多参考。

abstract: 随着科技的发展和社会的进步，化学类专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国民经济和社会发展中扮演着不可替代的角色。然而，当前高校化学类大学生就业现状面临着一系列挑战。本文以某大学为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时期就业市场的实际情况，总结归纳了化学类大学生就业现状，并基于现状提出助力其就业的可行对策，期望本文研究能为高校化学类专业就业指导服务的优化提供更多参考依据。
ZH_EN: With the development of science and technology and the progress of society, chemistry-related majors, as an important part of natural science, play an irreplaceable role in national economic and social development. However, the current employment situation of chemistry-related undergraduates in universities faces a series of challenges. This paper takes a certain university as the research object, combining questionnaire survey results and the actual situation of the employment market in the new era, summarizes the current employment situation of chemistry-related undergraduates, and proposes feasible countermeasures to help their employment based on the current situation. It is hoped that the research in this paper can provide more reference for the optimization of employment guidance services for chemistry-related majors in universities.
EN_ZH: 随着科技发展和社会进步，化学相关专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国民经济和社会发展中发挥着不可替代的作用。 然而，当前高校化学相关专业本科生的就业形势面临一系列挑战。 本文以某高校为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时代就业市场的实际情况，总结了当前化学相关专业本科生的就业现状，并基于现状提出了可行的对策，以帮助他们就业。 希望本文的研究能为优化高校化学相关专业就业指导服务提供更多参考。

abstract: 近年来，随着我国社会信息技术持续发展，其应用逐渐渗透至人们的日常生活与工作中，显著提升了人们生活的便利性并有效促进了工作效率的提升。在信息技术迅猛发展的背景下，教师在实施教学活动过程中应当与时俱进，紧跟信息时代的发展潮流，巧妙运用先进信息技术为学生设计教学内容与活动。基于此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当地融入信息技术，有助于构建更加高效的化学课堂学习环境，对提升学生的化学水平与能力具有重要的意义和深远的影响。
ZH_EN: In recent years, with the continuous development of information technology in China, its application has gradually permeated into people's daily lives and work, significantly enhancing the convenience of people's lives and effectively promoting the improvement of work efficiency. In the context of the rapid development of information technology, teachers should keep pace with the times during the implementation of teaching activities, keep up with the development trend of the information age, and skillfully utilize advanced information technology to design teaching content and activities for students. Based on this, in junior high school chemistry classroom teaching, teachers appropriately incorporate information technology, which helps to build a more efficient chemistry classroom learning environment and is of great significance and profound impact on enhancing students' chemistry proficiency and abilities.
EN_ZH: 近年来，随着中国信息技术的不断发展，其应用已逐渐渗透到人们的日常生活和工作，显著提升了人们生活的便利性，并有效地促进了工作效率的提高。在信息技术快速发展的背景下，教师在开展教学活动的过程中应与时俱进，跟上信息时代的发展趋势，熟练运用先进的信息技术为学生设计教学内容和活动。基于此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当地融入信息技术，有助于构建更高效的化学课堂学习环境，对于提升学生的化学素养和能力具有重要意义和深远影响。

abstract: 近年来，随着我国社会信息技术持续发展，其应用逐渐渗透至人们的日常生活与工作中，显著提升了人们生活的便利性并有效促进了工作效率的提升。在信息技术迅猛发展的背景下，教师在实施教学活动过程中应当与时俱进，紧跟信息时代的发展潮流，巧妙运用先进信息技术为学生设计教学内容与活动。基于此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当地融入信息技术，有助于构建更加高效的化学课堂学习环境，对提升学生的化学水平与能力具有重要的意义和深远的影响。
ZH_EN: In recent years, with the continuous development of information technology in China, its applications have gradually permeated people's daily lives and work, significantly enhancing the convenience of life and effectively promoting work efficiency. Against the backdrop of the rapid development of information technology, teachers should keep pace with the times during the implementation of teaching activities, closely follow the development trend of the information age, and skillfully utilize advanced information technology to design teaching content and activities for students. Therefore, in junior high school chemistry classroom teaching, the appropriate integration of information technology by teachers is conducive to building a more efficient chemistry classroom learning environment and is of great significance and far-reaching impact for improving students' chemistry level and abilities.
EN_ZH: 近年来，随着中国信息技术的不断发展，其应用逐渐渗透到人们的日常生活和工作中，显著提升了生活便利性，有效提高了工作效率。在信息技术快速发展的背景下，教师在开展教学活动时应与时俱进，紧跟信息时代的发展趋势，熟练运用先进的信息技术为学生设计教学内容和活动。因此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师合理地整合信息技术，有利于构建更高效的化学课堂学习环境，对于提升学生的化学水平和能力具有重要意义和深远影响。

abstract: 近年来，随着我国社会信息技术持续发展，其应用逐渐渗透至人们的日常生活与工作中，显著提升了人们生活的便利性并有效促进了工作效率的提升。在信息技术迅猛发展的背景下，教师在实施教学活动过程中应当与时俱进，紧跟信息时代的发展潮流，巧妙运用先进信息技术为学生设计教学内容与活动。基于此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当地融入信息技术，有助于构建更加高效的化学课堂学习环境，对提升学生的化学水平与能力具有重要的意义和深远的影响。
ZH_EN: In recent years, with the continuous development of information technology in China, its application has gradually permeated people's daily lives and work, significantly enhancing the convenience of life and effectively promoting work efficiency. Against the backdrop of the rapid development of information technology, teachers should keep pace with the times and follow the development trend of the information age when implementing teaching activities, skillfully utilizing advanced information technology to design teaching content and activities for students. Therefore, in junior high school chemistry classroom teaching, teachers appropriately integrating information technology helps to build a more efficient chemistry classroom learning environment, and has significant and far-reaching implications for improving students' chemistry level and abilities.
EN_ZH: 近年来，随着中国信息技术的不断发展，其应用逐渐渗透到人们的日常生活和工作中，显著提升了生活便利性和有效提高了工作效率。在信息技术快速发展的背景下，教师在开展教学活动时应与时俱进，顺应信息时代的发展趋势，巧妙地运用先进的信息技术为学生设计教学内容和活动。因此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当整合信息技术有助于构建更高效的化学课堂学习环境，对于提高学生的化学水平和能力具有重要而深远的意义。

abstract: 目的 本研究旨在评估化学发光法（CLIA）在临床肿瘤标志物检测中的灵敏度与特异性，尤其是在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用效果。方法 选取2024年3月至6月期间A医院体检中心的1246例血清样本，分析AFP、CEA、CA-125、CA-199等肿瘤标志物的化学发光法检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估其灵敏度、特异性及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据采用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，用卡方检验、t检验等方法进行组间比较。结果 化学发光法检测结果表明，CA-125的灵敏度最高（89.5%）,AFP和CA-199的灵敏度分别为80.3%和85.7%,CEA灵敏度最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%）,AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的灵敏度表现存在显著差异（P <0.05）。结论 化学发光法在肿瘤标志物的检测中具有高灵敏度和高特异性，能够为肿瘤的早期诊断提供重要的支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现存在差异，临床应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。
ZH_EN:
Objective: This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in the detection of clinical tumor markers, particularly its application in early tumor screening.
Methods: 1246 serum samples were collected from the health examination center of Hospital A between March and June 2024. Chemiluminescence immunoassay results for tumor markers such as AFP, CEA, CA-125, and CA-199 were analyzed. Sensitivity, specificity, and predictive values (PPV and NPV) were evaluated by comparing with clinical diagnostic results. Data were statistically analyzed using SPSS 26.0 software, and inter-group comparisons were conducted using methods such as chi-square test and t-test.
Results: Chemiluminescence immunoassay results indicated that CA-125 had the highest sensitivity (89.5%), followed by AFP and CA-199 with sensitivities of 80.3% and 85.7%, respectively, while CEA had the lowest sensitivity (68.5%). In terms of specificity, CEA showed the best performance (95.8%), while AFP, CA-199, and CA-125 had specificities of 92.4%, 90.3%, and 88.2%, respectively. Significant differences in sensitivity were observed among different tumor markers for liver cancer, ovarian cancer, gastric cancer, and colorectal cancer (P < 0.05).
Conclusion: Chemiluminescence immunoassay demonstrates high sensitivity and specificity in tumor marker detection, providing significant support for early tumor diagnosis. The performance of different markers varies across different tumor types. Clinically, appropriate markers should be selected for combined detection based on tumor type to improve the accuracy of early diagnosis.
EN_ZH:
目的：本研究旨在评估化学发光免疫分析法(CLIA)在检测临床肿瘤标志物中的敏感性和特异性，特别是其在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用。
方法：于2024年3月至6月期间，从A医院体检中心收集了1246份血清样本。分析了甲胎蛋白(AFP)、癌胚抗原(CEA)、糖类抗原125 (CA-125)和糖类抗原199 (CA-199)等肿瘤标志物的化学发光免疫分析结果。通过与临床诊断结果进行比较，评估了敏感性、特异性以及预测值（PPV和NPV）。使用SPSS 26.0软件对数据进行统计分析，组间比较采用卡方检验和t检验等方法。
结果：化学发光免疫分析结果显示，CA-125的敏感性最高（89.5%），其次是AFP和CA-199，敏感性分别为80.3%和85.7%，而CEA的敏感性最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%），而AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌的不同肿瘤标志物之间，敏感性存在显著差异（P < 0.05）。
结论：化学发光免疫分析法在肿瘤标志物检测中表现出较高的敏感性和特异性，为早期肿瘤诊断提供了重要支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现有所不同。临床上，应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。

abstract: 目的 本研究旨在评估化学发光法（CLIA）在临床肿瘤标志物检测中的灵敏度与特异性，尤其是在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用效果。方法 选取2024年3月至6月期间A医院体检中心的1246例血清样本，分析AFP、CEA、CA-125、CA-199等肿瘤标志物的化学发光法检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估其灵敏度、特异性及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据采用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，用卡方检验、t检验等方法进行组间比较。结果 化学发光法检测结果表明，CA-125的灵敏度最高（89.5%）,AFP和CA-199的灵敏度分别为80.3%和85.7%,CEA灵敏度最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%）,AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的灵敏度表现存在显著差异（P <0.05）。结论 化学发光法在肿瘤标志物的检测中具有高灵敏度和高特异性，能够为肿瘤的早期诊断提供重要的支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现存在差异，临床应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。
ZH_EN:
Purpose: This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in the detection of clinical tumor markers, especially its application effect in early tumor screening.
Methods: 1246 serum samples from the health examination center of Hospital A from March to June 2024 were selected to analyze the chemiluminescence immunoassay detection results of tumor markers such as AFP, CEA, CA-125, and CA-199. By comparing with clinical diagnostic results, its sensitivity, specificity, and predictive values (PPV and NPV) were evaluated. Data were statistically analyzed using SPSS 26.0 software, and inter-group comparisons were performed using chi-square tests, t-tests, and other methods.
Results: The chemiluminescence immunoassay detection results showed that CA-125 had the highest sensitivity (89.5%), while the sensitivities of AFP and CA-199 were 80.3% and 85.7%, respectively, and CEA had the lowest sensitivity (68.5%). In terms of specificity, CEA performed best (95.8%), and the specificities of AFP, CA-199, and CA-125 were 92.4%, 90.3%, and 88.2%, respectively. There were significant differences in the sensitivity of different tumor markers in liver cancer, ovarian cancer, gastric cancer, and colorectal cancer (P < 0.05).
Conclusion: Chemiluminescence immunoassay has high sensitivity and high specificity in the detection of tumor markers, and can provide important support for the early diagnosis of tumors. The performance of different markers varies in different tumor types. Clinically, appropriate markers should be selected for combined detection according to the tumor type to improve the accuracy of early diagnosis.
EN_ZH:
目的：本研究旨在评估化学发光免疫分析法 (CLIA) 在检测临床肿瘤标志物中的灵敏度和特异性，特别是其在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用效果。

结果：化学发光免疫分析检测结果显示，CA-125的灵敏度最高（89.5%），AFP和CA-199的灵敏度分别为80.3%和85.7%，CEA的灵敏度最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%），AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的灵敏度存在显著差异（P < 0.05）。
结论：化学发光免疫分析法在肿瘤标志物检测中具有较高的灵敏度和特异性，可为肿瘤的早期诊断提供重要支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现存在差异。临床上应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。

Objective This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in clinical tumor marker detection, especially its application effect in early tumor screening.
Methods 1246 serum samples were collected from the health examination center of Hospital A from March to June 2024.
