In daily teaching processes, teachers should further emphasize the importance of cross-integration teaching strategies to help students develop a deeper understanding of related knowledge. Based on this, this paper takes "The Main Bearer of Life Activities—Proteins" as an example to explore cross-integration teaching strategies of high school chemistry in biology classrooms, aiming to enhance students' scientific literacy and innovative abilities.
EN_ZH: 随着新课改的不断深入，高中化学与生物课程的交叉融合教学已成为提升学生综合素质的重要途径。在日常教学过程中，教师应进一步重视交叉融合教学策略的重要性，帮助学生更深入地理解相关知识。基于此，本文以“生命活动的主要承担者——蛋白质”为例，探讨高中化学在生物课堂中的交叉融合教学策略，旨在提升学生的科学素养与创新能力。

abstract: 随着互联网技术在各个领域的广泛普及，其在推动各行各业的发展中发挥着愈发重要的作用。“互联网+”成为一种普遍的发展模式，将其运用在教育领域中，也能有效推动我国现代化教育事业的不断创新发展。通过网络信息平台的灵活运用，可以有效实现教学模式的创新，教学内容的拓展，为打造高效课堂提供有益助力。本文以初中化学如何通过“互联网+”打造高效课堂为例，结合鲁教版初中化学教材，展开策略性探讨。
ZH_EN: With the widespread adoption of internet technology across various fields, it plays an increasingly important role in driving the development of all industries. "Internet+" has become a common development model, and its application in the field of education can effectively promote the continuous innovation and development of modern education in China. Through the flexible use of online information platforms, it is possible to achieve innovation in teaching models and the expansion of teaching content, providing valuable support for creating efficient classrooms. This article takes the example of how junior high school chemistry can create efficient classrooms through "Internet+" and, in conjunction with the Lu Jiao edition of junior high school chemistry textbooks, explores strategic approaches.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网技术在各领域的广泛应用，其对于推动各行业发展的作用愈发重要。“互联网+”已成为普遍的发展模式，其在教育领域的应用，能够有效促进我国现代教育的不断创新与发展。通过对线上信息平台的灵活运用，可实现教学模式的创新与教学内容的拓展，为打造高效课堂提供有力支持。本文以初中化学如何通过“互联网+”打造高效课堂为例，结合鲁教版初中化学教材，探讨策略途径。

"Internet+" has become a common development model, and its application in the field of education can effectively promote the continuous innovation and development of modern education in China. Through the flexible use of online information platforms, it is possible to achieve innovation in teaching models and the expansion of teaching content, providing valuable support for creating efficient classrooms. This article takes the example of how junior high school chemistry can build efficient classrooms through "Internet+" and combines it with the Shandong Education Press junior high school chemistry textbook to explore strategic approaches.

"Internet+" has become a common development model, and its application in the field of education can effectively promote the continuous innovation and development of modern education in China. Through the flexible use of online information platforms, it is possible to achieve innovation in teaching models and the expansion of teaching content, providing valuable support for creating efficient classrooms. abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: As a foundational course in the medical field, medical biochemistry aims to guide students in exploring and mastering the chemical changes in organisms and the mechanisms underlying the development of human diseases, laying a solid foundation for their studies in specialized courses such as oral medicine and pharmacy. In traditional teaching models, medical biochemistry primarily focuses on imparting professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills, often neglecting the cultivation of students' medical professionalism and ethical awareness. Therefore, the medical biochemistry course needs to actively respond to the call for ideological and political education reform, effectively promoting the integration of medical professional education with ideological and political education. It should emphasize the cultivation of students' moral and ethical qualities, helping them establish correct professional and value perspectives.
EN_ZH: 作为医学领域的基础课程，医学生物化学旨在引导学生探索并掌握生物体内的化学变化及人类疾病发展的机制，为他们在口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式中，医学生物化学主要侧重于传授专业知识及相关生化实验技能，往往忽视了对学生医学职业素养和伦理意识的培养。因此，医学生物化学课程需积极响应思政教育改革的号召，有效推动医学专业教育与思政教育的融合，注重学生道德伦理素质的培养，帮助他们树立正确的职业观和价值观。

abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: Medical biochemistry, as a foundational course in medical education, aims to guide students in exploring and mastering the chemical changes in organisms and the mechanisms underlying the development of human diseases, thereby laying a solid foundation for their studies in specialized fields such as dentistry and pharmacy. Under traditional teaching models, the course primarily focuses on imparting professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills, often neglecting the cultivation of students' medical professionalism and ethical awareness. Therefore, medical biochemistry must actively respond to the call for ideological and political education reform in the curriculum, effectively integrating medical education with ideological and political education. It should emphasize the development of students' moral and ethical qualities, helping them establish correct professional values and ethical perspectives.
EN_ZH: 医学生物化学作为医学教育的基础课程，旨在引导学生探索和掌握生物体内的化学变化及人类疾病发生的化学机制，从而为他们在牙科、药学等专业领域的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下，该课程主要侧重于传授专业知识及相关生化实验技能，往往忽视了对学生医学职业素养和伦理意识的培养。因此，医学生物化学必须积极响应课程思政改革的号召，有效融合医学教育与思政教育，注重学生道德伦理素质的培养，帮助他们树立正确的职业价值观和伦理观。

abstract: <正>医学生物化学课程作为医学专业的基础课程,旨在引导学生探究并掌握生物体的化学变化规律以及人体疾病的发生发展机制,为学生开展口腔医学、药学等专业课程的学习打下坚实基础。在传统教学模式下,医学生物化学课程以专业知识与相关生物化学实验技能为主开展教学工作,忽视了对学生医学职业素养、医学道德修养的熏陶培育。因此,医学生物化学课程需要积极响应课程思政教学改革的号召,切实推动医学专业教育与思政教育有机融合,注重对学生思想道德品质的培养,使其树立正确的职业观、价值观。
ZH_EN: Medical biochemistry, as a foundational course in medical education, aims to guide students in exploring and mastering the chemical changes in living organisms and the mechanisms underlying the development of human diseases. It lays a solid foundation for students to pursue specialized courses such as oral medicine and pharmacy. In traditional teaching models, the focus of medical biochemistry courses has been on professional knowledge and related biochemical experimental skills, often neglecting the cultivation of students' medical professionalism and ethical awareness. Therefore, medical biochemistry courses need to actively respond to the call for ideological and political education reform, effectively promoting the integration of medical education with ideological and political education. Emphasis should be placed on nurturing students' moral and ethical qualities, helping them establish correct professional and value perspectives.
EN_ZH: 医学生物化学作为医学教育的基础课程，旨在引导学生探索和掌握生命体内的化学变化及人类疾病发生的机制，为学生后续学习口腔医学、药学等专业课程奠定坚实基础。传统教学模式中，医学生物化学课程侧重于专业知识及相关生化实验技能的传授，往往忽视了对学生医学职业素养和伦理意识的培养。因此，医学生物化学课程需积极响应课程思政改革的号召，切实推进医学教育与思政教育的融合，注重学生道德伦理素质的培养，帮助他们树立正确的职业观和价值观。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: The field of chemical engineering encompasses a wide range of areas, with complex processes and numerous calculation steps involved. Calculations in chemical engineering often relate to curve fitting of nonlinear equations, partial differentials, and solving linear or nonlinear programming problems, which are extremely challenging. Achieving precise and efficient calculations manually is difficult; however, by utilizing computer-aided programming for computational tasks, the quality and efficiency of chemical dosage calculations can be significantly improved, offering high application value and practical significance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程领域涵盖广泛，涉及复杂工艺与众多计算步骤。其计算常关联非线性方程的曲线拟合、偏微分以及线性或非线性规划问题的求解，极具挑战性。人工实现精确高效计算颇为困难；然而，借助计算机辅助编程进行运算，可大幅提升化工计算的质量与效率，具有较高的应用价值和现实意义。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: The field of chemical engineering encompasses a wide range of areas, with complex processes and numerous calculation steps involved. Calculations in chemical engineering often relate to curve fitting of nonlinear equations, partial differentials, and solving linear or nonlinear programming problems. These calculations are extremely challenging and difficult to achieve accurately and quickly by manual methods alone. However, by utilizing computer-assisted programming for computational calculations, it is possible to enhance the quality and efficiency of chemical dosage calculations, offering significant practical value and real-world significance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程领域涵盖广泛，涉及复杂过程与众多计算步骤。化工计算常关联非线性方程的曲线拟合、偏微分以及线性或非线性规划问题的求解，这些计算极为复杂，仅凭手工方法难以准确且迅速地完成。然而，借助计算机辅助编程进行计算，可提升化工配比计算的质效，具有重要的实用价值与现实意义。

abstract: <正>化学工程领域的涉及面较广，全过程复杂，涉及到的计算环节众多。化学工程领域的计算多与曲线拟合非线性方程，偏微分，线性或非线性规划的求解等有关，这些计算难度极大，仅靠手工，难以实现精准快捷的计算；而配合计算机辅助编程，开展计量计算，能够实践应用化学计算剂量的提质增效，具有极高的应用价值和现实意义。
ZH_EN: The field of chemical engineering encompasses a broad scope, with complex processes and numerous computational steps involved. Calculations in chemical engineering often relate to curve fitting of nonlinear equations, partial differentials, and solutions to linear or nonlinear programming, among others. These calculations are extremely challenging, making it difficult to achieve precise and rapid results manually. However, by utilizing computer-assisted programming to conduct quantitative calculations, it is possible to enhance the quality and efficiency of chemical dosage calculations in practical applications, offering significant value and real-world importance.
EN_ZH: 化学工程领域涵盖广泛，涉及复杂的工艺和众多的计算步骤。化工计算常涉及非线性方程的曲线拟合、偏微分以及线性或非线性规划的求解等，这些计算极具挑战性，难以通过手工操作实现精确且快速的结果。然而，通过利用计算机辅助编程进行定量计算，能够在实际应用中提升化工配比计算的质量与效率，具有重要的价值和现实意义。

abstract: <正>2024年10月7日,湖北能特科技股份有限公司公告,该公司于2024年9月30日召开第七届董事会第二十二次会议,审议通过《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目的议案》,同意公司之全资子公司能特科技有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目。该项目建设地点在湖北荆州开发区,项目建设期为自项目批准后不超过15个月。项目全部建设完成并达产后,每年新增30%～100%化学法回收聚酯系列产品共计100 kt。
ZH_EN: On October 7, 2024, Hubei Energy Special Technology Co., Ltd. announced that the company held the 22nd meeting of the seventh board of directors on September 30, 2024, during which the proposal regarding the wholly-owned subsidiary, Energy Special Technology Co., Ltd., investing in a 100 kt/a chemical recycling polyester project was reviewed and approved. The company agreed that its wholly-owned subsidiary, Energy Special Technology Co., Ltd., would use self-raised funds of 350 million RMB to invest in the 100 kt/a chemical recycling polyester project. The project will be located in the Jingzhou Development Zone, Hubei Province, with a construction period not exceeding 15 months from the date of project approval. Upon completion and full production, the project will annually add 30% to 100% of chemically recycled polyester series products, totaling 100 kt.
EN_ZH: 2024年10月7日，湖北能源特种技术有限公司宣布，公司于2024年9月30日召开了第七届董事会第二十二次会议，会议审议并通过了关于全资子公司能源特种技术有限公司投资建设10万吨/年化学回收聚酯项目的议案。公司同意全资子公司能源特种技术有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资建设10万吨/年化学回收聚酯项目。该项目将位于湖北省荆州开发区，建设周期自项目获批之日起不超过15个月。项目建成并全面投产后，每年将新增30%至100%的化学回收聚酯系列产品，总计10万吨。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical English is a specialized form of scientific English that combines English language skills with chemical expertise. It is specifically used to explain theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena in the field of chemistry. It serves as a foundational course for students in chemistry-related majors to enhance their ability to work in the chemical industry. Many of the equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from abroad, and their user manuals and structural parameters are often in English. This creates a demand for professionals who possess both specialized knowledge and proficiency in technical English. Vocational colleges are the primary institutions for cultivating high-quality technical talents for frontline production. The advantages of project-based teaching align with the needs of English courses in chemical technology majors at vocational colleges, improving the relevance and effectiveness of teaching. This approach enhances students' mastery of chemical English and helps them integrate smoothly into their professional roles.
EN_ZH: 化学英语是一种结合了英语语言技能与化学专业知识的科学英语，专门用于解释化学领域的理论、技术、实验、工艺和现象。它是化学相关专业学生提升化工行业工作能力的基础课程。许多化工行业使用的设备从国外进口，其使用说明书和结构参数多为英文，这要求从业人员既具备专业知识，又精通专业英语。职业院校是培养一线生产高素质技术人才的主要机构。项目化教学的优势与职业院校化工技术专业英语课程的需求相契合，提高了教学的针对性和实效性，增强了学生对化学英语的掌握能力，帮助他们顺利融入职业角色。

ZH_EN: Chemical English is a specialized form of scientific English that integrates English language skills with chemical expertise. It is specifically used to explain theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena in the field of chemistry. This course serves as a foundational program for students in chemistry-related majors at universities, preparing them for roles in the chemical industry. Many of the equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering sectors are imported from abroad, and their user manuals and structural parameters are often in English. This creates a demand for professionals who possess both specialized knowledge and proficiency in technical English. Vocational colleges are the primary institutions for cultivating high-quality technical talents for frontline production. The advantages of project-based teaching align well with the needs of English courses for chemical technology majors in vocational colleges, enhancing the relevance and effectiveness of instruction. This approach improves students' mastery of chemical English and helps them seamlessly integrate into their future workplaces.
EN_ZH: 化学英语是一种将英语语言能力与化学专业知识相结合的科学英语，专门用于阐述化学领域的理论、技术、实验、工艺和现象。该课程是高校化学相关专业学生的基础课程，为其未来在化工行业工作奠定基础。化工行业使用的许多设备均从国外进口，其使用说明书和结构参数多为英文，这要求从业人员既具备专业知识，又掌握技术英语。高职院校是培养一线生产高素质技术人才的主要阵地，项目化教学的优势与高职院校化工技术专业英语课程的需求相契合，增强了教学的针对性和实效性，提升了学生对化学英语的掌握程度，使其更好地适应未来的工作岗位。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical English is a specialized form of scientific and technical English that integrates English with chemical expertise. It is specifically used to explain theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena in the field of chemistry. It serves as a foundational course for students in chemistry-related majors to enhance their ability to work in the chemical industry. Many pieces of equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from abroad, and their user manuals and structural parameters are often in English. This creates a demand for a large number of talented individuals who possess both professional knowledge and proficiency in chemical English. Vocational colleges are the main institutions for cultivating high-quality technical talents for production lines. The advantages of project-based teaching align with the needs of chemical technology-related English courses in vocational colleges, improving the relevance and effectiveness of teaching. This approach enhances students' mastery of chemical English and helps them smoothly integrate into their professional roles.
EN_ZH: 化学英语是科技英语的一种，是英语与化学专业知识的结合，专门用于阐述化学领域的理论、技术、实验、工艺和现象，是化学相关专业学生提高化工行业工作能力的基础课程。化工行业使用的许多设备都是从国外进口的，其使用说明书和结构参数等资料都是英文的，这就需要大量既具备专业知识又精通化学英语的人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术人才的主要阵地，项目教学法的优势与高职院校化工技术相关英语课程的需求相契合，提高了教学的针对性和有效性，提升了学生对化学英语的掌握程度，使其能顺利进入职业角色。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are unparalleled by the chemistry of the past. The differentiation between chemistry and philosophy has become increasingly profound, and chemistry itself has transitioned from macroscopic to microscopic research, evolving from static to dynamic studies. In this context, many renowned chemists, from various research perspectives, have deeply recognized the significant role of philosophical thought in the development of chemistry. An increasing number of chemists have begun to consciously apply the principles of dialectical materialism to guide their chemical research. Philosophers, too, are paying close attention to the progress of chemistry, contemplating the questions that chemistry poses to philosophy during its development. As a result, the interdisciplinary field of chemical philosophy has emerged, distinct from ancient natural philosophy and the "chemical philosophy" discussed by modern chemists.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度是过去化学所无法比拟的。化学与哲学的区分日益深刻，化学自身也由宏观研究向微观研究过渡，由静态研究向动态研究发展。在此背景下，许多著名化学家从不同的研究角度，深刻认识到哲学思想对化学发展的重要作用。越来越多的化学家开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义原理指导化学研究。哲学家们也密切关注化学的进展，思考化学发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。于是，既不同于古代自然哲学，也不同于现代化学家所论述的“化学哲学”的化学哲学学科应运而生。

The differentiation between chemistry and philosophy has become increasingly profound, and chemistry itself has transitioned from macroscopic to microscopic research, evolving from static to dynamic studies. In this context, many renowned chemists, from various research perspectives, have deeply recognized the significant importance of philosophical thought for the development of chemistry. An increasing number of chemists have begun to consciously apply the principles of dialectical materialism to guide their chemical research. Philosophers are also paying close attention to the progress of chemistry, contemplating the questions that chemistry poses to philosophy during its development. As a result, the interdisciplinary field of chemical philosophy has emerged, distinct from ancient natural philosophy and the "chemical philosophy" referred to by modern chemists.

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are unparalleled by historical chemistry. The differentiation between chemistry and philosophy has become increasingly profound, and chemistry itself has transitioned from macroscopic to microscopic research, evolving from static to dynamic studies. In this context, many renowned chemists, from various research perspectives, have deeply recognized the significant role of philosophical thought in the development of chemistry. An increasing number of chemists have begun to consciously apply the principles of dialectical materialism to guide their chemical research. Philosophers, too, are paying close attention to the progress of chemistry, contemplating the questions that chemistry poses to philosophy during its development. As a result, chemical philosophy, an interdisciplinary field bridging chemistry and philosophy, has emerged. This discipline is distinct from ancient natural philosophy and also differs from the "chemical philosophy" discussed by modern chemists.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度是历史化学无法比拟的。化学与哲学的区分日益深刻，化学自身也由宏观研究向微观研究过渡，由静态研究向动态研究发展。在此背景下，许多著名化学家从不同的研究角度，深刻认识到哲学思想对化学发展的重要作用，越来越多的化学家开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义原理指导化学研究。哲学家们也在密切关注着化学的进展，思考着化学在其发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。于是，一门介于化学与哲学之间的边缘学科——化学哲学便应运而生。这门学科既不同于古代的自然哲学，也不同于现代化学家所论述的“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the advancement of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become crucial research directions for enhancing athletic performance and preventing injuries. Sports biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activities, and endocrine indicators during exercise, provides a significant foundation for the scientific diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. *Sports Biochemistry* delves into the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators across different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general public. Research on energy metabolism and balance offers new insights into identifying fatigue accumulation and overtraining. This biochemical testing approach not only enhances the scientific rigor of sports but also provides a solid guarantee for athletes' long-term health and efficient training.
EN_ZH: 随着运动科学的发展，运动性疲劳和过度训练的监测与诊断已成为提高运动表现和预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中代谢物、酶活性和内分泌指标的变化，为科学诊断疲劳和过度训练提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群（包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童和普通大众）生化指标的影响。能量代谢与平衡的研究为识别疲劳积累和过度训练提供了新的视角。这种生化检测方法不仅提升了运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康和高效训练提供了坚实保障。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the advancement of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become crucial research directions for enhancing athletes' performance and preventing injuries. Exercise biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activity, and endocrine indicators during exercise, provides a scientific basis for the diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. "Exercise Biochemistry" delves into the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators across different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general public. Research on energy metabolism and balance offers new insights into identifying fatigue accumulation and overtraining. This biochemical testing approach not only enhances the scientific rigor of sports but also provides a solid foundation for athletes' long-term health and efficient training.

ZH_EN: With the advancement of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become crucial research directions for enhancing athletic performance and preventing injuries. Exercise biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activities, and endocrine indicators during exercise, provides a scientific basis for the diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. *Exercise Biochemistry* delves into the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators across different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general public. Research on energy metabolism and balance offers new insights into identifying fatigue accumulation and overtraining. This biochemical testing approach not only enhances the scientific rigor of sports but also provides a solid foundation for the long-term health and efficient training of athletes.

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: The June 2024 Zhejiang Province Chemistry Selective Exam maintained stability in terms of test format, content, and material selection while moderately innovating through rotating test points, creative presentation, and changing perspectives to counteract the tendencies of "formulaic" question design and "routine-based" teaching. Based on the core concept of "structure determines properties," the exam increased the emphasis on experimental assessment by creating appropriate real-world scenarios, aimed at enhancing the structural quality of the questions and refining genuine problems that accurately diagnose and develop students' core competencies. Additionally, it provided high school chemistry teaching recommendations aligned with competency-based selective exams, focusing on curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考在保持试卷结构、内容和选材稳定的基础上，适度创新，通过轮换考点、创意呈现、变换视角等方式，以应对“套路化”命题和“程式化”教学的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，通过创设适切的实际情境，加大实验考查力度，旨在提升试题的结构化质量，打磨能精准诊断和发展学生核心素养的真实问题。同时，提供基于素养导向的选考与高中化学教学建议，紧扣课程标准、教材和实验。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: The June 2024 Zhejiang Province Chemistry Selective Exam maintained stability in terms of test format, content, and material selection while moderately innovating through rotating test points, creative presentation, and changing perspectives to counteract the tendencies of formulaic question design and teaching routines. Based on the core concept of "structure determines properties," the exam increased the emphasis on experimental assessment by creating appropriate real-world scenarios, aimed at enhancing the structural quality of the questions and refining genuine problems that accurately diagnose and develop students' core competencies. Additionally, it provided high school chemistry teaching recommendations aligned with competency-based selective exams, focusing on curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在保持试卷结构、考查内容和素材选取稳定的基础上，通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变换视角等方式适度创新，以反套路命题和反套路教学。试题基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，通过创设适切真实情境，加大实验考查力度，旨在提升试题的结构化质量，打磨能精准诊断和发展学生核心素养的真实问题。同时，为高中化学教学提供紧扣课标、立足教材、注重实验的素养导向选考备考建议。

EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试卷在保持试题形式、内容和素材选择稳定性的同时，适度创新，通过轮换考点、创意呈现、变换视角等方式，以应对“套路化”命题和“程式化”教学的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，试卷通过创设恰当的真实情境，加大了对实验考查的力度，旨在提升试题的结构化质量，打磨能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真实问题。同时，为高中化学教学提供了与素养导向选考相适应的建议，重点关注课程标准、教材和实验。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important pathway to disseminate scientific knowledge and enhance the scientific literacy of citizens. Focusing on the three fundamental questions of why to read, what to read, and how to read in the context of chemistry popular science reading during the introductory education phase of junior high school chemistry, this discussion explores the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry education. It proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading materials for junior high school students and recommends some classic popular science works as reference readings. Integrating classroom and extracurricular teaching practices, it outlines methods to guide junior high school students in chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, exploratory reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, combining classroom and extracurricular activities, and interdisciplinary collaboration, all aimed at improving students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是传播科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段的化学科普阅读，从为何读、读什么、怎么读三个基本问题出发，探讨了初中化学教育中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中生化学阅读材料的选择标准，并推荐了一些经典科普作品作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实践，阐述了指导初中生进行化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合以及跨学科合作等，旨在提升学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important way to popularize scientific knowledge and enhance citizens' scientific literacy. Focusing on the three fundamental questions of why to read, what to read, and how to read in the context of chemistry popular science reading during the introductory education stage of junior high school chemistry, this discussion explores the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry teaching. It proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading materials and recommends some classic popular science works as reference readings. By integrating classroom and extracurricular teaching practices, it elaborates on methods to guide junior high school students in conducting chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, exploratory reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, combining classroom and extracurricular activities, and interdisciplinary collaboration, all aimed at improving students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读的为何读、读什么、怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义，提出了化学阅读材料的选择标准，并推荐了一些经典科普作品作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实践，阐述了指导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、跨学科协作等，旨在提升学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important pathway for disseminating scientific knowledge and enhancing citizens' scientific literacy. Addressing the three fundamental questions of why to read, what to read, and how to read in the context of popular science reading for junior high school chemistry education, this discussion explores the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry teaching. It proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading materials for junior high school students and recommends several classic popular science works as reference readings. Integrating practical teaching both inside and outside the classroom, it outlines methods to guide junior high school students in chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, exploratory reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, combining in-class and out-of-class activities, and interdisciplinary collaboration, all aimed at improving students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是传播科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。针对初中化学科普阅读中为何读、读什么、怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义，提出了初中生化学阅读材料的选择标准，并推荐了几部经典科普作品作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实践，从批判性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内与课外相结合、跨学科合作等方面，阐述了指导初中生化学阅读的方法，以期提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a form of activity aimed at enhancing physical fitness and promoting health, intersect and integrate with the field of chemistry, a natural science, on multiple levels. Chemical theories play an irreplaceable role in guiding sports education and training, particularly in areas such as athletes' nutritional supplementation, improvement of sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. From the perspective of athletes' nutritional supplementation, chemical theories reveal the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanisms of energy conversion. During high-intensity exercise, athletes require substantial energy consumption, and proper nutritional supplementation ensures they maintain optimal performance during training and competition.
EN_ZH: 体育运动作为一种旨在增强体质、促进健康的活动形式，与自然科学领域的化学在多个层面上交叉融合。化学理论在指导体育教学与训练中发挥着不可替代的作用，尤其是在运动员营养补充、运动器材改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面。从运动员营养补充的角度来看，化学理论揭示了食物中各类营养物质的组成及能量转化的机理。在高强度运动过程中，运动员需要消耗大量能量，合理的营养补充能确保其在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

From the perspective of athletes' nutritional supplementation, chemical theory reveals the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanisms of energy conversion. During high-intensity exercise, athletes consume a significant amount of energy, and proper nutritional supplementation ensures they maintain optimal performance during training and competition.
EN_ZH: 体育运动作为一种旨在增强体质与健康的活动形式，与自然科学领域的化学在多个层面上交叉融合。化学理论在指导体育教学与训练过程中发挥着不可替代的作用，尤其在运动员营养补充、运动器材改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面。从运动员营养补充的角度来看，化学理论揭示了食物中各类营养成分的构成及能量转换机制。在高强度运动过程中，运动员消耗大量能量，合理的营养补充能确保其在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Building on previous work that used photometric and turbidimetric methods to investigate the effects of concentration and temperature on chemical reaction rates through the reaction of sodium thiosulfate with sulfuric acid, and based on the STEM concept, an experimental setup was designed and assembled using readily available equipment such as a laser head, silicon photocell sensor, Bluetooth data acquisition module, and a smartphone. This setup leverages the Tyndall effect principle already understood by students. The apparatus was used to collect and quantitatively analyze voltage signals from the silicon photocell sensor during the reaction under various conditions, leading to conclusions about the effects of reactant concentration and temperature on the chemical reaction rate that align with values reported in the literature. Throughout this process, students gained a strong appreciation for the practical application of theoretical knowledge, experienced the joy of learning chemistry, and effectively enhanced their hands-on experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于先前利用光度和浊度法研究硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应中浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作，并依据STEM理念，设计并组装了一套实验装置，该装置采用了激光头、硅光电池传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块及智能手机等易得设备。此装置利用了学生已理解的廷德尔效应原理。通过该装置，在不同条件下收集并定量分析了反应过程中硅光电池传感器的电压信号，得出了反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论，这些结论与文献报道值相符。在此过程中，学生们深刻体会到了理论知识的实际应用，感受到了学习化学的乐趣，并有效提升了动手实验能力和问题解决能力。

The device was used to collect and quantitatively analyze voltage signals output by the silicon photodiode sensor during the reaction under different conditions, leading to conclusions about the effects of reactant concentration and temperature on chemical reaction rates that aligned with values reported in the literature. abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
ZH_EN: <Positive> Elemental View: Matter is composed of elements; elements can be divided into different categories, with different elements possessing distinct properties, while elements of the same category share similar properties; the properties of matter are related to its elemental composition, and matter can be classified based on its elemental composition; the types of elements remain unchanged before and after chemical reactions... Classification View: Selecting the objects of classification and the perspective (characteristics) of classification, classification of elements, classification of matter, classification of changes, classification of chemical reactions, classification of reaction conditions, classification of material properties, classification of material structures, classification of variables affecting experimental investigations, classification of experimental principles, instruments, and operations... Particle View: Matter is composed of microscopic particles...
EN_ZH: <正面> 元素观：物质由元素组成；元素可分为不同类别，不同元素具有不同性质，同类元素性质相似；物质性质与其元素组成有关，可根据元素组成对物质进行分类；化学反应前后元素种类不变……分类观：选择分类对象和分类视角（特征），元素的分类、物质的分类、变化的分类、化学反应的分类、反应条件的分类、物质性质的分类、物质结构的分类、影响实验探究变量的分类、实验原理、仪器和操作的分类……微粒观：物质由微观粒子构成……

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
ZH_EN: <Positive> Elemental View: Matter is composed of elements; elements can be divided into different categories, with different elements possessing distinct properties, while elements of the same category share similar properties; the properties of matter are related to its elemental composition, allowing matter to be classified based on its elemental makeup; the types of elements remain unchanged before and after chemical reactions... Classification View: Selecting the object of classification and the perspective (characteristics) of classification, classification of elements, classification of matter, classification of changes, classification of chemical reactions, classification of reaction conditions, classification of material properties, classification of material structures, classification of variables affecting experimental investigations, classification of experimental principles, instruments, and operations... Particle View: Matter is composed of microscopic particles...
EN_ZH: <正面> 元素观：物质由元素组成；元素可分，不同元素性质各异，同类元素性质相似；物质性质与其元素组成相关，据此可对物质进行分类；化学反应前后元素种类不变……分类观：选择分类对象与分类角度（特征），元素分类、物质分类、变化分类、化学反应分类、反应条件分类、物质性质分类、物质结构分类、实验探究中变量的分类、实验原理、仪器与操作的分类……微粒观：物质由微观粒子构成……

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education is the education of aesthetic appreciation, moral sentiment, and spiritual cultivation, as well as the education that enriches imagination and fosters innovative consciousness. Chemistry, as a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and transformation laws of matter, plays a pivotal role in advancing the development of new materials, new energy sources, new agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic elements into the teaching practice of foundational chemistry courses not only stimulates students' interest in the subject, promotes the inheritance and confidence of China's excellent traditional culture, and strengthens students' patriotic sentiments, but also serves as an important pathway to achieve the fundamental task of fostering virtue through education and cultivating well-rounded, high-quality talents. This educational model helps cultivate comprehensively developed talents who balance emotional agility with rational rigor. However, the implementation of aesthetic education in foundational chemistry courses in universities is still in its preliminary exploratory stage. To effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when organizing course content, teachers should emphasize the logical beauty of the content, not only adhering to the inherent logical sequence of the course and following the physical and mental development laws of students, but also comprehensively considering students' interests, needs, and experiential backgrounds to ensure the logical sequence of the course content aligns with students' psychological development, providing them with a positive learning experience. Second, create aesthetic education scenarios by meticulously designing, refining, and integrating PPTs, blackboard writing, and teaching language to craft the artistic beauty of classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic education teaching by adopting methods such as BOPPPS to achieve the fusion of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, refine aesthetic education theories and incorporate them into foundational chemistry textbooks to promote the high-quality development of chemistry teaching materials. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing an aesthetic education theoretical system within chemistry courses and for promoting and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学作为研究物质的结构、性质及变化规律的自然科学，在推动新材料、新能源、新农业及信息技术的发展中起着举足轻重的作用。将美育元素融入基础化学课程教学实践，不仅能激发学生学习化学的兴趣，促进我国优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强学生的爱国情怀，更是实现立德树人根本任务、培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养情智交融、情理通达的全面发展人才。然而，高校基础化学课程中美育的实施仍处于初步探索阶段。为有效推进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施:第一，在组织课程内容时，教师应注重内容的逻辑美，既要遵循课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，又要综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求及经验背景，使课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展顺序相吻合，为学生提供良好的学习体验。第二，通过精心设计、提炼和整合PPT、板书及教学语言，创设美育情境，打造课堂教学的艺术美。第三，采用BOPPPS等方法创新美育教学，实现化学教育与美育的融合。第四，完善美育理论并将其融入基础化学教材，推动化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系以及促进和深化美育在化学教学中的应用提供了参考。

ZH_EN: Aesthetic education encompasses aesthetic appreciation, moral cultivation, and spiritual enrichment, as well as the development of imagination and the fostering of innovative thinking. Chemistry, as a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and transformation laws of matter, plays a pivotal role in advancing fields such as new materials, new energy sources, modern agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic elements into the teaching of foundational chemistry courses not only sparks students' interest in the subject, promotes the inheritance and confidence in China's excellent traditional culture, and strengthens their patriotic sentiments, but also serves as an essential pathway to fulfill the fundamental task of moral education and cultivate well-rounded, high-quality talents. This educational model helps nurture individuals who balance emotional agility with rational rigor. However, the implementation of aesthetic education in foundational chemistry courses in higher education remains in its preliminary stages. To effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when organizing course content, teachers should emphasize logical beauty, not only adhering to the inherent logical sequence of the curriculum and the developmental patterns of students' physical and mental growth but also considering students' interests, needs, and experiential backgrounds to ensure the alignment of the course's logical structure with students' psychological development, thereby providing them with a positive learning experience. Second, create aesthetic educational scenarios by meticulously designing, refining, and integrating PowerPoint presentations, blackboard writing, and lecture language to cultivate artistic beauty in classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic teaching methods, such as adopting the BOPPPS model, to achieve the fusion of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, distill aesthetic theories and incorporate them into foundational chemistry textbooks to promote the high-quality development of chemistry teaching materials. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing an aesthetic education theoretical framework within chemistry courses and expanding and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育包含审美、情操、心灵教育，也包含想象力和创新思维等培养。化学作为研究物质结构、性质及变化规律的自然科学，在推动新材料、新能源、现代农业、信息技术等发展中起着至关重要的作用。将美育融入基础化学课程教学，不仅能够激发学生学习化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强爱国主义情怀，更是落实立德树人根本任务，培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径，有助于培养情智交融、情理通达的理性人。然而，目前高校基础化学课程美育的实施尚处于初步探索阶段。为有效推进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施:第一，在组织课程内容时，教师应注重逻辑美，不仅要遵循课程本身的逻辑顺序和学生身心发展的规律，还要考虑学生的兴趣、需要和经验背景，使课程的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，让学生获得良好的学习体验。第二，创设美育情境，通过精心设计、打磨、融合PPT、板书、讲授语言，培养课堂教学艺术美。第三，创新美育教学方法，如采用BOPPPS模式，实现化学教学与美育的融合。第四，凝练美育理论，融入基础化学教材，促进化学教材高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论框架，拓展和深化美育在化学教学中的应用提供参考。

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education is the education of aesthetic appreciation, moral sentiment, and spiritual enrichment, as well as the cultivation of imagination and innovative consciousness. Chemistry, as a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and transformation laws of matter, plays a crucial role in advancing the development of new materials, new energy sources, modern agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic elements into the teaching practice of foundational chemistry courses not only sparks students' interest in the subject, promotes the inheritance and confidence of China's excellent traditional culture, and strengthens students' patriotic sentiments, but also serves as an important pathway to fulfill the fundamental task of fostering virtue through education and cultivating well-rounded, high-quality talents. This educational model helps nurture comprehensively developed individuals who balance emotional agility with rational rigor. However, the implementation of aesthetic education in foundational chemistry courses in universities is still in its preliminary exploratory stage. To effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when organizing course content, teachers should emphasize the logical beauty of the material, ensuring it aligns not only with the inherent logical sequence of the course and the developmental patterns of students' minds and bodies but also with their interests, needs, and experiential backgrounds, thereby unifying the logical flow of the content with students' psychological development and providing a positive learning experience. Second, create aesthetic educational scenarios by meticulously designing, refining, and integrating PowerPoint presentations, blackboard writing, and lecture language to craft the artistic beauty of classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic education teaching by adopting methods such as BOPPPS to achieve the fusion of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, refine aesthetic education theories and incorporate them into foundational chemistry textbooks to promote the high-quality development of chemistry teaching materials. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing an aesthetic education theoretical system within chemistry courses and expanding and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学作为一门研究物质结构、性质及其转化规律的自然科学，在推动新材料、新能源、现代农业和信息技术等发展方面起着至关重要的作用。将美育融入基础化学课程教学实践，不仅能激发学生学习化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强学生的爱国情怀，更是落实立德树人根本任务、培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径，有助于培养情智交融、情理通达的全面发展的人。然而，目前高校基础化学课程美育的实施尚处于初步探索阶段。为有效推进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施:第一，在组织课程内容时，教师应注重教材的逻辑美，使其既符合课程内在逻辑顺序和学生身心发展规律，又符合学生的兴趣、需要和经验背景，实现教材内容的逻辑顺序与学生心理发展顺序的统一，给学生带来积极的学习体验。第二，创设美育情境，通过精心设计、提炼、整合PPT、板书和讲授语言，打造课堂教学的艺术美。第三，创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等方法实现化学教育与美育的融合。第四，完善美育理论并将其编入基础化学教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论体系、拓展和深化美育在化学教学中的应用提供了参考。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important component of the chemical discipline, combining physical and mathematical theories and methods to reveal the fundamental laws of chemical changes, serving as the core content of chemistry. It not only plays a significant role in advancing technological progress but also holds crucial importance for the development of social and economic sectors. At present, the intersection and integration of physical chemistry with physics, biology, food science, agriculture, and medicine are continuously deepening, broadening the scope of its applications. The article analyzes some issues arising in physical chemistry education and proposes corresponding strategies to address them.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学学科的重要组成，结合物理和数学的理论与方法，揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学的核心内容，不仅对推动技术进步具有重要作用，对社会经济部门的发展也至关重要。当前，物理化学与物理学、生物学、食品科学、农业、医学等的交叉融合不断加深，应用范围日益广泛。文章分析了物理化学教学中出现的一些问题，并提出了相应的解决对策。

ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important component of the chemical discipline, integrating theories and methods from physics and mathematics to uncover the fundamental laws of chemical changes, serving as the core content of chemistry. It not only plays a significant role in advancing technological progress but also holds pivotal importance in the development of socio-economic sectors. Currently, the intersection and integration of physical chemistry with disciplines such as physics, biology, food science, and agricultural medicine are deepening, broadening the scope of its applications. The article analyzes some issues arising in the teaching of physical chemistry and proposes corresponding strategies to address them.

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: "Chemistry of Life" was established in 1980 and is an academic journal in the field of biological sciences, sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, and publicly distributed both domestically and internationally. It is a core journal of Chinese science and technology and has been included in databases such as the American Chemical Abstracts (CA), the Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), the Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), the Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and the China Journal Net. In 2015, it was selected as a high-quality journal by the China Association for Science and Technology. The journal features sections such as research papers, reviews, teaching, research frontiers, techniques and methods, and biochemistry of traditional Chinese medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，是中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办的生物科学类学术期刊，国内外公开发行，是中国科技核心期刊，并被美国化学文摘（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科技论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）、中国期刊网等收录。2015年被中国科协评为精品期刊。该刊设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: "Chemistry of Life" was established in 1980 and is a comprehensive academic journal in the field of biology, sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, and publicly distributed both domestically and internationally. It is a core journal of Chinese science and technology and has been included in various domestic and international databases such as the American Chemical Abstracts (CA), the Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), the Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), the Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and the China Journal Net. In 2015, it was selected as a high-quality journal by the China Association for Science and Technology. The journal features sections such as research papers, reviews, teaching, research frontiers, techniques and methods, and biochemistry in traditional Chinese medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，是由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办的生物学领域综合性学术期刊，国内外公开发行，是中国科技核心期刊，并被美国化学文摘（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科技论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）、中国期刊网等国内外多个数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。该刊设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生物化学等栏目。

EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，是中国生物科学领域的学术期刊，国内外公开发行，由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办。该刊是中国科技核心期刊，被美国化学文摘（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科技论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）、中国期刊网等国内外多种数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。期刊设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. Mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagram, and Gibbs diagram methods were used to analyze the chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province. At the same time, single-factor evaluation and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation methods were employed to assess the quality of shallow groundwater. The results indicate that the groundwater in the study area is weakly alkaline, with diverse chemical types. The overall quality of shallow groundwater in the study area is relatively poor, mainly classified as Class V and Class IV water. The water quality in the study area is primarily influenced by evaporation and concentration processes, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中扮演着非常重要的角色。运用数理统计、Piper三线图和Gibbs图等方法，对河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征进行了分析。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质量进行了评价。结果表明，研究区地下水呈弱碱性，化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水整体质量较差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水。研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。

Mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagram, and Gibbs diagram methods were used to analyze the chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province. Meanwhile, the single-factor evaluation method and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method were employed to assess the quality of shallow groundwater. The results indicate that the groundwater in the study area is weakly alkaline, with diverse chemical types. The overall quality of shallow groundwater in the study area is relatively poor, mainly classified as Class V and Class IV. The water quality in the study area is primarily influenced by evaporation and concentration processes, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中扮演着极其重要的角色。运用数理统计、Piper三线图和Gibbs图等方法，分析了河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质量进行了评估。结果表明，研究区地下水呈弱碱性，化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水整体质量较差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类。研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. Mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagram, and Gibbs diagram methods were used to analyze the hydrochemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province. At the same time, the single-factor evaluation method and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method were applied to assess the quality of shallow groundwater. The results show that the groundwater in the study area is weakly alkaline, with diverse hydrochemical types. The overall quality of shallow groundwater in the study area is relatively poor, mainly classified as Class V and Class IV water. The water quality in the study area is primarily influenced by evaporation and concentration processes, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中扮演着极其重要的角色。运用数理统计、Piper三线图和Gibbs图等方法，对河北省任丘市浅层地下水的水化学特征进行了分析。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质量进行了评估。结果表明，研究区地下水呈弱碱性，水化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水整体质量较差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水。研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放及农业活动的影响。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: University laboratory chemicals are characterized by large storage volumes, high usage rates, a wide variety of types, complex physicochemical properties, and significant hazards, which impose higher requirements for the safety management of laboratory chemicals. Drawing on practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes common issues in traditional laboratory chemical management models and actively explores the application of information technology to address these problems through personnel training, process management, and hardware facilities. It provides new ideas for the informatization and intelligentization of laboratory chemical management.
EN_ZH: 大学实验室化学品具有储存量大、使用率高、种类繁多、理化性质复杂且危害性显著等特点，这对实验室化学品的安全管理提出了更高要求。本文结合实验室管理实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中的常见问题，并积极探讨通过人员培训、流程管理及硬件设施等方面应用信息技术来解决这些问题，为实验室化学品管理的信息化与智能化提供了新思路。

It provides new ideas for the informatization and intelligentization of laboratory chemical management.

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: University laboratory chemicals are characterized by large storage volumes, high usage rates, a wide variety of types, complex physical and chemical properties, and significant hazards, which impose higher requirements for the safety management of laboratory chemicals. Drawing on practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes common issues in traditional laboratory chemical management models and actively explores the application of information technology to address these problems in areas such as personnel training, process management, and hardware facilities. It provides new ideas for the informatization and intelligent management of laboratory chemicals.
EN_ZH: 大学实验室化学品具有储存量大、使用频率高、种类繁多、理化性质复杂、危害性大等特点，对实验室化学品的安全管理提出了更高要求。本文结合实验室管理实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中的常见问题，并积极探索信息技术在人员培训、流程管理、硬件设施等方面的应用，为实验室化学品的信息化、智能化管理提供了新思路。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance the innovation and interdisciplinary nature of organic chemistry experimental teaching, the pedagogical significance of using polymeric reagents in organic chemistry experiments was explored through two experiments: the Williamson etherification reaction and the Claisen rearrangement reaction using phenolic resin as the parent substrate; and the synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid. The teaching research results indicate that organic chemistry experimental teaching using polymeric reagents can improve students' ability to cross-apply knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry. In the process of designing organic reaction routes and optimizing synthesis processes, it helps promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry principles.
EN_ZH: 为增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，通过以酚醛树脂为母体的威廉姆森成醚反应和克莱森重排反应，以及以磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂为强酸催化剂催化合成乙酸葡萄糖酯两个实验，探讨了高分子试剂用于有机化学实验的教学意义。教学研究结果表明，采用高分子试剂的有机化学实验教学，可提高学生对有机化学和高分子化学知识的交叉运用能力，在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化的过程中，有助于促进学生理解和运用反应原子经济性和绿色化学原理。

ZH_EN: To enhance the innovation and interdisciplinary nature of organic chemistry experimental teaching, the pedagogical significance of using polymer reagents in organic chemistry experiments was explored through two experiments: the Williamson etherification reaction and the Claisen rearrangement reaction using phenolic resin as the parent substrate; and the synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid. The teaching research results indicate that organic chemistry experimental teaching using polymer reagents can improve students' ability to cross-apply knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry. In the process of designing organic reaction routes and optimizing synthesis processes, it helps promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry principles.

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance the innovation and interdisciplinary nature of organic chemistry experimental teaching, the educational significance of using polymer reagents in organic chemistry experiments was explored through two experiments: the Williamson etherification reaction and the Claisen rearrangement reaction using phenolic resin as the substrate, and the synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid. The teaching research results indicate that organic chemistry experimental teaching using polymer reagents can improve students' ability to cross-apply knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry. In the process of designing organic reaction routes and optimizing synthesis processes, it helps promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry principles.
EN_ZH: 为提高有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，通过以酚醛树脂为载体的威廉姆森成醚反应和克莱森重排反应，以及以磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂为强酸催化剂催化合成乙酸葡萄糖酯两个实验，探讨了高分子试剂在有机化学实验中的教学意义。教学研究结果表明，采用高分子试剂的有机化学实验教学，可提高学生对有机化学和高分子化学知识的交叉运用能力，在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生理解和运用反应原子经济性和绿色化学原理。

abstract: 化石染料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球出现极端天气。绿色发展理念属于人和自然和谐共处的科学观念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾问题。针对绿色发展的可行性问题进行研究，要求大力发展绿色化学和化工新工艺、新技术，通过多途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而能够在未来的世界竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。
ZH_EN: The combustion of fossil fuels generates greenhouse gas CO_2, leading to extreme weather globally. The concept of green development is a scientific idea that promotes harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, capable of resolving the conflict between environmental protection and development. Research on the feasibility of green development necessitates vigorously advancing new green chemical and industrial processes and technologies, cultivating chemistry professionals through multiple avenues, and inspiring college students' passion for chemistry, thereby contributing to the field of chemical science in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 化石燃料的燃烧产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球极端天气频发。绿色发展理念是促进人与自然和谐共生的科学理念，能够解决环境保护与发展的矛盾。研究绿色发展的可行性，需要大力推进绿色化工新工艺、新技术，多渠道培养化学人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而为未来全球竞争中的化学科学领域贡献力量。

The concept of green development is a scientific notion of harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, capable of resolving the conflict between environment and development. Research on the feasibility of green development necessitates vigorously advancing new green chemistry and chemical engineering processes and technologies, cultivating chemistry professionals through multiple avenues, and inspiring college students' passion for chemistry, thereby contributing to the science of chemistry in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 化石燃料的燃烧产生温室气体二氧化碳，导致全球极端天气频发。绿色发展理念是人与自然和谐共生的科学理念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾。研究绿色发展的可行性，需要大力推动绿色化学与化工新工艺、新技术的发展，多渠道培养化学人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而为未来全球竞争中的化学科学贡献力量。

ZH_EN: The combustion of fossil fuels generates the greenhouse gas CO_2, leading to extreme weather events globally. The concept of green development embodies a scientific approach to harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, capable of resolving the conflict between environmental preservation and development. Research into the feasibility of green development necessitates the vigorous advancement of green chemistry and new chemical engineering processes and technologies. It also requires the cultivation of chemical professionals through various means, inspiring college students' passion for chemistry, thereby enabling them to contribute to the field of chemical science in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 化石燃料的燃烧产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球极端天气事件频发。绿色发展理念体现了人与自然和谐共生的科学方法，能够解决环境保护与发展的矛盾。研究绿色发展的可行性需要大力推进绿色化学和新型化工工艺技术，并通过多种途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，使其能够在未来的全球竞争中为化学科学领域做出贡献。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: The excellent traditional Chinese culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and its integration into subject teaching holds profound significance. Using the CNKI database as the data source and employing the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this study conducts a visual analysis of research papers on the integration of traditional culture into middle school chemistry teaching in China over the past decade, focusing on research trends, hotspots, and frontiers. The research on traditional culture in middle school chemistry teaching has undergone three major developmental stages, encompassing four research hotspots and three types of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are proposed to broaden the depth and scope of this research field.
EN_ZH: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学具有深远意义。本研究以中国知网数据库为数据源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，对近十年来我国传统文化融入中学化学教学的研究论文进行可视化分析，聚焦于研究趋势、热点与前沿。中学化学教学中传统文化的研究历经三大发展阶段，涵盖四大研究热点与三类研究前沿。最后，提出实质性建议，以拓宽该研究领域的深度与广度。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: In the context of smart classrooms, cultivating students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are key objectives of classroom teaching. For junior high school chemistry education, teachers can use information technology to build smart classrooms and encourage students to actively participate in experimental activities, which helps promote the development of students' core subject competencies. Therefore, this paper explores junior high school chemistry experiment teaching in smart classrooms. Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, corresponding teaching strategies are proposed from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and post-class, to promote the orderly implementation of chemistry experiment teaching and effectively improve its quality.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维，增强其解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的关键目标。对于初中化学教学而言，教师可以借助信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的发展。因此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行探究。在分析实验教学重要性的基础上，从课前、课中、课后三个方面提出相应的教学策略，以促进化学实验教学的有序开展，有效提升教学质量。

Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, corresponding teaching strategies are proposed from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and post-class, to promote the orderly implementation of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively improve its quality.

abstract: 利用2015—2020年韶关的南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源4个烟叶种植区气象数据和B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分资料，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等数理统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子，结果表明：(1)韶关烟区烟叶大田期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标生长需求，但不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标受不同生育期的气象因子影响差异较大。(2)B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮/碱、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温、成熟期的气温。(3)C3F烟叶中，伸根期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均气温、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照均为影响其糖/碱的关键气象因子；旺长期积温、平均气温和伸根期平均气温、积温是影响其氮/碱的关键气象因子，敏感效应表现相反。
ZH_EN: Using meteorological data from 2015 to 2020 for the tobacco-growing regions of Nanxiong, Shixing, Lechang, and Ruyuan in Shaoguan, along with chemical composition data of B2F and C3F grade tobacco leaves, key meteorological factors affecting different chemical composition indicators of Shaoguan tobacco were identified through LSD multiple comparisons, Pearson correlation analysis, sensitivity coefficients, and other statistical methods. The results indicate: (1) The meteorological conditions during the field period in Shaoguan tobacco-growing areas generally meet the growth requirements for tobacco chemical composition indicators, but different chemical composition indicators of different grades of tobacco are significantly influenced by meteorological factors at different growth stages. (2) For B2F tobacco, the key meteorological factors affecting chlorine, nitrogen/alkali, and total sugar/reducing sugar are the diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, the average temperature during the root extension period, and the temperature during the maturity period, respectively. (3) For C3F tobacco, the average temperature during the root extension period is the key meteorological factor affecting total nicotine; the diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, the diurnal temperature difference during the root extension period, and sunshine during the vigorous growth period are key meteorological factors affecting chlorine content; the average temperature during the root extension period, diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, accumulated temperature during the root extension period, and sunshine during the vigorous growth period are key meteorological factors affecting sugar/alkali; accumulated temperature and average temperature during the vigorous growth period, as well as average temperature and accumulated temperature during the root extension period, are key meteorological factors affecting nitrogen/alkali, with opposite sensitivity effects.
EN_ZH: 利用2015—2020年韶关南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源烟区气象数据及B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分数据，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子。结果表明：（1）韶关烟区大田期气象条件基本满足烟叶化学成分指标的生长需求，但不同等级烟叶的不同化学成分指标受不同生育期气象因子的影响显著。（2）B2F烟叶氯、氮碱比、总糖还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期平均温度、成熟期温度。（3）C3F烟叶伸根期平均温度是影响烟碱总量的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照是影响氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均温度、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照是影响糖碱比的关键气象因子；旺长期积温与平均温度、伸根期平均温度与积温是影响氮碱比的关键气象因子，且敏感效应相反。

abstract: 利用2015—2020年韶关的南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源4个烟叶种植区气象数据和B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分资料，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等数理统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子，结果表明：(1)韶关烟区烟叶大田期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标生长需求，但不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标受不同生育期的气象因子影响差异较大。(2)B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮/碱、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温、成熟期的气温。(3)C3F烟叶中，伸根期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均气温、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照均为影响其糖/碱的关键气象因子；旺长期积温、平均气温和伸根期平均气温、积温是影响其氮/碱的关键气象因子，敏感效应表现相反。
ZH_EN: Using meteorological data from 2015 to 2020 for the tobacco-growing regions of Nanxiong, Shixing, Lechang, and Ruyuan in Shaoguan, along with chemical composition data of B2F and C3F grade tobacco leaves, key meteorological factors affecting different chemical composition indicators of Shaoguan tobacco were identified through LSD multiple comparisons, Pearson correlation analysis, and sensitivity coefficients. The results indicate: (1) The meteorological conditions during the field period in Shaoguan tobacco-growing areas generally meet the growth requirements for tobacco chemical composition indicators, but different chemical composition indicators of different grades of tobacco are significantly influenced by meteorological factors at various growth stages. (2) For B2F tobacco, the key meteorological factors affecting chlorine, nitrogen/alkali, and total sugar/reducing sugar are the diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, the average temperature during the root extension period, and the temperature during the maturity period, respectively. (3) For C3F tobacco, the average temperature during the root extension period is the key meteorological factor affecting total nicotine; the diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, the diurnal temperature difference during the root extension period, and sunlight during the vigorous growth period are key meteorological factors affecting chlorine content; the average temperature during the root extension period, the diurnal temperature difference during the vigorous growth period, accumulated temperature during the root extension period, and sunlight during the vigorous growth period are key meteorological factors affecting sugar/alkali; accumulated temperature and average temperature during the vigorous growth period, and average temperature and accumulated temperature during the root extension period are key meteorological factors affecting nitrogen/alkali, with opposite sensitivity effects.
EN_ZH: 利用2015—2020年韶关烟区南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源植烟区气象数据及B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分数据，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析和敏感系数，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子。结果表明：（1）韶关烟区大田期气象条件基本满足烟叶化学成分指标的生长需求，但不同等级烟叶的不同化学成分指标受各生育期气象因子的影响显著。（2）B2F烟叶氯、氮碱比、总糖还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温和成熟期的气温。（3）C3F烟叶伸根期的平均气温是影响总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的昼夜温差和旺长期的日照时数是影响氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期的平均气温、旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的积温和旺长期的日照时数是影响糖碱比的关键气象因子；旺长期的积温与平均气温、伸根期的平均气温与积温是影响氮碱比的关键气象因子，且敏感效应相反。

abstract: 随着环境问题日益严峻，可持续发展理念重要性逐渐凸显，环境化学在化工行业的人才培养中变得尤为关键。文章探讨了将环境化学与可持续发展理念融入化工教育的策略，包括课程设置的改革、实践教学的加强、绿色化学理念的推广以及跨学科合作能力的培养。研究方法涉及案例分析和教学实践相结合，旨在提高未来化工人才在环境保护和资源可持续利用方面的知识和技能。主要结论显示，通过改革教学方法、运用现代教育技术、增加校企合作，以及强化教学评价体系，可以有效地增强学生的环保意识、解决实际问题的能力和跨学科合作技能，为化工行业的可持续发展培养合格人才。
ZH_EN: As environmental issues become increasingly severe, the importance of the concept of sustainable development has gradually become prominent, making environmental chemistry particularly crucial in talent cultivation within the chemical industry. This article explores strategies for integrating environmental chemistry and sustainable development concepts into chemical engineering education, including reforms in curriculum design, strengthening practical teaching, promoting green chemistry principles, and fostering interdisciplinary collaboration skills. The research methods involve a combination of case analysis and teaching practices, aiming to enhance future chemical engineering talents' knowledge and skills in environmental protection and sustainable resource utilization. The main conclusions indicate that by reforming teaching methods, utilizing modern educational technologies, increasing university-industry collaboration, and strengthening teaching evaluation systems, students' environmental awareness, problem-solving abilities, and interdisciplinary collaboration skills can be effectively enhanced, cultivating qualified talents for the sustainable development of the chemical industry.
EN_ZH: 随着环境问题日益严峻，可持续发展理念的重要性逐渐凸显，使得环境化学在化工行业人才培养中显得尤为重要。本文探讨了将环境化学与可持续发展理念融入化工教育的策略，包括课程设计改革、加强实践教学、推广绿色化学原则以及培养跨学科协作能力。研究方法结合案例分析与教学实践，旨在提升未来化工人才在环境保护和资源可持续利用方面的知识与技能。主要结论表明，通过改革教学方法、利用现代教育技术、增加校企合作以及强化教学评价体系，可以有效增强学生的环保意识、问题解决能力和跨学科协作能力，为化工行业的可持续发展培养合格人才。

ZH_EN: As environmental issues become increasingly severe, the importance of sustainable development concepts has gradually become prominent, making environmental chemistry particularly crucial in talent cultivation within the chemical industry. This article explores strategies for integrating environmental chemistry and sustainable development concepts into chemical engineering education, including reforms in curriculum design, strengthening practical teaching, promoting green chemistry principles, and fostering interdisciplinary collaboration skills. The research methods involve a combination of case analysis and teaching practices, aiming to enhance future chemical engineering talents' knowledge and skills in environmental protection and sustainable resource utilization. The main conclusions indicate that by reforming teaching methods, utilizing modern educational technologies, increasing industry-academia collaboration, and strengthening teaching evaluation systems, students' environmental awareness, problem-solving abilities, and interdisciplinary collaboration skills can be effectively enhanced, cultivating qualified talents for the sustainable development of the chemical industry.
